story:
Offering quality, designer brand bridesmaids dresses as rentals! 


We've made it to the 2nd round of the Duke Startup Challenge and need your support!

What is the hardest part of wedding planning?  The bridesmaid dresses.  

While planning our weddings, we searched for affordable, fashionable dresses that our girls could "wear again".  We spent months shopping online and visiting bridal boutiques looking for dresses that were both attractive and wouldn't break the bank.  

The result?  A process that was tiring and dresses that were not quite perfect.  We knew there had to be a better solution.

With Style the Aisle we aim to make the bridesmaid dress experience fun and stress free. We believe that you shouldn’t have to compromise fashion and elegance on your wedding day.  Through our online boutique we provide a curated collection of high quality, designer dresses to brides and their maids – as rentals.  We take the worrying and difficult decisions out of picking the right dress for your girls on your day.  You’ve planned the wedding of your dreams and you should have the bridesmaid dress and experience that you envision.  

What is special about Style the Aisle?

High Quality Designers: We work with the best.  For our launch, we are working with premium bridesmaid dress designers, including LulaKate and Joanna August, and offer a great selection of dresses for looks you and your girls will actually love.

Borrow With Confidence: No more appointments at bridal boutiques; we bring the bridal boutique experience in home.  Find a dress you love on our site and order it for a 3 day in-home trial so you can see it in person before you place an order for your wedding.

Totally Convenient: We take care of the details for you.  Dresses arrive a week before the wedding cleaned, pressed and ready for the big day.  After the wedding, just place it in the prepaid return bag and drop it off at a USPS location or mailbox.  



What will we use the funding for? Gorgeous pictures of our dresses!

We are so proud of our start, but we still have a long way to go.  So far we have incorporated, bought our inventory, launched our website and have started placing orders.  But as we continue, we are in desperate need of updated photography to showcase our beautiful dresses.  This money will go toward funding the shoot so we are able to use these images as we start a PR push. Wedding planning is such a visual process (hi Pinterest!) that without professional photos we will find it hard to compete.

Anything raised over our initial goal of $2,500 will be used to expand the colors and styles in our collection.

Aside from donations, we would love your help in spreading the word about Style the Aisle! Share us with friends, co-workers and cousins - anyone who is getting married.

Visit our website: www.styletheaisle.com and then come say hello - we're social! 

Facebook: www.facebook.com/StyletheAisle
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Style_The_Aisle
Instagram: http://instagram.com/styletheaisle

xo, 

Erica + Meaghan

story:
Tantalus Cycling || Inspiration, Performance and Style

"Triathlon and cycling are sports built around the concept of challenge. Challenging fellow competitors; challenging the physical limits of your body; and challenging the toughness and drive of your mind and will. Tantalus Cycling exists to provide a competitive edge for all those seeking that Challenge; and in doing so, we aim to create the perfect combination of performance and style."

Tantalus Cycling was unknowingly conceived in 2007 while living on the island of Oahu. During one of our many adventures on the island, we discovered a road on the leeward side just north of the famous Waikiki Beach. With its encompassing jungles and warm salty air, this road was divine in its beauty. The road wound back and forth up the side of the lush Ko’olau mountain range. Every hairpin turn brought into view a wider horizon of the island. As we drove upward, I was inspired by the thought of how much pain, sweat, and pure suffering it would take to ascend Tantalus Road on a bicycle. It was then that a seed was planted; a seed that would lie dormant for several years. Fast forward to today. In combining Laura’s entrepreneurial know-how and my passion for triathlon and cycling, we have created Tantalus Cycling under one mission and vision. To unite triathletes and cyclists who crave inspiration and style while chasing their goals.

*Tantalus Cycling - the dream project of husband and wife, Matt and Laura Radniecki.

The Performance Side of Tantalus:

On the performance side, our goal is to provide sleek and stylish race wheels that inspire you and ignite your passion to be your best and chase your goals. We want to offer this at an affordable price, because we are triathletes - we know how prohibitive race wheels can be.  

We are a startup company that believes in cycling. We want to unite other inspired athletes with stylish, high performance gear that is within their budget, and doesn't stop them from racing competitively.

The reality is that we don't have the resources right now to design, engineer, and manufacture a brand new race wheel. Trust me, we have lofty goals for the future. But right now, in order to accomplish these goals, we are utilizing the existing technology that has made race wheels a highly coveted and effective means of improving your performance, as well as existing manufacturers to supply our wheels.  

It's true - we didn't engineer these wheels ourselves. But we have used them. We have raced with them. We have tested and compared them with others, and we know they are everything we believe them to be.  

The process is simple. Once the wheels arrive, we inspect them to ensure that the manufacturer continues to meet our performance standards. From there, we add our touch of style, making them unique to Tantalus Cycling and a symbol of inspiration, passion, and chasing the Challenge.

*Above photo --> Here we are finalizing our prototype design layout on our first set of wheels.

To take on the competition, we have two different wheel depths with each depth carrying their own benefits. 

-- Tantalus Velox 8 --

 The Tantalus Velox 8 wheels are the deepest 700c clincher wheel set we offer. Velox 8's have a rim profile coming in at 88 mm and constructed from 3K tow carbon fiber. The Velox 8's are made for pure aerodynamic performance! They weigh in at approximately 66 ounces. 

The first three supporters to fall in love with Tantalus Cycling and support at the $850 level will get their hands on a brand new set of Tantalus Velox 8's.  

Did you miss the gun on the limited $850 perk special but you're still interested in seeing what a set of Velox 8's can do for your racing game? No worries! The $950 perk will get you up and riding at the front. 

*Our local hero can be seen below testing out our first set of Velox 8's. 

-- Tantalus Velox 6 -- 

The Tantalus Velox 6 clincher wheel set maximizes stability while maintaining a deep aerodynamic profile. This 700c wheel set has a rim profile depth of 60mm and is also constructed with 3K tow carbon. The shallower rim profile provides for greater stability in crosswinds. It can also be the perfect aero setup for someone not quite ready for the shiftiness that the Velox 8's can present in high winds. Velox 6's weigh in at approximately 60 ounces, thus making them a lighter wheel set than the Velox 8's. If you are racing on a course with some serious up and down terrain, the Velox 6's are a great setup. 

The first three to support at the $800 level will each be sent a set of Velox 6's to charge the field with! After that, anyone supporting at the $900 level will receive a set. 

Notice the difference in rim depth on the Velox 6's below with the Velox 8's in the picture of the local hero above? It may not seem like much visually, but that 28 mm difference can be significant if things get windy. 

-Both the Velox 8 and the Velox 6 are built with 20 spoke holes on the front wheel and 24 spoke holes on the rear wheel. 

-All Velox wheels are built with Novatec hubs and cnSpoke Aero Spokes.

-You will have the option of choosing between a glossy finish or a matte finish on the 3K carbon with either wheel set. 

-You will have the option of choosing between a Shimano/SRAM or Campagnolo 9/10 cassette body.

The Style Side of Tantalus:

Every endurance athlete has a closet full of tech-tee’s and race shirts. They are often worn as a means of personal identity; a way to say “I am a triathlete; I am a cyclist; I am a runner.” However, we think there ought to be a better way to identify with this athletic subculture than simply rockin' old race tee’s in public. Our goal is to provide casual everyday-wear that maintains a sense of athleticism. Something you can wear that goes beyond a race tee; something that inspires you and shows your desire to pursue The Challenge.

One of our initial goals is to encourage everyone to leave their race tees for the gym. We will be offering our Tantalus Cycling Tee (TCT). The TCT will be offered in Charcoal Grey and Kelly Green, and is available in both a male and female fit. The TCT is a dual material blend of 60% cotton and 40% Poly. This material blend carries the soft feel of cotton against your skin but the lightness of polyester. 

To top it off, no pun intended, we have our very first run of Tantalus Snap-Backs. This curve-billed snap-back showcases the very sharp, very edgy Ko'olau Range logo. This is the same design that can be seen on any of the Tantalus Wheelsets. The snap-backs are offered in a light grey with a black under-bill.

The Style Endgame:

Our vision is to create an everyday style for endurance athletes outside of the typical race-day attire. Today, apparel for endurance athletes is limited to tech-tee's, compression socks, flashy colored shoes, and awkward Lycra shorts. You can't really wear those things outside of training or racing. Tantalus Cycling is going to challenge that, and design athletic-inspired apparel that can be worn in an everyday casual environment. 

You will finally have an inspiring style that says "I am a competitor...I thrive on The Challenge..."  

As with everything, we are starting simple with the TCT and the Tantalus Snap-Back... but that only leaves us room to grow.

I am ready to embrace The Challenge. 

Now what? 

Excellent! We are happy to hear that you believe in our mission and vision! 

Tantalus Cycling has a funding campaign goal to raise $7,500 in 30 days. These funds will be used to help get Tantalus off the ground and start building an initial inventory. They will also be used to expand our apparel line.

Once you have committed to a pledge level, the best thing you can do is share Tantalus with your training buddies! We can't do this without your support.

After you commit to pledge, we will be contacting you because there is still some information we will need from you. If you are pledging for a set of Tantalus Velox 8's or Velox 6's, we will need to find out what kind of finishing coat you prefer (Matte or Gloss), and your preference of cassette body. If you are pledging for the TCT, we will need to find out your size, color preference, and fit. 

Once our 30 day campaign is completed, we will go to work on fulfilling the pledges.  

We will start by sending the orders for the Velox 8's and Velox 6's over to our manufacturer so they can fulfill them. We estimate it taking 5-6 weeks after the close of the campaign for us to receive the wheel orders. From there we will inspect, label, package, and ship them to you. We estimate this phase taking 2-3 additional weeks, with a goal fulfillment date of 9 weeks from the closing of the campaign.  

Progress reports will be sent out periodically, updating supporters on the status of the wheels as well as notifications of any delays.  

At the same time, we will arrange for the ordering and embroidery of the Tantalus Snap-Backs and the printing for the Tantalus Cycling Tee's. Our hope is to have these fulfilled six weeks after the close of the campaign.

Once everything is complete, we will send it all off and a few days later you guys will be ready for the racing season!

If you have any questions prior to, or after, making a pledge, do not hesitate to send us an email. You can even just email us to tell us what you think! It won't take longer than 24 hours to hear back from us at any point throughout the campaign or during fulfillment afterwards.

Info@tantaluscycling.com 

FAQ:

1. Is there a warranty policy on the Tantalus Velox wheel sets? 

Yes, in summary, we have a 2 year warranty for the original purchaser. The policy excludes normal wear and tear as well as misuse and crash damage. For complete warranty information, please email us at info@tantaluscycling.com!

We appreciate your interest and your support for our dream of Tantalus Cycling; this wouldn't be possible without you!

Matt + Laura Radniecki

-- A special thank you to Tony Parrish for the design work in the creation of the Tantalus Cycling brand logo and wheel design. You can see more of his work and contact him here!

story:
Hello and Nice to meet you !

We are 3 friends, Antoine, Arnaud and Nicolas, working in the shoes industry and fan of sneakers. More and more confronted with the impact our work have on the planet, we started to look for solutions.

We realised how complicated it was to find a stylish sneakers brand that takes sustainability seriously. 

So we decided to act and to create a brand ourselves.

 

 

 

 

Holistic approach

Every single decision we take, every single choice we make, is made with sustainability as a driver. 

For 18 months, from the sole to the laces, we designed, we searched, we developed, to achieve our goals. 

We didn’t want to compromise, we wanted to reach the highest level of sustainability on the market, yet with a pretty cool style!

 

 

Reduce the Footprint

The fashion industry accounted for 8,1% of the global climate impact with almost 4 metric gigatons of CO2 emission in 2018. This is almost as much as all the emissions of the European union.  

More than 23 billion pairs of shoes are produced every year, and each one of them releases 32kg of CO2 equivalent.  This is comparable to each one of us doing a 900km flight or a 2350km car trip each year.  

If we want to keep our planet healthy, we need to reduce our footprint. 

And to do that we have to come up with better products. 

We didn’t want to just add a new product on the market, we wanted to create a concept. So we created our new norms: 

Sustainability is in our blood: it is the core of what we are. From material selection, choice of supplier, transport, packaging…sustainability is the fundamental of all our decisions.

Transparency is our currency: We are 100% transparent, on our impact, on our suppliers and on our costs. We have nothing to hide and we are proud to show how we are working.

Modernity: Our products are young, innovative and turned toward the future. We decided to come with a product that would set a new standard in the industry.

 

 

Recycle, Reduce and Reuse

From the design, to every single component, we focused on those three words.

From the moment they are designed until a consumer buys them, shoes can pass through hundreds of hands and can travel thousands of kilometers. 

They are made from many components. You have, of course, the upper, the laces, the labels, the sole,.. but you have also many other elements needed for the construction such as glue, thread, counters... 

 

Eco-Design Approach

To make the shoes we wanted, we had to rethink every single part of it. We started with our Eco-design approach, minimising that number of components. Then we searched for the right materials and for the best manufacturers in Europe.

 

Our Materials

Our soles are made from recycled rubber from manufacturing wastes that are crunched, melted and injected into the moulds in Portugal.

 

Our footbed are made from recycled foam, our labels and laces are made from recycled plastic bottles, and our heel counters, toe boxes are made from recycled polyester fibres and are completely chemical free. For the assembly, we also use recycled yarns and water based glue.

 

 

3D Knitting Technology 

For the Upper, we used the 3D Knitting Technology. For those who are not familiar with that, it's a really complex loom that knit yarns together, to produce a single piece, ready to be assembled, shoe upper.  

Knit has many advantages. It is light, breathable and confortable. But even better than that, it allowed us to create a seamless design, that reduce cutting, manufacturing wastes, and the number of components.

 

To make Norm's knit, we use a yarn made of 100% recycled plastic bottles. 

The bottles are collected locally, cleaned, mechanically crushed and then transformed into threads. 

To make one pair of shoes, we recycle 

 

 

 

 

Durability is a key aspect for Norm 

Our products are made using qualitative materials and manufacturing techniques to ensure a prolonged life time. But to even further increase it, the knit material is very easy to repairs with a simple needle and a thread.

 

 

 

 

We selected our suppliers to minimise the distance between them, ensure the use of local materials and reduce our carbon footprint.

 

 

Based on existing studies, we evaluated the impact of every single components we use and the traveling distance they have to do until the final products are delivered to our warehouse. 

The impact for one pair of Norm is only 6.5 kg of CO2 equivalent. This is 80% lower than the industry average* 

We collaborate with the NGO "Seed for Life / Graine de Vie" to plant 2 trees in Madagascar and Eastern Cap for each pair of sneakers that you buy. 

Together we can reforest the most needed areas, in addition to help local communities to provide employment, wood and food resources.  

 

 * based on Measuring Fashion 2018, Environmental Impact of the Global Apparel and Footwear Industries Study, Quantis

 

We also selected only suppliers that combined great talent and great workers. 

Ethic is one of our core value and we made sure it was respected, at all time, through our entire supply chain.

 

 

 

We are not shy to tell you how our price is calculated. We ensure a decent pay to workers and we select qualitative products, which comes at a cost. Our cut is important, but don't worry it's not to fly away with it ! We think of the future and we want to continue to develop great products. 

 

 

We created a stylish, durable and comfortable shoes, available for men and women in 5 different colors to match any styles. From the launch of the campaign, we will release a Polar White, an Eclipse Black, a Military Green, an Obsidian Blue and a Burgundyversion. 

All available from European size 36 to 47 (US 5 to 13). 

For more information on sizing, please check the sizing chart bellow.

 

Polar white

 

Eclipse Black

 

Military Green

 

Obsidian Blue

 

Burgundy 

 

Our "Family Member" T-shirt

  • 100% Organic Cotton 
  • Made in Portugal
  • Screen printing with water based ink

 

 

Want to know who's behind all this ? This is us, 3 young guys in their 30s with, still,  a cumulated experience of more than 20 years in the shoes industry. Colleagues in the working environment and good friends in life, the trio is fearless and ready to fight all the big names on the market !

Arnaud fell into the shoes industry when he was still a little boy. All his family is working in the business, which makes the dinners conversation about shoes, shoes and shoes. Father of two adorable girls, he has a great experience and expertise in the sector. His great sense of humour and easy contact makes of him a great team player.

Nicolas is the believer. Shoe designer since he finished his studies in a prestigious design school in Brussels, he cumulated experiences with renowned brands. Two bulldogs and soon, two sons at home, but he still finds the time to make hundreds of beautiful sketches every day.  Nicolas his a go-getter and a doer and he pushes the team to achieve its targets.

Antoine is the man in the shadow. Mechanical engineer who worked in Aerospace for years, nobody never really understood what he was doing with shoes. Still, he has a creative mindset and he gets the things organised and working. Antoine is a bit the Swiss knife of the team, fixing a door in the morning, making a business plan in the afternoon. 

If you have any questions, don't hesitate to contact us, we will be glad to answer them all.

Thank you !

Antoine, Arnaud & Nicolas

 

 

 

Norm in practice

You will find bellow all the practical details about Norm. 

Our plan is to deliver the pledges around September, but we'll do our best to shorten the lead time! Why so long? We want to make sure that everything will be perfect at the moment you receive your pair of Norm and that you can keep them as long as possible.

The amount raised with the campaign will allow us to launch the first batch in production and launch the brand on the market.

After you back the project, you will receive at the end of the campaign an email with a survey to tell us the size(s) and color(s) you would like to receive. We will make sure that all the backer finds a way to let us now !

Finally, we will make sure to update you frequently on our progress ! If you have questions, don't hesitate to reach us by any mean you find.

 

 

 

 

SPECIAL THANKS

Graphic Design : Nicolas Caracostas / Oblique 

Video : Romain Habousha

Gif and Animations : Christophe Bravin

 

 

THANK YOU
story_txt:
Hello and Nice to meet you !We are 3 friends, Antoine, Arnaud and Nicolas, working in the shoes industry and fan of sneakers. More and more confronted with the impact our work have on the planet, we started to look for solutions.We realised how complicated it was to find a stylish sneakers brand that takes sustainability seriously. So we decided to act and to create a brand ourselves.    Holistic approachEvery single decision we take, every single choice we make, is made with sustainability as a driver. For 18 months, from the sole to the laces, we designed, we searched, we developed, to achieve our goals. We didn’t want to compromise, we wanted to reach the highest level of sustainability on the market, yet with a pretty cool style!  Reduce the FootprintThe fashion industry accounted for 8,1% of the global climate impact with almost 4 metric gigatons of CO2 emission in 2018. This is almost as much as all the emissions of the European union.  More than 23 billion pairs of shoes are produced every year, and each one of them releases 32kg of CO2 equivalent.  This is comparable to each one of us doing a 900km flight or a 2350km car trip each year.  If we want to keep our planet healthy, we need to reduce our footprint. And to do that we have to come up with better products. We didn’t want to just add a new product on the market, we wanted to create a concept. So we created our new norms: Sustainability is in our blood: it is the core of what we are. From material selection, choice of supplier, transport, packaging…sustainability is the fundamental of all our decisions.Transparency is our currency: We are 100% transparent, on our impact, on our suppliers and on our costs. We have nothing to hide and we are proud to show how we are working.Modernity: Our products are young, innovative and turned toward the future. We decided to come with a product that would set a new standard in the industry.  Recycle, Reduce and ReuseFrom the design, to every single component, we focused on those three words.From the moment they are designed until a consumer buys them, shoes can pass through hundreds of hands and can travel thousands of kilometers. They are made from many components. You have, of course, the upper, the laces, the labels, the sole,.. but you have also many other elements needed for the construction such as glue, thread, counters...  Eco-Design ApproachTo make the shoes we wanted, we had to rethink every single part of it. We started with our Eco-design approach, minimising that number of components. Then we searched for the right materials and for the best manufacturers in Europe. Our MaterialsOur soles are made from recycled rubber from manufacturing wastes that are crunched, melted and injected into the moulds in Portugal. Our footbed are made from recycled foam, our labels and laces are made from recycled plastic bottles, and our heel counters, toe boxes are made from recycled polyester fibres and are completely chemical free. For the assembly, we also use recycled yarns and water based glue.  3D Knitting Technology For the Upper, we used the 3D Knitting Technology. For those who are not familiar with that, it's a really complex loom that knit yarns together, to produce a single piece, ready to be assembled, shoe upper.  Knit has many advantages. It is light, breathable and confortable. But even better than that, it allowed us to create a seamless design, that reduce cutting, manufacturing wastes, and the number of components. To make Norm's knit, we use a yarn made of 100% recycled plastic bottles. The bottles are collected locally, cleaned, mechanically crushed and then transformed into threads. To make one pair of shoes, we recycle     Durability is a key aspect for Norm Our products are made using qualitative materials and manufacturing techniques to ensure a prolonged life time. But to even further increase it, the knit material is very easy to repairs with a simple needle and a thread.    We selected our suppliers to minimise the distance between them, ensure the use of local materials and reduce our carbon footprint.  Based on existing studies, we evaluated the impact of every single components we use and the traveling distance they have to do until the final products are delivered to our warehouse. The impact for one pair of Norm is only 6.5 kg of CO2 equivalent. This is 80% lower than the industry average* We collaborate with the NGO "Seed for Life / Graine de Vie" to plant 2 trees in Madagascar and Eastern Cap for each pair of sneakers that you buy. Together we can reforest the most needed areas, in addition to help local communities to provide employment, wood and food resources.    * based on Measuring Fashion 2018, Environmental Impact of the Global Apparel and Footwear Industries Study, Quantis We also selected only suppliers that combined great talent and great workers. Ethic is one of our core value and we made sure it was respected, at all time, through our entire supply chain.   We are not shy to tell you how our price is calculated. We ensure a decent pay to workers and we select qualitative products, which comes at a cost. Our cut is important, but don't worry it's not to fly away with it ! We think of the future and we want to continue to develop great products.   We created a stylish, durable and comfortable shoes, available for men and women in 5 different colors to match any styles. From the launch of the campaign, we will release a Polar White, an Eclipse Black, a Military Green, an Obsidian Blue and a Burgundyversion. All available from European size 36 to 47 (US 5 to 13). For more information on sizing, please check the sizing chart bellow. Polar white Eclipse Black Military Green Obsidian Blue Burgundy  Our "Family Member" T-shirt
100% Organic Cotton 
Made in Portugal
Screen printing with water based ink
  Want to know who's behind all this ? This is us, 3 young guys in their 30s with, still,  a cumulated experience of more than 20 years in the shoes industry. Colleagues in the working environment and good friends in life, the trio is fearless and ready to fight all the big names on the market !Arnaud fell into the shoes industry when he was still a little boy. All his family is working in the business, which makes the dinners conversation about shoes, shoes and shoes. Father of two adorable girls, he has a great experience and expertise in the sector. His great sense of humour and easy contact makes of him a great team player.Nicolas is the believer. Shoe designer since he finished his studies in a prestigious design school in Brussels, he cumulated experiences with renowned brands. Two bulldogs and soon, two sons at home, but he still finds the time to make hundreds of beautiful sketches every day.  Nicolas his a go-getter and a doer and he pushes the team to achieve its targets.Antoine is the man in the shadow. Mechanical engineer who worked in Aerospace for years, nobody never really understood what he was doing with shoes. Still, he has a creative mindset and he gets the things organised and working. Antoine is a bit the Swiss knife of the team, fixing a door in the morning, making a business plan in the afternoon. If you have any questions, don't hesitate to contact us, we will be glad to answer them all.Thank you !Antoine, Arnaud & Nicolas   Norm in practiceYou will find bellow all the practical details about Norm. Our plan is to deliver the pledges around September, but we'll do our best to shorten the lead time! Why so long? We want to make sure that everything will be perfect at the moment you receive your pair of Norm and that you can keep them as long as possible.The amount raised with the campaign will allow us to launch the first batch in production and launch the brand on the market.After you back the project, you will receive at the end of the campaign an email with a survey to tell us the size(s) and color(s) you would like to receive. We will make sure that all the backer finds a way to let us now !Finally, we will make sure to update you frequently on our progress ! If you have questions, don't hesitate to reach us by any mean you find.    SPECIAL THANKSGraphic Design : Nicolas Caracostas / Oblique Video : Romain HaboushaGif and Animations : Christophe Bravin  THANK YOU

story:
Most entrepreneurs are constantly distracted by notifications of social media, messages and emails.

This watch is a constant reminder of the value of your time.

So you can unplug yourself from the constant barrage of notifications and alerts.

And instead reconnect with the most important thing we have - time.

 

Time for personal growth, building your business and traveling. 

Big success on Kickstarter! 

Thanks to a tremendous community of support, our first Kickstarter campaign reached over €11,000 and was 100% funded in just 3 days!

" The watch looks fantastic! I can't wait to wear the finished product. "
- Logan T, Kickstarter Supporter

 

Look great. Last forever

The case is built with a single piece of 316L stainless steel giving it superior strength.

Our watch features hardened mineral glass finished with an anti-scratch coating to withstand scratches.

It's also able to withstand 5 ATM of water pressure.

Extraordinary mechanical design

Instantly gain a unique look with your limited edition IGNITE.
The skeletonized dial and mechanical design makes sure you stand out. Guaranteed.

Your watch will most likely be one of a kind within your circle of friends and family. 

Reliable automatic power

Unlike low quality Chinese automatic movements that doesn’t properly keep up with time, IGNITE has a Seiko NH71 Japanese movement. One of the finest automatic movements on the market today.

With our top class automatic movement, your watch never needs a battery. It is self-winding, powered by the movement of your wrist.

Unlike smartwatches, the IGNITE is a timeless watch that keep going forever.

Limited edition

This limited edition has an engraved numbered series from 1 to 500. There will only be 500 of these exclusive IGNITE timepieces worldwide.

 

Quality & specifications

Case:

42mm diameter, 11mm thickness, 316L stainless steel case

Full open-face dial showcasing the attention to detail and craftsmanship that goes into every timepiece

Glass:

Hardened mineral glass with anti-scratch coating

Straps:

22mm wide.

Genuine leather

316L Stainless steel buckles.

Movement:

NH71 Japanese automatic movement

36-hour power reserve

21,000 beats per hour (3Hz)

24 jewels

With an automatic movement, your watch never needs a battery. It is self-winding, powered by the movement of your wrist. The NH70 movement is one of the best automatic movements available on the market today. 

Water Resistance:

50 meters (5ATM)

5 ATM water resistance means that the watch can withstand the equivalent water pressure that is experienced at 50 meters underwater, held completely still. Your watch is rainproof, you can do the dishes and take a shower with it. 

How to buy today

  1. Select a perk '1 Watch - VIP Early Bird'
  2. Fill in your personal information and credit card
  3. Click on 'Submit Payment'

Our Story

At IGNITE, we know you want to be a confident entrepreneur that spends time on the things you really want such as building a business, traveling or spending time with family & friends. In order to do that, you need more time and freedom. 

The problem is that we are wasting so much time on our phone, checking social media, youtube and emails. Which makes you feel frustrated because you know you could have done something better with your time. Like working towards your goals or spending time with friends. 

We believe that everyone should live an awesome and meaningful life. Time is constantly moving and you should make the best out of it, every second. 

We understand that it is frustrating to waste so much time on electronic devices. That is why we created an automatic watch that needs no batteries or no charging. During our first release wave, we sold over €11.000 in just 2 weeks on Kickstarter!

This watch is a constant reminder of the value of your time. So you can unplug yourself from the constant barrage of notifications and alerts. And instead reconnect with the most important thing we have - time. 

Time for personal growth, building your business and traveling. 

Meet the founder

Hey! I'm Nathan and I'm the founder of IGNITE. My team and I are located in Ghent, Belgium. 

Other ways you can help

In addition to making a monetary contribution to this campaign, you can show your support for IGNITE by sharing a link to this campaign with all your friends and family. Go ahead and post about IGNITE on any social media platform such as Instagram, Facebook, and Twitter.

We appreciate all your support, both monetary and non-monetary, and we thank you for taking the time to read about what we are doing.

story:
GLOW is the comfortable high-quality sneaker with unseen versatility, perfect for every moment of your life: from toned down casual days to the wildest all-night-long parties. It comes with 6 colors in 1 unique sneaker, so you can switch between the rich LED colors that fully light up your feet.    

 

For the rebels and trendsetters, we created a true head-turner that doesn’t compromise comfort for style. GLOW combines unique LED footwear that looks ridiculously cool with wearable, comfortable, well-made sneakers.

 

We created everything you wished for but never expected from LED shoes. You need sneakers that go with everything. Like, really. GLOW are so versatile that with only 1 pair, you get 6 colorful looks with vibrant LED colors. Plus the classic minimalist unlit style.

THE PROBLEM

 

In today's fast paced life, buying a pair of sneakers for every one of your outfits can cost you a small fortune. Plus all the environmental waste we cause because we go through so many pairs every year.

THE SOLUTION

 

With Glow, the 7 styles in 1 sneaker saves you the headache, cost and wardrobe space of buying multiple pairs of sneakers for all your different outfits! GLOW is also cruelty free, vegan, and sustainably produced.

 

To flawlessly combine functionality and style, we have partnered up with the top leading developers in LED technology. This patent-protected material allowed us to find a perfect balance that ensures your feet feel fresh and comfortable all the time.

 

The top part of the shoe is made of three main layers. First, a super comfortable liner that protects the most sensitive feet and then a forming cloth that gives your sneakers structure and keeps them looking great. It’s all wrapped up in a high-tech optical fabric that looks like a million bucks, night and day.

We made sure your sneakers are easy to clean. You only have one job: keep the switch away from water. Other than that, you can soak and brush them lightly to keep yours looking great. 

 

Full disclosure: you can’t swim while wearing GLOW. But then again, no one would see how lit (pun intended) they are underwater, so there’s no point really. But they’re so well built, that your LED sneakers are weather resistant and you'll be worry-free if you’re caught out in the rain. The switch and charging port are securely covered so you know you’re always safe. 

 

GLOW look and feel comfortable… because they actually are! Imagine stepping on a white, fluffy, ridiculously comfortable cloud. That’s how wearing these sneakers feels like. The high tech memory foam insoles hug your feet and keep them cozy for as long as you need, so you can focus on enjoying life.

 

At only 10 oz (300 grams), your GLOW are as lightweight as regular everyday sneakers, yet they include all the LED tech! Take them anywhere you want to make an impression at - from the next festival you’re attending, to the championship final your team is playing in.

 

GLOW are versatile sneakers that adapt to your active lifestyle. If you're on the move all day or occasionally do some parkour, you'll be surprised to see how great of a friend your new sneakers are.

 

Running, cycling or even just walking at night can sometimes feel so dangerous, you might stop going out. At GLOW, we believe that you should be free to explore the world. Simply put on your GLOWs and you won’t even have to hear the honking cars - everyone will see you in the darkest of nights and you’ll feel safer than ever.

 

With GLOW, your creativity can be effortlessly expressed with a touch of a button. We celebrate being unique, escaping the ordinary and we definitely like to light up the world (but we usually start with a party).

 

For the parties that seem to and do last forever, the nights you get lost in your thoughts while running and the special moments you just can’t stop having fun. GLOW makes the party in your feet last up to 14 hours. Fully recharged in only 2 hours, you’ll be ready for an encore in no time!

 

At GLOW, we have a commitment towards sustainability. Our sneakers are made with high quality vegan leather and we are proud to announce that we are 100% cruelty free. We feel it's our responsibility to do our part to light up our world.

 

From day to night, you can wear your GLOWs anywhere. Turn them on and change the colors on the go to transform your outfit from work to after-hours fun. Dare to be different and all your friends will love to gather around you. You’ll be the superstar who brings people together.

 

As a parent, you would do anything for your kids. We love to see them smile, hear their delighted squeals of joy and feel their excitement - so GLOW comes in kids sizes. Now you’ll have another thing that connects you and get to enjoy your precious time together even more.

Scroll down to the Sizing section to see the Shoe Sizes for kids!

 WATCH THE DEMO 

 

When do I tell you my size? Your size info will be collected through a survey after the campaign ends. But you need to measure your feet before then, to make sure you can get GLOW in your size.

Our community is at the heart of everything we do. We’re building an awesome community where heroes like you, who like to stand out and be unique can connect. You’ll always have a say in our brand’s future. 


We’re a bunch of sneakers-loving freaks that got hung up on a pair of LED shoes that didn’t exist. So we created it ourselves, after a year of trial, error, meetings, samples and countless prototypes. But we never gave up on our dream and we won’t give up on yours. We’re here to bring some real light in your life, in the form of high quality LED shoes!

We're the dream-and-do team: we dream of creating solutions that help heroes like you shine and we do our best to achieve that!

story:
Tired of pulling your socks over and over again throughout the day?

The Sebastien Grey Lasso Sock was created to eliminate this inconvenience and allow you to live your day with one less problem. By simply pulling the sock on to just below the calf and stretching the lasso above the calf muscle, we can guarantee you a reliable, durable sock you won’t need to touch until you choose to take it off. 

After much feedback from our clients, we decided to create a sock that solved the enigma of the status quo. We have just come to accept that sagging socks is the norm and that we are powerless in seeking any type of solution. After a myriad of prototypes and much experimentation, we crafted The Lasso Sock. They are fashionable and come in a variety of colors. 

We gave great consideration to the height of this sock as well. While we wanted enough coverage to allow you to sit or cross your legs with ease, we also wanted to avoid too much height that would cause your pant leg to continually get caught at your calf. 

The Lasso Sock is only as high as the bottom of your calf, so it provides you with the perfect amount of coverage. Then we add the lasso, stretching up to secure the sock above your calf, preventing any unwanted catching at your pant leg.

Designed with a breathable, mercerized cotton that’s thicker and stronger than ordinary socks, as well as a reinforced toe area that supports your feet, you’ll be comfortable all day long.

Our construction and design choices produced the softest, silkiest, and most durable sock you will find on the market. Forget the discomfort of continually pulling your sock up, sacrificing blood flow from an increase in elastic or even that annoying rolled seam most often found lurking at the toe. 

The 22 unique designs are perfect for any occasion, whether for business, casual or a weekend getaway. Behold, we have solved all of your sock struggles with the Lasso Sock from Sebastien Grey. You’re welcome! 

 

 

 

Our Story

We are in the business of listening. We not only take pride in listening to our clients and delivering the suit and the quality they are looking for, but we hear them when they express their daily struggles with different aspects of their wardrobe. Sebastien Grey has evolved into the company it has because we take these everyday problems and find solutions for them. The lasso sock is only one of many innovative designs we have constructed to help eliminate the seemingly insignificant, yet quite bothersome problems of our daily sartorial struggles. You undoubtedly have more important issues to address than whether or not your socks have gathered at your ankles again.
story_txt:
Tired of pulling your socks over and over again throughout the day?


The Sebastien Grey Lasso Sock was created to eliminate this inconvenience and allow you to live your day with one less problem. By simply pulling the sock on to just below the calf and stretching the lasso above the calf muscle, we can guarantee you a reliable, durable sock you won’t need to touch until you choose to take it off. 


After much feedback from our clients, we decided to create a sock that solved the enigma of the status quo. We have just come to accept that sagging socks is the norm and that we are powerless in seeking any type of solution. After a myriad of prototypes and much experimentation, we crafted The Lasso Sock. They are fashionable and come in a variety of colors. 


We gave great consideration to the height of this sock as well. While we wanted enough coverage to allow you to sit or cross your legs with ease, we also wanted to avoid too much height that would cause your pant leg to continually get caught at your calf. 
The Lasso Sock is only as high as the bottom of your calf, so it provides you with the perfect amount of coverage. Then we add the lasso, stretching up to secure the sock above your calf, preventing any unwanted catching at your pant leg.

Designed with a breathable, mercerized cotton that’s thicker and stronger than ordinary socks, as well as a reinforced toe area that supports your feet, you’ll be comfortable all day long.

Our construction and design choices produced the softest, silkiest, and most durable sock you will find on the market. Forget the discomfort of continually pulling your sock up, sacrificing blood flow from an increase in elastic or even that annoying rolled seam most often found lurking at the toe. 

The 22 unique designs are perfect for any occasion, whether for business, casual or a weekend getaway. Behold, we have solved all of your sock struggles with the Lasso Sock from Sebastien Grey. You’re welcome! 

 

 






 

Our Story
We are in the business of listening. We not only take pride in listening to our clients and delivering the suit and the quality they are looking for, but we hear them when they express their daily struggles with different aspects of their wardrobe. Sebastien Grey has evolved into the company it has because we take these everyday problems and find solutions for them. The lasso sock is only one of many innovative designs we have constructed to help eliminate the seemingly insignificant, yet quite bothersome problems of our daily sartorial struggles. You undoubtedly have more important issues to address than whether or not your socks have gathered at your ankles again.

story:
What is Viva La Vix:

"Where Ambition meets your inner vixen."

Viva La Vix is a lifstyle brand offering custom t-shirts and other apparel.  Our line appeals to the college community and our message is one of self-empowerment with a sexy edge.

Who I am:

I'm a 20 year old college junior, currently studying fashion merchandising in Atlanta, Georgia with plans of continuing on to law school, specializing in Fashion Law.  I graduated from a performing arts high school where I majored in visual arts.  I create all the graphics and designs myself for Viva La Vix. Graphics are pressed onto garments using commercial heat transfer materials and processes.

Why you should help fund my project:

Social media and reality tv attempt to sell a message to young people that you can either be sexy and fun or studious, responsible and boring.  Our message is that the sweet spot is somewhere in between.  Our graphics send a message that being smart, responsible and goal oriented is what is really sexy. 
 
The money raised from this campaign will go to upgrade my equipment, including a new printer and commercial cutting machine for the transfers

Other Ways You Can Help

Viva La Vix is a movement.  We invite you to share this project everywhere you can and to use the hashtag #vivalavix

story:
THE SCARF CAMPAIGN IS NOW OVER. 

If you did not get an opportunity to purchase your scarf, we will have them available at Sailor Soccer Home Soccer Games throughout the spring.

If you are still interested in purchasing a Scarf, please email Coach Barnett - atd@steamboat-soccer.com for your options.




2014 SSHS Supporters Scarf

For the upcoming Women's Spring Soccer Season, The Steamboat Springs High School (SSHS) Women's Soccer team is creating the 2014 SSHS Sailor Soccer Supporter Scarves. The scarves are  designed to be used for all Sailor Sports and to be a great addition to any Sailor Supporter's fandom.

PRE-SALE SPECIAL ONLY $20 through Feb 15th. Price at home soccer games will be $25.  

  

Why Support Scarves? Supporter Scarves are not just any old scarf, they are the embodiment of our team support in Cold Weather. No need to take off that Warm Jacket to show your team spirit, just raise that Scarf over your head! Yes these are for both men and women! 

Following in the traditions of the great Soccer Teams Around the world we want to help our supporters show their team spirit.

"Team scarves first appeared in Britain in the early 1900s. They were designed to allow fans to stay warm in the winter without sacrificing their team spirit. The original soccer scarves were striped, alternating the team’s colors. This style is still the most popular in the UK and Australia. Then came the addition of the club crest and team name, followed by scarves decorated with team slogans and pictures of popular players. Now the possibilities are endless." - http://www.scarves.net/blog/soccer-scarves-the-ultimate-accessory

Team Scarves are a soccer supporter phenomena, that provide a cultural link to the bigger game that is Football to the rest of the world. My Hope is to be able to introduce these scarves to the women's game, as a fundraiser for Soccer and The Booster Club. 

Delivery Timeline: 

1) Pre-Sale - Begins 1/28/2014 through Feb 15th, 2014
2) Scarf Design and Booster Club Approval (Approved 2/5!)
3) Place Order for Scarves based on Pre-sales -(FINISHED 2-15)!
4) Order Fulfillment by supplier 3-4 Weeks from Order date.
5) Goal is to have scarves for the First Home Game on March 8th, 2014 vs Battle Mountain. 

Scarves will be hand delivered, to orders from Steamboat, by our players! 

Follow us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/SSHSSoccer

Videos with soccer scarf Culture at the Pro Level: 

Seattle Sounders- Scarves up!: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XH2tyE6dPWk
Arkansas Razorbacks Scarves Photo Shoot: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XtiAJN1BGDQ
Portland Timbers Fan Exeriance: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iZZVmEzki2U
Timbers Army: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bPzXhfB74pQ
Drew Carey loves his Scarf: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Tbo-C9MgNQo

For further reading on Soccer (football) Scarves place in soccer culture: 

http://www.fangcan.com/index.php?read-199.html
http://www.prweb.com/releases/soccer/scarves/prweb962154.htm
http://www.ruffneckscarves.com/what-do-soccer-scarves-say-about-soccer-team
http://www.ruffneckscarves.com/history-soccer-scarves-0

QUESTIONS?

Be sure to message us and Coach Barnett will get back to you with any questions you may have!

story:
While I love a beautiful piece of jewelry as much as the next person, I particularly love to make pieces that have something unexpected - a secret message, a hidden function, a crazy puzzle, a childhood game - some little bit of magic that makes it extra special.

  

Since 2010, I've been making jewelry that does exactly that.  StoryWare is jewelry that always has a story: sometimes it sends a message in Morse Code, sometimes it's a simple childhood game, or a way for friends to have their own secret code.  Sometimes they teach or remind of fundamental principles (love for nature, politeness, pattern recognition, memory development, and so on) - and sometimes they're just plain fun. I make pieces for women, men, girls, and boys - and I'm always looking for new ways to put happiness, inspiration, fairy tales, learning, and fun into a wearable form.  Every single piece of StoryWare jewelry is handmade by me!

 

Until now, StoryWare has been an online-only business, an Etsy shop.  It's been a great business, but the down side of an online-only shop is that I miss having real face-to face interactions with people, especially when they "meet" the jewelry.  However,  I recently moved from Santa Fe, New Mexico, to Eugene, Oregon, and now that I live in a much more populated area, I'm looking forward to adding a physical presence for StoryWare.

  

That's where this campaign comes in...

With this campaign, I'm raising the money to take StoryWare on the road this summer.  I'm going to be at craft shows, toy stores, and gift shops all up and down the West Coast, sharing the love. I'm also going to be working on getting the word out on projects that are coming down the pipe, including the Storyteller's Charm bracelets (a storytelling game), Sixes (sets of six matching not identical earrings), and many more.  While I fully expect that the expedition will ultimately pay for itself, it takes a little push at the beginning to get it started!

 

And – guess what – for helping me to do this, you'll get StoryWare jewelry at really great discounts. Isn’t it great when everybody wins?

And that’s about it!  I so much appreciate your taking the time to learn about StoryWare, and I look forward to sharing the fun with you!

Take care, and always keep your eyes open for the magic –

Heidi

PS Don't forget to check out the Gallery section of the campaign!

story:
This brand has been dreamt about for years. Started by artist Ellis Cruz, 19 and recently partnered Tayshaun Bailey, 20. Based in the wonderful land of NYC, we are designing the trends of tomorrow. As locals to the city, we know trends, it's in our DNA. Now we're ready to bring something new to the industry.

As a start-up company, the name of the brand is still under-wraps until we get the trademark (which is why we need you!) Not only will our contributors help us launch the brand legally, but also ensure our sample designs get executed at a high quality level.

The brand will consist of Street Wear, 90's Ghetto Fab, and hints of High End fashions combined to make a line like no other.

HELP US HELP YOU...FASHIONABLY!

To get started, there are some mandatory steps we must take in order to produce fashionable, creative garments for our consumers. This is why we have our goal set  for $7,500. Here's the breakdown:

  • $500- To ensure legitimacy and for originality for our brand name a trademark will be bought with this money.
  • $7,000 will be put to purchasing fabrics and materials (pricey job in New York!), as well as towards the production of a small sample collection.
  • Any extra funds will be graciously accepted and put directly into finding the proper manufacturer to send our samples to and create our stock!!!
If our goal is not met (yikes!) then the smallest amount will go to the biggest step. Trademarking our name! That's our top priority, and we'll keep comin' back for the rest! Never give up.

THE IMPACT

"I've always wanted to be a stylist. Over the years of observing styles, I decided to design my own clothing line. The goal I have for my brand is bring to life my vision of fashion. Customers will be inspired to be different, and break away from generic trends." -Ellis Cruz 

THE RISK

Contributors' money is at a 0% risk. The funds will go directly into buying a trademark and fabrics to produce garments that are one of a kind. 

OTHER WAYS TO HELP

If you cannot make any monetary contributions, we'd love support! Talk about us to your contacts. Word of mouth is powerful...and FREE! 

P.S. - Use the Indiegogo share tools as well!

story:
A revolution in the way you buy your shirts, perfectly fitting shirts every time, designed exactly how you want them - delivered directly to your door worldwide.

With your help we aim to start a revolution in the clothing industry, making you the designer of your own clothes. Initially starting with shirts, then in the future moving on to other things such as shoes, jeans, jackets and more. No more will you have to choose your clothes from the select offered at the whim of distant designers - now your are the designer of your own shirts.

Our Story

While working on a contract in Shanghai a few years ago, Matt discovered the convenience and luxury of buying tailor made shirts from the comfort of his living room. He would choose the fabric and his personal tailor would make the shirt by either copying an existing shirt, or taking his body measurements. As this was such a simple process, with only the most basic of information required, Matt thought this would be a great idea for an online business.

To be able to choose your own fabrics, customize your collars and cuffs, and to see it evolve in 3D as you go, seemed like such a fun way to go customized shopping – and all from the convenience of the home or office. Back home in Europe, Matt met Chris - entrepreneur, author, and online marketing specialist - at a birthday party in 2011. They hit it off straight away and a few hours and a few beers later, were talking about the possibilities and potential of this business idea. 4 months later on a hot summer night – the name My Own Shirts was born - and it literally, does what it says on the tin.

The Team

Chris, being the expert in e-commerce and online marketing was able to source the web developers and get the framework of the business set up immediately. In parallel to this, Matt worked on setting up the operations of the business, sourcing fabrics, tailors, accessories and shipping. All of which is now in place and ready to go.


Matt & Chris - The Team

The Concept

By using our user friendly step-by-step design platform you get to be the creator of your own shirts. Choose from a range of the finest fabrics, select the collar and cuff you desire, maybe a contrast collar or cuff in a different fabric, pockets, epaulettes and even bottom cut. Select the exact style you want, then enter your measurements and we do rest. Every shirt is individually cut and sewn together by tailors dedicated to shirt production.

The Product

The product is both simple and yet something that has traditionally been out of the reach of most people, tailor-made, custom designed, made-to-measure shirts.

With MyOwnShirts, you choose the fabrics, you choose the style, you enter your exact measurements, then we make it for you and deliver it directly to your door, anywhere in the world.

You decide… you are the designer!



Hundreds of fabrics to choose from


Designed exactly the way you want it!


Every order is individually processed


Every shirt is individually hand made to your size


Shirts for both men and women to your design


With hundreds of fabrics the choice become endless

Delivery

All perks include free shipping with DHL. 

What We Need & What You Get

We have already spent over $30,000 of our own money on the website and fabrics for shirt samples and photos. If we hit our first goal of $30,000, we can buy our first 100 fabrics, but of course the more fabrics we have the more creative you can be. $45,000 will give you 150 fabrics to choose from, and $60,000 will give you 200.

The website is ready to launch, the workshop is ready to take your orders, now all we need is the first run of fabrics and you will have the shirts you design, made to fit you exactly. There is nothing quite like wearing your own shirt, designed by you and hand made to fit you perfectly.

If for any reason we achieve less than the $30,000 initial target, then we will launch with 90 limited edition fabrics that we have plus 10 more fabrics for each $3,000 we raise. So regardless of the outcome you will have the opportunity to enjoy your own shirts from MyOwnShirts.


The Production Manager is Turgut with over 35 years experience of making shirts


Attention to detail

Risks and challenges

At this time all the risks have already been overcome. There were risks that we could not get the technology right, but after 2 years of concerted hard work, that has been resolved. There was a risk that we could not get the right people on-board to make the shirts, but with the recruitment of Turgut as Production Manager we have someone with over 35 years of experience in the shirt manufacturing industry overseeing the process. We have all the elements in place. All we need now are the fabrics and the initial orders and the company will be up and running within 2 months (it takes that long to convert fabric scans for up to 300 fabrics into 3D modelling for the website).

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help:

  • Help us to get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that’s all there is to it.

Special Opportunity To Go Even Further

We have put together a system to create custom designed shirts that is totally integrated from the website through to delivery, with every step of the process completely systematized.

Our aim, in time, is to offer this service to other entrepreneurs who have the foresight to see that this type of custom fit, custom design is the way of the future. We have set up this system so that we can offer individually branded versions of this business to others so that they can fully benefit from this revolution and the gold-rush that is coming.

The Internet is changing everything and now is the time to benefit from these changes, while the field is still open to all. If this is something that you want to get onboard with while the market is still wide open then we have a special opportunity open to just a few people.

But this is not for everyone - you have to really want to change your future. With this business all the hard work has been done for you - the website, the 3D shirt design system, the workshop, the order processing and fulfilment, even the door-to-door delivery. All you need to do is tell people about the opportunity - and we even show you exactly how to do that!

This is an opportunity that we will be opening up to specially invited others in the future for a price of $15,000, but for now we are providing this opportunity of a global business to just 20 individuals across the world.

With this perk open to just 20 people you will have to get a wriggle on to claim it - don't wait until the market has been taken by someone else. So do what all super-successful entrepreneurs do when they encounter a great opportunity: Grab it now, before it disappears.

Once we go live the opportunity to get your own ready-made business-in-a-box will cost you double the offer we have for you right now. For just 20 people we are offering this perk for a pledge of $7,500 - and that includes all hosting fees for an entire year. Plus on top of that we will also provide you with our 7-point marketing plan that will help you catapult your success.

So what you will get. You will get a website fully integrated with our production facilities. All the card processing and order handling completely managed for you. You will receive 40% commission on all your sales (less any discounts you offer). You will receive a marketing plan and ongoing marketing support.

We know that this is the future for clothes shopping, and we want a select group of people to get onboard with this opportunity now, so that we can drive the business forward at super speed. If this is for you then we look forward to working closely with you to help you realise super success.

Risks and challenges
At this time all the risks have already been overcome. There were risks that we could not get the technology right, but after 2 years of concerted hard work, that has been resolved. There was a risk that we could not get the right people on-board to make the shirts, but with the recruitment of Turgut as Production Manager we have someone with over 35 years of experience in the shirt manufacturing industry overseeing the process. We have all the elements in place. All we need now are the fabrics and the initial orders and the company will be up and running within 2 months (it takes that long to convert fabric scans for up to 300 fabrics into 3D modelling for the website).
Other Ways You Can HelpSome people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help:
Help us to get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
Use the Indiegogo share tools!
And that’s all there is to it.Special Opportunity To Go Even FurtherWe have put together a system to create custom designed shirts that is totally integrated from the website through to delivery, with every step of the process completely systematized.Our aim, in time, is to offer this service to other entrepreneurs who have the foresight to see that this type of custom fit, custom design is the way of the future. We have set up this system so that we can offer individually branded versions of this business to others so that they can fully benefit from this revolution and the gold-rush that is coming.The Internet is changing everything and now is the time to benefit from these changes, while the field is still open to all. If this is something that you want to get onboard with while the market is still wide open then we have a special opportunity open to just a few people.But this is not for everyone - you have to really want to change your future. With this business all the hard work has been done for you - the website, the 3D shirt design system, the workshop, the order processing and fulfilment, even the door-to-door delivery. All you need to do is tell people about the opportunity - and we even show you exactly how to do that!This is an opportunity that we will be opening up to specially invited others in the future for a price of $15,000, but for now we are providing this opportunity of a global business to just 20 individuals across the world.With this perk open to just 20 people you will have to get a wriggle on to claim it - don't wait until the market has been taken by someone else. So do what all super-successful entrepreneurs do when they encounter a great opportunity: Grab it now, before it disappears.Once we go live the opportunity to get your own ready-made business-in-a-box will cost you double the offer we have for you right now. For just 20 people we are offering this perk for a pledge of $7,500 - and that includes all hosting fees for an entire year. Plus on top of that we will also provide you with our 7-point marketing plan that will help you catapult your success.So what you will get. You will get a website fully integrated with our production facilities. All the card processing and order handling completely managed for you. You will receive 40% commission on all your sales (less any discounts you offer). You will receive a marketing plan and ongoing marketing support.We know that this is the future for clothes shopping, and we want a select group of people to get onboard with this opportunity now, so that we can drive the business forward at super speed. If this is for you then we look forward to working closely with you to help you realise super success.

story:
Texte en
FRANCAIS
Cliquez ici


"No act of kindness -no matter how small- is ever wasted."
- Ésope.

KANAHA is born from the fusion of Nature and Sport.




About us,

Founding Director

My name is Jean-Charles FISCHER and I am the Founding Director of KANAHA.

I have drawn from my passion of extreme sports and my expertise in graphic design to create KANAHA, a new line of clothing mixing sharp design, sport and organic/ethical lifestyles.


KANAHA : The Company

KANAHA was created in 2013 in the South-Eastern corner of France, where the high peaks of the Alps meet the waves of the Mediterranean Sea. These stunning landscapes inspired me to create an authentic fashion line dedicated to extreme sports and organic lifestyles. KANAHA aims to perfect and broaden the existing market by developing a line of clothing that is:

 1. Ecologically aware by using products from the organic industry.

2. Financially ethical by redistributing part of the profits to NGOs.



We favour production methods that are environmentally friendly and respectful of People. That is why we choose high quality eco-certified textiles and accessories. KANAHA gives you the opportunity to state your ethical awareness in everyday life and to act on the world around you.

THE GUARANTEE OF ENGAGEMENT

The textiles we use promote the values of KANAHA: environmental and ethical awareness. All our clothes are made of organic cotton, carefully selected and quality-certified. We want what is best for the Planet and best for our customers, therefore all our products are certified at the highest standards: GOTS, OE 100, OE Blended, OEKO TEX, Reach.

Our products are comfortable, elegant, ethical and definitely trendy!

AN OVERALL APPROACH

Our partner is a leader and the pioneer of the ethical & organic clothing market in France. Environmentally friendly and ethical products should be made available to as many people as possible. All together, we can positively impact the world around us, and this is what we strive for.

100% EUROPEAN DESIGN

We are constantly looking to increase the ethicality of our supply chain, notably by working solely with local suppliers. To limit our impact on the environment, manufacturing and quality control occur in the same location. All our textiles are chosen for their style, their quality and their potential for the printing of our designs.



T-shirts and sunglasses can be pre-ordered (see on the right).


TEE SHIRT KANAHA

Model Design "CENTRE"


   

  Model Design "BAS"


Each design exists in version Central or Low T-shirt / Men and Women.


ACCESSORIES

SUNGLASSES KANAHA

Polarising glasses / UV400 / Index 3 / Handmade &Eco Friendly

All our sunglasses come with a protective case made of 100% bamboo and a microfiber cloth


HYBRID SERIES




100% BAMBOO SERIE






You can already have a peek at our new limited edition of designs. Each design is limited to 30 prints (60cmx80cm), signed by the artist.
Each print is sold unframed.



WHAT WILL WE DO WITH YOUR DONATIONS :

-  Manufacturing of T-shirts / stickers / posters
-  Eco Packaging
-  Photo-shoots
-  Marketing
-  Website

With your generous help, we will make sure that KANAHA develops into a brand known for its quality and its ethic.

Current projects

Once KANAHA becomes profitable, we will:

  • realization series SeaWorld et Earth of the World

  • % of the benefits from the collections SeaWorld and Earth of the World will go to conservation NGO’s.

  • Develop summer – winter collections, 100% organic and 100% recycled.

  • Series sunglasses  100% bambou and wood

  • Development of a communication strategy for increased global exposure

  • Making of a promotional video to be distributed on social media.

  • Creation of a larger portfolio of designs for truly original T-shirts


THANK YOU !!!

A massive THANK YOU to all our friends from across the world, the old ones and the new ones!
We count on you to support us and to promote KANAHA all around you !


Here is our first little present to you all: a SeaWorld collection screensaver…


Click here


All your questions, suggestions and comments:

Your feedback is really important for us to develop top quality products and provide a top quality services.

Partnership, orders and distributors:

Don’t hesitate to contact us: service.marketing@kanaha.fr

story:
My name is Tiffany Headley and I am the founder of the Haus of Donna Faye. I am currently going to school for fashion at the University of  Nebraska at Lincoln and if I am not studying fashion I am making it.  I named the company 'Donna Faye' after my grandmother who passed away when I was 8.  After my mother realized that I wasn't going to be in anything other than fashion she told me how her mother wanted to be a designer herself, so I thought how perfect would it be to name my line in memory of her.  My goal is to start the Midwest's first fashion house and name.  The center of the country is such a prime to bridge the gap between the East and West coast fashions.  Although this is a long term goal and will take way more than $1,000 to do, I need to continue growing my name and hype for it until I reach that point.  I am returning to the RAW Artist Organization (www.rawartists.org) for a show  on December 11th.  Last November I took home the title of Fashion Designer of the Year.  But because I am back in school funds are tough to come by this time around so I need a little community support!  The ultimate goal of $1,000 will cover the basics of putting on this show.  That includes fabric for the clothes, supplies for accessories, payment to makeup and hair artists, compensation for the models and any other last minute details that are always forgotten.  With any amount contributed you will be helping HDF get one step closer in turning their dream into a reality.  You will be supporting local fashion therefore boosting your local economy, and who doesn't love doing that!?


Please watch my video from a previous RAW show to learn a little more about me and my line!
In the words of Coco Chanel, "I don't do fashion, I am fashion."
