story:
All the way from around the world. This isn't merely a statement.

This is what Mareverve stands for, exporting the traditional textiles of local ethnic communities around the world to promote their culture and enable them to pursue a better future. At Mareverve, we call this, 'sustainable economic empowerment'!

In fact, in our fast paced developing world, old traditions are often discarded without much reflection on the cultural loss. We are well aware of the progressively globalised way of living, and we aim to take a stand for what is unique, local and deeply engraved in the lives of those who uphold their cultural heritage.


                

             

Our products are developed through a combination of ethnic craftsmanship and aesthetic creativity. Blending our ideas with local traditions we have set ourselves to re-invent the classic Spanish espadrille according to our conception of dressing: ‘Yet, with a touch of difference’.

Uniting patterns sewn by the expert weavers of communities in South America and South East Asia, together with the workmanship of shoemakers from the region of la Rioja, in Spain, we now present it with a new essence, mixtures of colors and designs!


      



It is through the caring work of local artisans, experts in this ultra centenary tradition, that our products achieve the highest standards of quality and durability. While being easy, creative and fun, they are brought together with fine and sustainable materials, our exceptional cottons fabrics, sewn on a natural jute sole.

                                 

              


Invest in us and get your first pair of Mareverve espadrilles at our SPECIAL INDIEGOGO PRICE!!!



     

                                                  

                                                      

The colors:

  • Shades of blue: Denim blue, Sky blue, Violet blue
  • Shades of brown: Beige, Dark brown
  • Shades of green: Light green, Military green
  • Shades of red: Tomato Red, Boston red, Chrome yellow 

                                                       


The colors: Denim blue, Navy blue, Boston red, Miltary green


                                                              


     


     

                                                    

                                                    

                                  

                                                                                                                    


                                                            


                                      


                                                 

                    

                 


                                         


                      

                                              


                                                 


                                             

The colors:

  • Shades of blue: Cobalt blue, Denim blue
  • Shades of brown: Beige, Camel, Dark brown
  • Shades of green: Light green, Military green
  • Shades of red: Tomato Red, Burgundy red, Plum red, Dark orange, Pink

  • Check out our shoes in more detail on the Mareverve website!

    N.B: DON'T WORRY ABOUT SIZE & COLOR RIGHT NOW!

    Right now, you ONLY need to submit your pledge for a certain 'Perks' category. When our Indiegogo campaign ends on March 23rd, we will send you a QUESTIONNAIRE asking which sizes, colors and designs you would like to receive!


                    


                                            

                                                  


    No worries! If you were to have any sizing issues, we will be super happy to exchange your espadrille for a better size!

  •    

    In following our dream, we realised that we could extend our production range and bring to life more unique items with the same hand woven fabrics, objective and style. Below are our Mareverve backpacks, handmade by local artisans in Northern Thailand. Choose from our three designs!!!    


                                

                                      

    1. Authentic: Our espadrilles are 100% handcrafted by local artisans in Spain, experts in the millennial art of espadrille making.

    2. Ethnic traditions: The espadrilles from our ‘Ethnic Pattern Line’ are made with authentic ethnic textiles sourced directly from Argentina, Guatemala, India and Thailand where they are hand woven by local artisans.  

    3. Ethics, Social responsibility and fair trade: Mareverve is about sustainable economic empowerment. We channel our business objectives into activities that are of help to others, supporting local communities and those activities that are part of their cultural heritage. We appreciate and uphold fair trade standards and make sure that the process through which our espadrilles are made invariably affects those who contribute to it in a positive way.

    4. 100% sustainably manufactured, eco-friendly and vegan: a world filled with so many alternative sustainable materials, why use animal products? All of your shoes 100% sustainable. They are fully assembled with organic components: lovely hand woven cottons, textiles and natural jute. This results in a resistant, fresh, super comfortable and mostly importantly eco-friendly product!

    5. Creative, fun and easy to wear? That's for sure! Try them out!



                            

    We've already invested our own savings and efforts in developing the Mareverve concept and establishing the foundations for the dream to come to life. Right now, we really need your full support to make it a reality! 

    Firstly, your contributions will be devoted to buying the needed materials, launching the production, and finally to shipping all the shoes to you! 

    Secondly, your investment will help us finance our search for new unique designs and patterns, as well as the development of more Mareverve shoes models for you to enjoy! Doing so, will allow us to pursue our goal of supporting the work of local artisans and protecting and promoting those artistic activities that are representative of their cultural heritage.  


     

  •                                        

    Emilio and Pietro

    Standing for traditions, quality and social responsibility, we appreciate, and are fully dedicated to the value of independence. This is why we, the Mareverve, are determined and looking forwards to pursuing our dream freely and in accordance with our ethos. We so approached you, the Indiegogo community, to seek help in doing so!

    Support our pledge and dream and get your first pairs of Mareverve shoes!!!

    We really hope that you will be won over by the beauty and diversity that our products allude to. 

    Any time, any place, any occasion! 

     

                                           

               

                                     


                                     

                                                     Facebook                     Instagram

                                                                     

                                

                                   

    1) 1st of April: Mareverve's Indiegogo campaign ends and production is launched!!!

    2) Week commencing April 28th: Mareverve shoes are made, packed and shipped!

    3) 4th - 15th May: You get your Mareverve shoes!!!  

               

                                                


    We’ve spent the last 8 months working on our espadrilles, making sure we had the right materials and a rock-solid production system. We have progressively perfected our work, and since making our Indiegogo pledge video, we have brought to life the ultimate design for our shoes. These are the ones you will be getting! We have wear-tested them and after fantastic feedback, are confident of having created some of the best espadrilles around!!! 

    The combination of quality with the creativity and style of our textiles, really makes Mareverve shoes unique. We have taken great care in finding expert weavers and artisans to trust in launching the production of our products. However, we could encounter unexpected challenges in the process. To avoid this, we are in weekly contact with our shippers and manufacturers who are proving their ability to produce large quantities without compromising quality. Moreover, our relationships with them are excellent!

    We will be fully transparent and continually update our backers on the production progress, making sure that they receive their order as quickly as possible! We really do not expect to have issues with meeting our delivery date and you should get your Mareverve espadrilles in the promised time frame! In the event of missing products, full refunds or replacements will be offered.

    In doubt upon the size?? No worries! When unsure which to choose between two sizes, we recommend choosing the smaller of the two, as our espadrilles come to fit your foot perfectly with use. Nonetheless If you were to have any sizing issues, we will be super happy to exchange your espadrille for a better size!

    Much Love!


  • HOW DO I CHOOSE SIZE AND COLOR?

  • RIGHT NOW, you only need to submit your pledge for a certain 'Perks' category. When our Indiegogo campaign ends on March 23rd, we will s
    • end you a questionnaire asking which sizes, colors and designs you would like to receive!
  • DO I PAY FOR SHIPMENT?
  • Depends! We will send you your pair of Mareverve shoes wherever you are in the world! Shipment if free for orders in the EU and will cost £9 for orders outside the EU.
  • HOW DO I PAY FOR SHIPMENT?
    • If you order your pair from outside the EU there will be a £9 shipment costs fee. To pay for it, just add an additional £9 to your contribution amount when submitting your order. 
  • CAN I BUY MAREVERVE SHOES AFTER THE CAMPAIGN ENDS?
  • Yes! When our Indiegogo campaign is over you will be able to buy your Mareverve shoes on our online shopping site!

In following our dream, we realised that we could extend our production range and bring to life more unique items with the same hand woven fabrics, objective and style. Below are our Mareverve backpacks, handmade by local artisans in Northern Thailand. Choose from our three designs!!!    




                            
                                  

1. Authentic: Our espadrilles are 100% handcrafted by local artisans in Spain, experts in the millennial art of espadrille making.
2. Ethnic traditions: The espadrilles from our ‘Ethnic Pattern Line’ are made with authentic ethnic textiles sourced directly from Argentina, Guatemala, India and Thailand where they are hand woven by local artisans.  
3. Ethics, Social responsibility and fair trade: Mareverve is about sustainable economic empowerment. We channel our business objectives into activities that are of help to others, supporting local communities and those activities that are part of their cultural heritage. We appreciate and uphold fair trade standards and make sure that the process through which our espadrilles are made invariably affects those who contribute to it in a positive way.
4. 100% sustainably manufactured, eco-friendly and vegan: a world filled with so many alternative sustainable materials, why use animal products? All of your shoes 100% sustainable. They are fully assembled with organic components: lovely hand woven cottons, textiles and natural jute. This results in a resistant, fresh, super comfortable and mostly importantly eco-friendly product!
5. Creative, fun and easy to wear? That's for sure! Try them out!






                        

We've already invested our own savings and efforts in developing the Mareverve concept and establishing the foundations for the dream to come to life. Right now, we really need your full support to make it a reality! 
Firstly, your contributions will be devoted to buying the needed materials, launching the production, and finally to shipping all the shoes to you! 
Secondly, your investment will help us finance our search for new unique designs and patterns, as well as the development of more Mareverve shoes models for you to enjoy! Doing so, will allow us to pursue our goal of supporting the work of local artisans and protecting and promoting those artistic activities that are representative of their cultural heritage.  

 


                                       

Emilio and Pietro
Standing for traditions, quality and social responsibility, we appreciate, and are fully dedicated to the value of independence. This is why we, the Mareverve, are determined and looking forwards to pursuing our dream freely and in accordance with our ethos. We so approached you, the Indiegogo community, to seek help in doing so!
Support our pledge and dream and get your first pairs of Mareverve shoes!!!
We really hope that you will be won over by the beauty and diversity that our products allude to. 
Any time, any place, any occasion! 

 


                                       
           
                                 

                                  
                                                 Facebook                     Instagram
                                                                 
                            
                                

1) 1st of April: Mareverve's Indiegogo campaign ends and production is launched!!!
2) Week commencing April 28th: Mareverve shoes are made, packed and shipped!
3) 4th - 15th May: You get your Mareverve shoes!!!             
                                            




We’ve spent the last 8 months working on our espadrilles, making sure we had the right materials and a rock-solid production system. We have progressively perfected our work, and since making our Indiegogo pledge video, we have brought to life the ultimate design for our shoes. These are the ones you will be getting! We have wear-tested them and after fantastic feedback, are confident of having created some of the best espadrilles around!!! 
The combination of quality with the creativity and style of our textiles, really makes Mareverve shoes unique. We have taken great care in finding expert weavers and artisans to trust in launching the production of our products. However, we could encounter unexpected challenges in the process. To avoid this, we are in weekly contact with our shippers and manufacturers who are proving their ability to produce large quantities without compromising quality. Moreover, our relationships with them are excellent!
We will be fully transparent and continually update our backers on the production progress, making sure that they receive their order as quickly as possible! We really do not expect to have issues with meeting our delivery date and you should get your Mareverve espadrilles in the promised time frame! In the event of missing products, full refunds or replacements will be offered.
In doubt upon the size?? No worries! When unsure which to choose between two sizes, we recommend choosing the smaller of the two, as our espadrilles come to fit your foot perfectly with use. Nonetheless If you were to have any sizing issues, we will be super happy to exchange your espadrille for a better size!
Much Love!



HOW DO I CHOOSE SIZE AND COLOR?


RIGHT NOW, you only need to submit your pledge for a certain 'Perks' category. When our Indiegogo campaign ends on March 23rd, we will send you a questionnaire asking which sizes, colors and designs you would like to receive!
DO I PAY FOR SHIPMENT?
Depends! We will send you your pair of Mareverve shoes wherever you are in the world! Shipment if free for orders in the EU and will cost £9 for orders outside the EU.

HOW DO I PAY FOR SHIPMENT?

If you order your pair from outside the EU there will be a £9 shipment costs fee. To pay for it, just add an additional £9 to your contribution amount when submitting your order. 

CAN I BUY MAREVERVE SHOES AFTER THE CAMPAIGN ENDS?
Yes! When our Indiegogo campaign is over you will be able to buy your Mareverve shoes on our online shopping site!

story:
I am Lina Egle Urbonaite, self employed artist & designer from Lithuania. I worked more then 10 years in few companies not related with art, learned a lot and got valuable experience, but always felt that I am not “in my plate”(we say so in Lithuania). 3 years ago I tried painting on silk by hand and the changes begin. In art and design I feel the most passionate, work most effective, express myself and  discover all my potential.

What & Why I create:

I create hand painted silk scarves and other accessories with positive encoded meaning. Everything around us  is energy. It is only our choice, what kind of energy we choose to be surrounded.

I create wearable art that:

- radiates, vibrates harmonic aspects,

- give you positive experience,

- keep your mood and well-being at high energetic level.

 I use color pallet of nature beauty, different symbols and objects with proven through the ages mystical energetic meaning, different positive affirmations, that help positive transformation to appear.

With My accessories I say “ Smile more & Stay unique“ . And it is part of my mission.


With this campaign I inviting you to become part of my mission - help me put more smiles on women faces  and help them express their uniqueness, improve outfit & confidence.

Everyone will agree, that to feel good & smile is much easier when you are nicely dressed.

Pick your favorite design hand painted silk scarf and look original and a bit different everyday.

Together we can do more.

Hand painted silk scarf – a little accessory that could change all your outfit look.


HOW HAND PAINTED SILK SCARF IS CREATED:


In this campaign I offer unique 100% hand painted silk scarves, some of them are one of a kind, some limited edition.

Also you may grab gift coupon to spend at my website www.artgifts-shop.com(valid for next 7 month till 2014 December 15) or make a unique gift for someone close.

Scarves edition explanation:

One of a kind artwork ->The same design will be created max 20 peaces  lifetime

Limited edition hand made artwork ->The same design will be created max 100 peaces lifetime

Hand made artwork -> The design edition is not limited, but because of the 100% hand work and technique specific, every peace will be unique in some way.

Every scarf with one of a kind and limited edition status will have it’s own unique number.

All scarves will be carefully hand painted by me.


What ELSE you will get:

 With your chosen perk you will receive 10% discount code for your next purchase on L GIFTS e-shop (www.artgifs-shop.com). The code will be shipped to you when your perk will be ready.

AND

Customize your hand painted silk scarf

Add + 25 Eur to your perk and customize your scarf: choose your favorite affirmation & I will put it on your scarf.

10 most powerful affirmation:

1.  I live my dreams and take risks

2. Forgiveness is a key to happiness

3. I am thankful for all that I have in my life

4. My life is abundant and filled with joy

5. I am perfect, exactly as I am

6. I relax and enjoy life

7. Each day is a gift

8. Always remember who you are

9. Dream the impossible – Seek the unknown – Achieve greatness

10. Happiness is within me


(see top right of page for what you can buy!)

All PERKS will be created and shipped during June-July-August (if not mentioned otherwise)

Hand painted silk scarves are main rewards you can invest in:

*************************************************************************

PERK: 15 Eur  Button + book marker

With Message "Smile more & Stay unique". It will be designed while running this campaign. Free shipping worldwide. +10% discount code for your next purchase on L Gifts e-shop.

*************************************************************************

PERK: 30 EUR  Shibori silk scarf 55x55cm 

Scarf created in shibori techniques (D, E, F, G). Perfect gift for children or small accessory for your work outfit. Free shipping worldwide. 

*************************************************************************

PERK: 65 EUR - Hand painted silk scarf ARTWORK

Edition -hand made artwork.Please choose your favorite and write me a letter (H, J, K, L, M, or N).  Add +7 EUR shipping worldwide(via post services with registration).

*************************************************************************

PERK: 80 EUR Shibori silk scarf 

Size: 180x90cm Scarf created in shibori techniques (A, B, C). Silk chiffon. Add + 7 Eur to ship worldwide (via post services with registration) . 


*************************************************************************

PERK: 75 EUR Hand painted silk scarf 

Limited edition hand painted silk scarves (P, R, S, T, V, U, W, Z, Y). Add + 7 Eur to ship worldwide (via post services with registration).

*************************************************************************

PERK: 90 EUR Hand painted silk scarf 

One of a kind hand painted silk scarves (HORSE / DRAGON/ BUTTERFLY/ SNAKE). Add + 7 Eur to ship worldwide (via post services with registration). 

*************************************************************************

E-Gift coupons for www.artgifts-shop.com, which you may use on any item at checkout. E-Gift coupons are good toward anything on www.artgifts-shop.com

It is always a big pleasure to make & get a unique gift. E-Gift coupon will be valid for next 7 month.

If you would like to receive coupon gift card via post, please add +3 EUR and write the receiver's address.

PERK: 30 EUR GIFT COUPON "HI"

PERK : 70 EUR GIFT COUPON "THINKING"

PERK: 100 EUR GIFT COUPON "MISS YOU"

PERK: 300 EUR GIFT COUPON "LOVE YOU"

PERK: 500 EUR GIFT COUPON "ADORE YOU"

*************************************************************************

Offers for business owners: I will create original design scarves with your company logo. All details we will discuss (term:  August, September, October). 

PERK: 555 EUR Business set 5

PERK: 777 EUR Business set 7

PERK: 999 EUR Business set 10

  1. What makes L GIFTS scarves unique is that every peace is hand painted and because of the creating technique there is not even a remote possibility that the design could be repeated or replicated in 100% the same.
  2. I work with professional paints and use steam fixed method, that makes the silk scarf resistant timeless artwork.
  3. You purchase directly from the artist -> you support art
  4. With „L GIFTS” accessories You also say „YES“ for responsible life style, because I create  according orders, do not keep  big storage and their is no need to sell „some how“ surplus products.
  5. You become part of my mission „ Smile more and Stay unique“ and help me go forward and grow.
  6. Choosing  “ L GIFTS” you say: YES for quality, not quantity; YES for hand work and  Yes -> I am unique.

Your money and your donations are my independence, the only way that I can create freely.

Your Contributions:

-  will help me create more and more unique hand painted silk scarves,

-  will help me to grow, make smart expenses planning by ordering more materials under wholesale price, order lovely pack bags & labels.

-  will help me with work stream stability, that it is very important for me.


Some people just can’t contribute at the moment, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help:

Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about this campaign. SHARE

Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!


Remember, no contribution is too small!!

All donations will be greatly appreciated 

Contributions can be paid via PAYPAL using the following details:

Name: Lina Urbonaite
Email: sales@artgifts-shop.com

Any questions? Please drop me a line at uniquegifts@artgifts-shop.com

Thanks for your support and for checking out 

L GIFTS accessories!

Smile more & Stay unique!

story:
My name is Kristi Vosbeck and I am a fashion designer. 
I grew up in the small town of Sleepy Eye, Minnesota and had planned to go to law school, but my creative side just wouldn't allow it! I moved to New York in August 2006 to follow my heart and learn the art of fashion design! 

After graduating from Parsons and a succession of internships and jobs in the fashion industry I formed KRISTI VOSBECK LLC (March 2009) www.kristivosbeck.

Recently, I have been chosen to be 1 of 8 designers from candidates all over THE WORLD to showcase my designs in the Paris Fashion challenge!! http://paris.theemergingtrends.com

I have been working toward creating my brand and establishing a name for myself in this industry and I am certain that by showcasing my designs on the runways of Paris I will be able to move to the next level and further my goal to become a successful internationally known Fashion Designer!

 

                                        ABOUT THE COMPETITION:

8 INTERNATIONAL Designers compete for over $5,000, an opportunity to be a featured designer at the 2012 Boston Fashion Week - The Emerging Trends show or Cannes Loves Fashion in France, and a feature in a major European trade publication!! 

Media partners for this event include - Tell Us Fashion (UK),TFM World (Norway), Lucire (USA), Planet Fashion TV (USA), State of Style Channel TV (Sweden) and Hint Mag (USA) 

This is the opportunity of a lifetime, but the price of fame and fortune is not cheap!

 

                                            YOUR CONTRIBUTION:

Any contribution you can make is appreciated, whether it's spreading the word on facebook or twitter, or monetary, it means a lot to me!

YOUR CONTRIBUTION  goes towards putting on a Fashion Show in Paris!:


Show costs in detail:

-      Venue costs (Espace Saint- Martin, Paris France)

-       Lighting and sound system management and technician

-       Catwalk and rigging

-       Backstage equipment

-       Backstage dressers

-       Hair & make-up product and staff

-       Catering for models and staff

-       Event coordination, management and security

-       Models, model management in the lead up to and during 
        the show

-       Complete backstage management and support 

-       Rehearsal (including technical)

 -      Technical and logistical support 

-       Marketing and promotion to leading buyers and media in order to
         promote the event and the collection.

 

Not only will your contribution help get the KV brand out there, it gives you the opportunity to own your very own KRISTI VOSBECK dress, a pair of special earrings from India, or other great items -  the perks are here to thank you for your support :)

 

Help Kristi make her dreams come true and send KRISTI VOSBECK Designs to the runways of PARIS!!  

 

                                *****  CONTEST DETAILS *****

 

The participating designers will create brief fashion shows in order to best showcase their individual designs and artistic abilities. The designers will be responsible for the overall presentation and execution of their show to represent their couture collection. The show will be judged by five fashion industry gurus who will judge the designers based on creativity, practicality and ability to sustain the agile fashion market. The show will select 8 international designers who will compete in three rounds. They are:


  • Round 1 (Past Trends) - Each designer will showcase 2 designs that show classic trends.
  • Round 2 (Present Trends) - Designers will showcase 2 looks that demonstrate their understanding of the current trends.
  • Final Round (Future Trends) - Each designer will showcase 3 looks that show their understanding and knowledge of the future trends and the overall fashion industry. In this round the top three designers will first be picked and interviewed live by the judges and the winning designer will be announced. 
 
 Thank you for checking out my Indiegogo Campaign and for your support!!
 
 
Kristi Vosbeck

In this round the top three designers will first be picked and interviewed live by the judges and the winning designer will be announced. 


 
 Thank you for checking out my Indiegogo Campaign and for your support!!

 

 
Kristi Vosbeck

story:
I hope you enjoyed the video! I thought it would be a little bit more fun to watch than me sitting in front of a camera talking about my line! Here is more about the project! BE SURE AND READ DETAILS ABOUT THE PERKS AT THE BOTTOM OF THIS PAGE.

 

GOAL FOR THIS PROJECT

 

 

The first Two Samples or Prototypes of the Righteous Lover Brand Jeans Line.

PROTOTYPE 1 - MEN'S RELAXED STRAIGHT
PROTOTYPE 2 - WOMEN'S LOW-RISE TROUSER

A prototype is one of the first units manufactured of a product, which is tested so that the design can be changed if necessary before the product is manufactured commercially. Once designs and fabrics are chosen, a first sample of the jeans is created and then tried on a model to see what adjustments to the design need to be made. This also helps designers to narrow their choices of designs to offer for sale. After the final adjustments and selections have been made, samples of the article using the actual materials are sewn and produced. That is what this project is for.

 

THE RIGHTEOUS LOVER STORY

 

 

I came up with the idea of the Righteous Lover Brand Jeans line in March 2009. My main purpose is to create a denim line perfect for independent people who follow their own unique path in life and to help them express their individuality through the Righteous Lover brand. Righteous Lover will specialize in innovative finishes, detailed stitching, unique studs, buttons, and cool and unique accessories such as (wallet chain, mini-flask, etc.) Our price point will be $125-$350 and will be in the market with such brands as True Religion, Diesel, Evisu and my favorite brand Dsquared.

 

OUR TEAM

 

 

I am so lucky to be surrounded by a talented group of people who share my vision of what this line could be. Thinles Chosdup, Fashion Designer, will be consulting with me on every detail. Thinles was recently featured in Vogue India and was named as a GenNext emerging young designer. When it comes to thinking out-of-the box, this new age designer rules the roost. Thinles celebrates denim as it ought to be celebrated: Ingeniously and without restraint.

I will also be working with Don Valasquez at L.A. Garment Wash for the actual manufacturing of the prototypes. On the marketing side my team also includes Robert Lee of Methane Studios which has produced limited edition screen prints since 1998, and designed for such acts as Dave Matthews Band, Wilco, Kings of Leon, Eric Clapton, Sonic Youth and a hundred others. Robert Lee is also the designer of the Righteous Lover Logo.

 

 

FINDING BEAUTY IN IMPERFECTION

 

 "Pared down to its barest essence, Righteous Lover Denim is in the business of finding beauty in imperfection. It's simple, slow, and uncluttered-and it reveres authenticity above all. Righteous Lover Denim is flea markets, not warehouse stores; aged wood, not Pergo; rice paper, not glass. It celebrates cracks and crevices and all the other marks that time, weather, and loving use leave behind."

We will give special emphasis to creating innovative finishes and pay close attention to every detail. We will look at each pair of jeans we design and create each pair as a work of art and always have some cool accessory added to each pair of jeans whether it is a cool wallet chain, a hidden pocket, a mini-flask, a bottle opener, etc. 

 

 

COOL WITH A CONSCIOUS

 

YOUR CONTRIBUTION

BREAKDOWN OF COSTS:

Here is an exact breakdown of where the money is going:
  • Pattern Block Development: $315.00 EA (pattern adjustments costed as needed)
  • First Proto Sample: $140.00 + Fabric EA (Cut, Sew, Wash, Finish)
  • Additional Samples: $135.00 EA
  • Shrink Test: $30.00 EA Wash
  • Fabric Leg Wash Testing: $30.00 EA
  • Local Leather Patch Dev.: $200.00 per Design (includes sample)
  • Embroidery Setup (includes sample): $100.00 EA (up to 5,000 stitches)
  • Trim Development: We can source all trims directly with the factory (buttons, rivets, labels, hangtags, patches, etc.)
  • Production Tech Pack: 325.00 EA
  • Concept Sketch: $50.00 EA

 

 

 

WHAT GOES INTO MAKING A PAIR OF JEANS

  • Concept Sketches & CADs
  • Art Development
  • Target Measurements & Garment Specs
  • Consulting
  • Custom Trims development directly with Factory (buttons, rivets, Premium Woven labels, Care labels, Synthetic & Genuine Leather Patches)
  • Premium Domestic & Import Denim
  • Custom Tailored Wash Development to fit your target market
  • First thru Production Patterns (physical & computer)
  • Fit Sessions
  • Pattern Corrections
  • Foreign & Domestic Tech Packs
  • Sample Sewing Development
  • Grading, Marking, & Digitizing
  • Cutting Service
  • Custom Embroidery & Die Cut

 

 

PHASE TWO, WHAT'S NEXT

I decided to set up launching the line in phases. The most important phase which is what you are helping me with is the making of the samples. After this goal is reached the next phase will involve actually taking the finished samples and manufacturing 200 of each sample.

 

THE PERKS

If you have read this far...thank you for taking the time to take a look at my campaign! I would love for you to be a part of it.

 

The "working" sketch will be a nice color print of one of Thinles's working sketches as we are developing it...so you never know what it might be..and it will be signed by me!


I have to tell you ...the logo t-shirts are really cool! Every t-shirt will be specially hand picked by ME at my favorite thrift store in Atlanta. I will take special care to find one that is nice and worn in..and it will be screen printed by me personally! You can have it all one color (black or red) or two-color!

Everyone who contributes will be featured in the "Make Love Not War" Promo Video.  Be a part of the Righteous Army!  Simply email me a picture of you in your favorite jeans doing..whatever and you will be included in a really cooll video.

Everyone, regardless of your contribution, will be featured on my facebook page with a special thank you and your beautiful picture posted! (if you want it posted!)


The Mixed Tape CD will be sexy cool love songs inspired by the line...best listened to with a bottle of red wine and that special someone. 

 

The Righteous Gift Basket will include some of my favorite things...coffee, fragrance, lots of surprises!  You never know what you might get!


If your contribution includes the FINAL signed and numbered prototype sketches, those will be the FINAL OFFICIAL Prototypes for both Mens and Womens.  There will be numbered and signed by both designers, Thinles and myself.  There will only be a limited number produced.

 

 

AND..drum roll please….
For our biggest donor opportunity $2500...the Jeans Will Be Named After YOU!  One of the two prototypes will be named …are you ready?...AFTER YOU! Depending on if you are a man or woman, I will choose either your First or Middle Name as the name of the Very First Prototypes of the Righteous Lover Line!

Example:

Righteous Lover Women’s Jodie Trouser Jean!
Righteous Lover Men’s Bobby Boot Cut Jean!

 


Thank you guys so much..
story_txt:
I hope you enjoyed the video! I thought it would be a little bit more fun to watch than me sitting in front of a camera talking about my line! Here is more about the project! BE SURE AND READ DETAILS ABOUT THE PERKS AT THE BOTTOM OF THIS PAGE.

 
GOAL FOR THIS PROJECT 
 
 The first Two Samples or Prototypes of the Righteous Lover Brand Jeans Line. 
PROTOTYPE 1 - MEN'S RELAXED STRAIGHTPROTOTYPE 2 - WOMEN'S LOW-RISE TROUSER 
A prototype is one of the first units manufactured of a product, which is tested so that the design can be changed if necessary before the product is manufactured commercially. Once designs and fabrics are chosen, a first sample of the jeans is created and then tried on a model to see what adjustments to the design need to be made. This also helps designers to narrow their choices of designs to offer for sale. After the final adjustments and selections have been made, samples of the article using the actual materials are sewn and produced. That is what this project is for. 

 
THE RIGHTEOUS LOVER STORY 
 
 I came up with the idea of the Righteous Lover Brand Jeans line in March 2009. My main purpose is to create a denim line perfect for independent people who follow their own unique path in life and to help them express their individuality through the Righteous Lover brand. Righteous Lover will specialize in innovative finishes, detailed stitching, unique studs, buttons, and cool and unique accessories such as (wallet chain, mini-flask, etc.) Our price point will be $125-$350 and will be in the market with such brands as True Religion, Diesel, Evisu and my favorite brand Dsquared. 


 
OUR TEAM 
 
 I am so lucky to be surrounded by a talented group of people who share my vision of what this line could be. Thinles Chosdup, Fashion Designer, will be consulting with me on every detail. Thinles was recently featured in Vogue India and was named as a GenNext emerging young designer. When it comes to thinking out-of-the box, this new age designer rules the roost. Thinles celebrates denim as it ought to be celebrated: Ingeniously and without restraint. 


I will also be working with Don Valasquez at L.A. Garment Wash for the actual manufacturing of the prototypes. On the marketing side my team also includes Robert Lee of Methane Studios which has produced limited edition screen prints since 1998, and designed for such acts as Dave Matthews Band, Wilco, Kings of Leon, Eric Clapton, Sonic Youth and a hundred others. Robert Lee is also the designer of the Righteous Lover Logo. 
 
 
FINDING BEAUTY IN IMPERFECTION
 
 "Pared down to its barest essence, Righteous Lover Denim is in the business of finding beauty in imperfection. It's simple, slow, and uncluttered-and it reveres authenticity above all. story:
NOW: GET THEM ON BENSLY.COM

 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

FREE EXCHANGES AND RETURNS: You read that right. Even our underwear carries the same policy! If your items don't fit perfectly, just let us know within 100 days of delivery we'll take them back for an exchange or a refund; no questions asked.

PERMANENT DISCOUNT: In more fantastic news, as a Kickstarter backer, you're set to receive a permanent and lifetime discount on our products. Although not as deep as our Early Deals discount for this campaign, we feel that it covers the premium material, luxury craftsmanship, and the highly optimized logistics at a fair deal for our best customers.

REWARDS PROGRAM: You'll get free entry into our rewards program. Your pledge will count towards your rewards! More details coming soon.

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Bensly will always continue to hold true to our core values, which guided us through the creation of a company we feel genuinely proud to operate – and one our customers feel proud to support. It’s still a challenge to manage such a diverse global network, but we take care to be present at every step. To get everyone involved. To hear their voices. To hear yours. To ensure ecological sustainability, encourage social responsibility, and deliver the premium apparel you’ve come to expect while making positive change in the world we share. And together? We’ve created something truly special. We've set an example, and we thank you for being a part of it.
 
 
Bensly is the evolution of The Comfortable Club, launched in 2014; a small company manufacturing underwear for men and women. Then, as now, we believe in providing better service and smarter sourcing by cutting out middlemen to take full control of our supply chain. While undergarments remain the core of our global business, today we’ve expanded to a full line of premium sold exclusively online. Our company values and product design reflect minimalistic style: simplicity, utility, and comfort. More importantly, Bensly believes strongly in sustainability.
 

Bensly will continue to hold true to our core values, which guided us through the creation of a company we feel genuinely proud to operate – and one our customers feel proud to support. It’s still a challenge to manage such a diverse global network, but we take care to be present at every step. To get everyone involved. To hear their voices. To hear yours. To ensure ecological sustainability, encourage social responsibility, and deliver the premium apparel you’ve come to expect while making positive change in the world we share. And together? We’ve created something truly special. We've set an example, and we thank you for being a part of it.

From farming practices to fiber production, shipping, and dyeing of fabrics, in the apparel industry opportunities abound to make a strong and lasting impact on the world we share. Whether that’s a positive or negative impact depends entirely on a company’s choices – how it chooses to source its raw materials and the criteria they demand be applied in production. Many choose profit over all else, which is difficult for us to understand.

The TENCEL® branded fiber we used in our yarn is grown sustainably on South African Eucalyptus forest plantations that use land unsuitable for growing food crops. Our Pima cotton is grown in America on farms adhering to the highest standards of environmental protection.

What price can one put on clean air, water, and land? We believe a healthy Earth to be genuinely priceless and so, over the past 14 months, we’ve invested every available resource; every second we have, to make sure Bensly makes nothing but a positive impact on our world and its many inhabitants.

Our fabrics are produced in a closed-loop system that recycles 100% of solvents used, keeping harmful chemicals safely sequestered from any environment they could harm and reducing, for our part, the overall demand for production or extraction of such chemicals. And we do not add harmful metals in any part of our production process.

After a worldwide journey searching the most sustainable performance fabrics, we started looking for the best cutters and sewers – those who share our passion for eco-friendliness and can prove it. We began to consciously reduce our shipping footprint by splitting our supply chain to prioritize efficiency. Today, we work with a top fabric mill in Zhejiang, a Guangzhou facility for cutting, sewing, and packaging, and local mills and cutters right here in California. Our facilities are unmatched in the apparel industry. And, equally importantly, their hiring practices and employee-enrichment programs ensure workers get treated with the respect, fairness, and opportunity they deserve. They’re our kind of people, and we’re proud to partner with them.

ZHEJIANG PRODUCES: ELITE SERIES FABRIC.

This one was simple: not only does our textile enjoy a first-rate reputation in the industry, famous for its award-winning exports around the world; it was specifically recommended to us. We decided to take a closer look.

This industry-leader knitting facility has been producing top-quality fabrics for a range of established global brands for decades. Their awarded dedication to outstanding environmental stewardship and excellence in workplace environments makes them a perfect match for Bensly.

GUANGZHOU CUT & SEWS: ELITE SERIES BOXER BRIEFS.

After months of travel and many disappointments, we were lucky enough to encounter our knitter. Now we know they’re widely considered to be the world’s best manufacturer of undergarments with a team of over 500 people currently produces our entire underwear collection.

We asked friends, apparel makers, and even dealt with their competitor. Turns our fabric supplier, who had recommended a few of our dye houses, was able to connect us to the factory. After a few conversations and a visit to Guangzhou – to say we were pleased with the craftsmanship and hiring practices would be an understatement – we started prototyping immediately.

LOS ANGELES, CALIFORNIA PRODUCES: ELITE SERIES FABRIC 

We didn’t have to go far to find our fabric supplier, not far outside downtown LA. Its owner, Mr. Barry, has been in the LA garment industry for over 20 years and we’ve built a strong relationship with him – in fact, he’s been instrumental to our success.

Our company simply would not exist today without the support of this facility. Their focus on sustainability matches our own, and when we discovered they are one of the few local fabric mills with a dedicated product development team for sourcing and strategy, we knew we had to meet them. We’ve stuck with them since.

SOUTH EL MONTE, CALIFORNIA CUT & SEWS: ELITE SERIES FITTED TEE 

Our first stop was close to home – just 20 minutes outside downtown Los Angeles. Being so close by, we visit this facility every week and have forged a strong relationship with Mr. Jay, factory owner, who has been in the LA garment industry for over 25 years.

In our initial phases of production, we worked with four different vendors to produce a single T-shirt. This process was long and inefficient, and when we discovered we could streamline it without compromising quality thanks to Mr. Jay, we were ecstatic. Impressed by his high standards of workmanship and the positive environment his team creates for their workers, we knew right away: we need these people on board. Today, we’re proud to say we know the people who create our products firsthand – and, in many cases, by first name.

 
 

A little over 2 years ago, we launched what felt like a simple mission: to deliver unbeatable undies at the best price. Easy. Comfortable Club was born, and our mission accomplished. But even with awesome reviews on over 100,000 units shipped, success alone wasn’t enough to inspire us. Every day that we spent not improving our products, and their impact in the world, was a wasted day. Thus began our real journey…

It took 12 months of blood, sweat, and more than a few tears to overhaul production processes from start to finish. Miguel and his team learned more than they ever thought they could about trees, textiles, hardware, body shapes, movements, styles, and aesthetics. Bringing our customers the apparel they wanted in a way we feel is right proved to be an incredible challenge. But we succeeded. And today, at Bensly, mindfulness and sustainability form the core of everything we do.

 
There is no replacement for a vibrant community like Indiegogo. Our backers have provided invaluable feedback throughout the entire lifespan of the company, and we want to keep building this relationship even further. Although we could've launched these products via our website, we find that complementing our production run with the inclusion of Indiegogo backers was a great way to introduce Bensly to the world.  
 

Press Inquiries

You can email us at hello@bensly.com with any questions; we'd be happy to share more details!

 

Risks and challenges

This is our 4th campaign. We've shipped over 100,000 units to backers and customers all over the world. Our manufacturers are close partners and friends, and we're already in production with a set delivery time-frame in place. Our fulfillment centers have the capacity to ship over 25,000 items per day, so you can rest assured that your items will ship as soon as they're in stock. You'll receive automated tracking information too. We've got production, quality control, customer service, exchanges, and tracking handled beautifully. You're well taken care of!

Supply Chain Risk: We're incredibly proud of our supply chain, and have a lot of confidence that we can make what we say we'll make, when we say we'll make it. But know what? Sometimes 10 shipping containers of product get stuck for a random inspection at customs. We pad our schedule for these kind of things, but sometimes not enough. Whatever happens, we'll get through it together. We promise.

story: Desti Saint Handbags as featured in:
story_txt: Desti Saint Handbags as featured in:

story:
This project was previously funded on Kickstarter 2 days prior to this launch - I am giving the watch community a second chance to obtain one at the discounted price! The watches will be in production 2 weeks from now , and delivered Early February.

 

 

 Warranty

Each Oceanica Timepiece will come with a hand signed one year warranty card by me. In case, anything should go wrong with the mechanics or construction in that one year period, you are covered 100%.

 

Short Summary

 I, myself always look around for the best deals on watches with the highest quality components, movements, and of course the best looking watches. I am essentially bringing this product directly to the end consumer by cutting out the middleman or retail outlet, allowing for a very good value and truly outstanding timepiece which can be cherished by other watch enthusiasts all around the globe.

What We Need & What You Get

For just $265 ( $100 off of retail ) 

  • The $3000+ funding will go directly to producing these watches, boxes, and shipping them off to. my backers, while I will not make profit - I will still be able to launch this watch in a production batch!
  • Each watch will come with a beautiful leatherette travel case, 1 year hand-signed warranty card, and your watch!
  • If I do not reach my goal, the funds will be used to still deliver a watch to each backer that has so generously embarked on this journey with me!

The Impact

You single handedly will help launch a brand new watch model !

  • I did make a batch of dive watches last year, and they all sold out within 2 months! I have secure manufacturing, distribution, and quality control checks!

Risks & Challenges

I have secured manufacturing in Hong Kong and I have no doubt that the watches will be delivered and manufactured properly. I will be doing quality control checks myself, which is the right thing to do, and shipping myself from the USA. It should be a smooth ride from here on if this project is funded!

        About the watch 

The OP-1 is influenced by the original Flieger watches of the mid 1900's and these watches were actually used as tools and flight instruments by the military, and airforce. These watches were essential for survival and telling the time at a quick glance with the easy legibility of this dial "B" style layout. In earlier times, the pilot watches were larger - up too 50MM meant to be worn over flight jackets. In modern times, these style of timepieces have been slandered and slimmed down to adapt to the era in which we currently live in. Lastly, the upside down triangle with a dot to the left and right at 12:00 allows for easy legibility and quick reference during the night or day, just like the very first pilot watches.

 

*Please note all photos are 1:1 of what the actual watch you will receive will look like and NOT Photoshopped*

        Available in Two Different Dial Colors

MATTE BLACK / SUNBURST BLUE 

 

The Blue dial contains a sunburst effect and the black dial variant has a matte finish. Both dials are classic and traditional in the sense of pilot watches of the past and deeply influenced by them. The layout used on these dials is called the "B" style layout. This layout with large numerals allows for easy time reading at a quick glance, whether it be night or day. It is extremely practical and useful in everyday situations, from my experience. The dial also contains sword like hands filled with C3 SuperLuminova, as well as the markers and numerals.

 

 

 Movement 

I chose to utilize a very robust, accurate, and reliable high beat automatic movement. This means , no batteries - the watch actually runs with the movement of your hand or by winding the watch via Crown. The movement I chose is the Miyota 90S5. This movement has a power reserve of 42 hours, contains 24 jewels, and has a hand winding, and hacking capability. ( When crown is pulled - Second hand stops to set exact time ). It is also a beautiful movement to look at whilst running which can be seen through the Sapphire exhibition caseback on the back of the watch. The movement also has a beat rate of 28,800 Vibrations Per Hour allowing for an extremely smooth sweep of the seconds hand. This movement does not feature a date, and allows for a clean overall user experience.

 

                                                                     Case Construction and Finish

The OP-1 is comrpised of Marine grade 316L Solid Stainless steel which is corrosion resistant and holds up very well over the years. The case itself is 40MM in diameter, 10MM in thickness, and 47MM Lug to Lug distance. The lug width measures a standard 20MM and can fit many different straps. The finishing is all brushed and feels soft to my hands, which is good. The crystal used is a Genuine Anti-Reflective coated Sapphire crystal on the front of the watch, and the back of the watch. The small onion crown which is so typical of flinger style watches is sized fo the 40MM case so it does not bother you on the wrist also. The case is essentially three pieces - the case - smooth bezel - and screw down caseback which is water resistant to 5ATM or 50M. 

 

                                                 Genuine High Quality Black Leather Straps

The black leather strap I chose because overall I think It fits the characteristics of a pilots timepiece, and it is comfortable on my wrist. The strap is 20MM and contains enough holes to accommodate a larger wrist. There is no break-in period required with this strap , and it will fit on the wrist with ease straight out of the box. Being a watch lover myself, a stiff strap is a big no-no for me.

 

The OP-1 will ship inside a leatherette case on a pillow with your one year warranty card included. I chose to keep it simple, after doing a survey asking many watch collectors about boxes. This also helps keep cost down, and allows me to provide a lower price for Pre-Order, giving you more value for your money.

 

      

                                         

 

                           

WHAT THE MEDIA SAYS

" I see a lot of micro brands that are way over priced for what you actually get, Oceanica is one of the few to offer a high quality undervalued timepiece, which blows other brands away in terms of components used"

-Watch Addict
story_txt:
This project was previously funded on Kickstarter 2 days prior to this launch - I am giving the watch community a second chance to obtain one at the discounted price! The watches will be in production 2 weeks from now , and delivered Early February.
 
 
 Warranty
Each Oceanica Timepiece will come with a hand signed one year warranty card by me. In case, anything should go wrong with the mechanics or construction in that one year period, you are covered 100%.
 
Short Summary
 I, myself always look around for the best deals on watches with the highest quality components, movements, and of course the best looking watches. I am essentially bringing this product directly to the end consumer by cutting out the middleman or retail outlet, allowing for a very good value and truly outstanding timepiece which can be cherished by other watch enthusiasts all around the globe.

What We Need & What You Get
For just $265 ( $100 off of retail ) 

The $3000+ funding will go directly to producing these watches, boxes, and shipping them off to. my backers, while I will not make profit - I will still be able to launch this watch in a production batch!
Each watch will come with a beautiful leatherette travel case, 1 year hand-signed warranty card, and your watch!
If I do not reach my goal, the funds will be used to still deliver a watch to each backer that has so generously embarked on this journey with me!


The Impact
You single handedly will help launch a brand new watch model !
I did make a batch of dive watches last year, and they all sold out within 2 months! I have secure manufacturing, distribution, and quality control checks!

Risks & Challenges
I have secured manufacturing in Hong Kong and I have no doubt that the watches will be delivered and manufactured properly. I will be doing quality control checks myself, which is the right thing to do, and shipping myself from the USA. It should be a smooth ride from here on if this project is funded!

" I see a lot of micro brands that are way over priced for what you actually get, Oceanica is one of the few to offer a high quality undervalued timepiece, which blows other brands away in terms of components used"

story:
Our Philosophy 
We strive to strike a balance between nature and our needs. We believe our beautiful planet is worth preserving for future generations to cherish.  

Our products 
We carefully design, select and market products that represent our philosophy. We offer 100% cotton made totes that you would want to carry everywhere with you. We inspect our prototypes inside-out every seam, every thread to arrive at products that are stylish, classic and environmentally friendly, all at once. We don't believe in mass producing generic products or creating unaffordable luxury items. We excel at creating high-quality products with a soul. When designing products our goal is to encourage reuse and repeat use. That's why we work hard to create designs, select fabrics and pick colors that are classic and long lasting. We do this so our products never look dated and never go out of style.

 

Cool Pal (Slim or Roomy)
Check groovy meets tidy with the Tote Pal. For eco-buddies who like it neat, find clever inner pockets that keep your books, phone & stationery sectioned. Struggle no more to dig that phone out as it keeps ringing. A nifty elastic band holds your bottle in place.

Cool Pal Slim
Cool Pal Roomy - Size: 16” x 14”
Elasticized bottle holder in Slim and Roomy option

Product Features

Material: 100% cotton Lining: 100% cotton Print: Hand-screen print Care:Machine washable. Hand wash recommended. Light iron. Do not iron directly on print. Shift elasticized band to the side while ironing. Features: Inner pocket, impeccable stitching, elasticized bottle holder.

Compact Buddy (Neo or Genius)

An excellent choice for daily use, this tote in 100% cotton, folds up into an ingenious pouch that’s especially easy to carry all thanks to its smartly designed wristlet. Strong and sturdy thanks to expert stitching, it comes in smart designs you’d love to flaunt.

Neo
Neo Compacted
Compact Buddy - Genius

Product Features

Size: (Bag) 13” x 15” (Pouch) 5.5” x 6.8” Material: 100% cotton Care:Machine washable, hand wash recommended flat/line dry in shade, light iron.Features: Pouch to carry the folded tote, Fine stitching and detailing, Wristlet to carry the pouch 
How to fold

Step 1: Keep the bag flat such that the pouch is facing downwards. Step 2:Place straps on the bag body. Steps 3 & 4: Bring the left and right parts to the center. Steps 5 & 6: Bring the top and bottom parts to the center. Steps 7 & 8: Fold once more to match the top and bottom and then slip the folded tote inside the pouch

Eco Veggie

Who says fruits & vegetables can’t enjoy some eco-style? As a great alternative to earth-unfriendly plastic, the reusable Eco Veggie is perfect for storing produce in your refrigerator. Its 100% cotton fabric keeps fruits & veggies fresher for longer and its delightful prints are sure to give your vegetable crisper a style boost.Carry it with you when you go veggie shopping and drastically reduce your plastic foot print. Cotton fridge bag drastically reduces the plastics consumed from a household. Dimensions: 12” x 10” Instructions: Machine washable.

Veggie Bag
Veggie Bag

Wise Guru

This hand screen-printed washable canvas tote in 100% cotton has been made with careful attention to detail and a lot of love. It’s the ideal companion for world citizens who like to wear their inspiration on their sleeves.

Wise Guru
Wise Guru

Product Features

Size: 13” x 16” Material: 100% cotton Lining: 100% cotton Print: Hand-made screen print Care: Machine washable. Hand wash recommended. Light iron. Do not iron directly on print. Features: Spacious, inner pocket for storage, impeccable stitching. Colors: Forest Black, Wood Brown, Shell Cream

Officiel Mentor ( Urbano or Cosmo)

Perfect for every office-goer, this tote seamlessly complements formal business attire with its fine jacket fabric and streamlined design. Its lightweight yet sturdy fabric takes the weight of your belongings with ease.

Officiel Mentor (Urbano)
Officiel Cosmo

Product Features

Size: 13” x 15” Material: Suiting fabric Lining: Poly twill Care: Machine washable. Hand wash recommended. Light iron if required. Features:Impeccable stitching, jacket pocket-style embroidered outer pocket ( only Urbano).

What We Need & What You Get

We have completed the designs and prototypes of the bags. We are now in the process of raising funds for the production. Visit our online store at www.ecoworksonline.com

Contribute to our campaign and get some awesome perks that we have put together just for you

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to contribute to our campaign, We understand. Help us spread the word via facebook. Visit us at http://www.facebook.com/Ecoworksonline or visit our website at www.ecoworksonline.com

 

And that’s all there is to it.

story:
As a long-time fan of Alice in Wonderland, Sue has endeavored to capture and convey the whimsy and charm of the Alice stories in her newest line of heirloom quality jewelry. Each piece has been expertly carved in wax to maximize detail and the expressiveness of the characters, before casting in sterling silver or bronze. The line will start with necklaces, but if there is sufficient interest Sue already has plans to expand it to include earrings, bracelets, and rings, featuring a range of different Alice in Wonderland characters and scenes. The Alice line represents some of Sue's finest and most meticulous artistic work, and we're certain you are going to love it as much as she loved designing it.  

             

     The Alice in Wonderland jewelry collection is an exploration of illogical merriment, coupled with a sense of dark whimsy that whisks you away to a realm a realm of endless possibilities and delightful surprises. The Alice jewelry line seeks to embody that very sense of wonder in timeless handcrafted art.

Each piece is designed and hand sculpted by award-winning designer, Sue Beatrice. The prototypes are all carved in wax before production, to maximize the amount of detail. The wax prototypes are then used to form the molds that produce the finished jewelry pieces. The final pieces are cast from the finest bronze or sterling silver, given a patina to bring out the details, polished, added to a sterling silver chain and placed in a gift box with an accompanying card and polishing cloth. Most pieces are 30mm by 30mm and come with an 18" sterling silver chain which is 1.5mm thick. Everything is made in the USA.

Alice tumbling - Like Alice, we begin our journey tumbling down the rabbit hole. This piece captures the sense of disorientation Alice must have felt as she fell into Wonderland. This is the most delicate design of the series and wears more like a collar than a pendant. 
 


White Rabbit - Who can't relate to the fear of running late? The face of the white rabbit registers his shock when he sees the time on his pocket watch. The chain becomes the fob that runs into his jacket pocket.


Cheshire Cat - A perennial favorite, the grinning mischievous cat crosses his arms over the chain and clings with one back paw in a nonchalant pose. This kitty is a bit full of himself and knows that he always gets the upper hand.

Mad Hatter - The over-the-top silliness of this piece is all about fun, capturing the wacky but lovable sort of feeling from the book. The dormouse sleeps in the teapot while the hatter mindlessly pours. His high-stepping antics leave plates and spoons flying about.


Caterpillar smoking hookah - There's a touch of disdain in the face of this character. His haughty pose and pursed lips seem to ask "Who are you?" in a slow exhale. 


Queen of Hearts - She believes she owns the world, and in her world that is true. The flamingo and hedgehog are there to do her bidding. But flip the piece over and her alter ego sneers down in a mix of annoyance and amusement.

Jabberwock - We all have our own personal dragons to slay, and the story of the Jabberwock gives expression to our fight. It's gibberish yet all somehow totally clear.

With the purchase of any Alice necklace, you will also receive a campaign exclusive mini art print, drawn by award-winning artist Sue Beatrice. In addition, if you purchase two or more Alice in Wonderland jewelry collection necklaces you will instead receive a large-size version of the campaign exclusive print. All prints will be signed and numbered by the artist.

           If you purchase the entire Alice in Wonderland jewelry collection (in bronze or in silver), you will also receive an original artist's choice unique work of art done by designer, Sue Beatrice.

                  Sue Beatrice is professional artist and sculptor with over 30 years experience in the fine arts. She has worked for the likes of Disney, Warner Bros., Dreamworks, Nickelodeon, Hasbro Toys, Waterford Crystal, and the Jim Henson Corporation, among many others. Over her long career, she has sculpted in a wide range of mediums, including clay, wax, metal, cement, sand, and pumpkin, and her work has been featured on NBC, MTV, SyFy, and Food Network.

story:
Short Summary

Hello,  my name is Dwight Van Slyke and I am the creator of the Hat Leash. Growing up in San Diego surfing has always been part of my life, however the sun damage to my scalp, face and forehead became painful whenever I went surfing without protection.  After many years of losing hat after hat to multiple wipe outs, I decided to create a product that would be easy to keep track of and protect me from the sun and glare at the same time.


The Hat Leash was designed with surfers and other active water sport enthusiasts in mind.  

The product consists of three parts; a leash, arm band, and a hat. All three components work together to protect against loss of the Hat, sun exposure, heat, glare and some protection if one were to get hit in the head.  The bright colors also make it easier for others to see you in the water or from shore.

The Leash that attaches the Hat to the Arm Band is made from a variety of materials such as Polyester webbing, Para cord, filament or nylon line with beads, and other small art objects.  The braided cords have an assortment of the decorative items woven into them.  We are always looking for ways to better the look and durability of the Hat Leash so new designs are just around the corner.


Our Hat Leashes are very different from the rest; they are very colorful.  The Hats and Leashes are color coordinated, making them a fashion statement as well. We also carry a variety of colors.

Let's just talk about surfing for now.  At all the professional events the riders have advertising everywhere except their heads.  Will the surfers wear this Hatleash on a 15 foot day at Pipeline, probably not.  But at the Van's US Open of Surfing in Huntington Beach in 3 to 6 foot waves, oh yea, no doubt.  Red Bull, etc will want their name there.

We are patent pending and have a registered trademark. 

Patent Pending: Patent Application Number 62042900

Trademark: serial number 86424842

What We Need & What You Get

We need $150,000.  This will be used to purchase materials, lease a warehouse, set up an assembly system to make the leashes, attach them to the hats and inventory and shipping operations.

Jobs For The Community

I have found some warehouses that boarder neighborhoods that are economically depressed.  My plan is to recruit from the surrounding area so that they could  walk to work, or a short bus ride.  This work can be done by just about anyone and we will try to attract the disabled, seniors and some school kids as well.  Employing and training people that may have a difficult time finding employment.

If I do not reach my goal, then as I am a Vietnam Vet the, the funds would go to the Wounded Warriors foundation.

    The Impact

    Sun protection, damage to your eyes from the glare, some protection if you get hit in the head and it is easier to see you when you are in the water.  Making people's lives better & healthier. 

    This is a trend setting product as hats have not been worn for surfing or other similar activities in the past and based on the responses from the surfers, they are ready for the Hat Leash.

    Employing and training people that may have a difficult time finding employment.

    We are trying hard to be mostly made in the United States.

      Risks & Challenges

      As we all know with any new business venture there are always risks to be considered.  The only risk I can see here is; not enough people buy a Hat Leash.  But based on the reception so far this risk appears to be very low.  The hats, leashes, and the arm band are mostly made in the United States and assembled here as well.  The items that make up the Hat Leash are readily available from large distributors/manufacturers and labor is very available. 

      Entreprenuer Experience

      I have successfully operated several businesses, including www.kitchenandbathdesignbuild.com.  I am the volunteer President of a 1100 member public tennis club (Balboa Tennis Club - 10 years on the board) and I do not foresee any problems with the management of the funds or the business, it is a very simple product to make and ship.

      Other Ways You Can Help

      Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

      • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
      • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!
story_txt:
Short Summary


Hello,  my name is
Dwight Van Slyke and I am the creator of the Hat Leash. Growing up in San Diego surfing has always been
part of my life, however the sun damage to my scalp, face and forehead became
painful whenever I went surfing without protection.  After many years of losing hat after hat to multiple wipe outs, I decided to create a product that would be easy to keep track of and protect me from the sun and glare at the same time.
The Hat Leash was designed with
surfers and other active water sport enthusiasts in mind.  
The product consists of three
parts; a leash, arm band, and a hat. All three components work together to
protect against loss of the Hat, sun exposure, heat, glare and some protection
if one were to get hit in the head.  The
bright colors also make it easier for others to see you in the water or from
shore.
The Leash that attaches the Hat
to the Arm Band is made from a variety of materials such as Polyester webbing, Para cord, filament
or nylon line with beads, and other small art objects.  The braided cords have an assortment of
the decorative items woven into them.  We are always looking for ways to better the look and durability of the Hat Leash so new designs are just around the corner.



Our Hat Leashes are very
different from the rest; they are very colorful.  The Hats and Leashes are color
coordinated, making them a fashion statement as well. We also carry a variety of colors. 
Let's just talk about surfing for now.  At all the professional events 
the riders have advertising everywhere except their heads.  Will the 
surfers wear this Hatleash on a 15 foot day at Pipeline, probably not.  
But at the Van's US Open of Surfing in Huntington Beach in 3 to 6 foot 
waves, oh yea, no doubt.  Red Bull, etc will want their name there.


We are patent pending and have a registered trademark. 
Patent Pending: Patent Application Number 62042900
Trademark: serial number 86424842
  What We Need & What You Get We need $150,000.  This will be used to purchase materials, lease a warehouse, set up an assembly system to make the leashes, attach them to the hats and inventory and shipping operations.
Jobs For The Community
I have found some warehouses that boarder neighborhoods that are economically depressed.  My plan is to recruit from the surrounding area so that they could  walk to work, or a short bus ride.  This work can be done by just about anyone and we will try to attract the disabled, seniors and some school kids as well.  Employing and training people that may have a difficult time finding employment.
If I do not reach my goal, then as I am a Vietnam Vet the, the funds would go to the Wounded Warriors foundation.
   The Impact
Sun protection, damage to your eyes from the glare, some protection if you get hit in the head and it is easier to see you when you are in the water.  Making people's lives better & healthier.  
This is a trend setting product as hats have not been worn for surfing or other similar activities in the past and based on the responses from the surfers, they are ready for the Hat Leash.
Employing and training people that may have a difficult time finding employment.
We are trying hard to be mostly made in the United States.
   Risks & Challenges
As we all know with any new business venture there are always risks to be considered.  The only risk I can see here is; not enough people buy a Hat Leash.  But based on the reception so far this risk appears to be very low.  The hats, leashes, and the arm band are mostly made in the United States and assembled here as well.  The items that make up the Hat Leash are readily available from large distributors/manufacturers and labor is very available.  
Entreprenuer Experience
I have successfully operated several businesses, including www.kitchenandbathdesignbuild.com.  I am the volunteer President of a 1100 member public tennis club (Balboa Tennis Club - 10 years on the board) and I do not foresee any problems with the management of the funds or the business, it is a very simple product to make and ship.
  Other Ways You Can Help Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:  Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign. Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
If fashion is a cycle, then it’s time we revisited the Golden Era of Art Deco.

Inspired by sleek geometry, elegant typography and bold designs of the 1930s, Vario’s Empire Art Deco Watch Collection is merging time with timelessness.

We’ve opted out of impersonal stock parts, choosing instead to give each watch in the collection its own custom-made case, dial, crown, and hands for visual drama. We’ve also pared down the pronounced horn lugs for a more refined, contemporary look. 

Silver Dial / Heated Blue hands / Navy Blue Italian Leather strap 

Gunmetal Tuxedo Dial / Silver hands / Maroon Italian Leather strap 

White Dial / Heated Blue hands / Grey Italian Leather strap 

White Tuxedo Dial / Silver hands / Black Italian Leather strap 

Black Tuxedo / Silver hands (This is an older prototype ; case differ slightly but we will be using the same dial)

 

Caseback Design

 

Specifications

Diameter: 38mm                   
Lug to Lug: 46mm                   
Thickness: 11.5 mm (NH38A)                  
Strap Width: 20mm                   
Movement: Seiko NH38A Automatic                  
Crystal: Sapphire with inner AR coating                  
Water Resistance: 5 ATM                  
Warranty: 1 Year Global warranty

Strap: Choice of vintage style Italian leather with slight bi-colour effect (20mm taper to 16mm) or Harris Tweed strap (20mm taper to 18mm)

 

Choice of Straps

Vintage style Italian Leather  Provincia di Vicenza  with slight bi-colour effect and cream colour stitching - 20mm taper to 16mm ( Black / Navy Blue / Grey / Maroon / Wine ) Strap comes with Quick Release and is stain and scratch resistant. Length 115mm/75mm

Genuine Harris Tweed from Scotland - 20mm taper to 18mm ( Lavender / Merlot / Pecan / Coal / Ash / Cobalt / Peacock ) Length 115mm/72mm

 

Photos,Videos and Reviews of Empire Handwound from Watch Lovers
Please note the prototypes reviewed are handwound versions (available on vario.sg by July 2019). The Automatic version which we are raising fund for will feature a closed caseback. 

 

 

Shane from Relative Time

Kirk from Link and Tag

 

Scott from Watches Galore

Alan from Eclectic Collector

 Qi Le from Wah So Shiok

Mike for The Time Bum

Shane from WATCHA

 

Michael from WatchuSeek

Gabriel from the.mensch

 

More Video reviews

Peter from Peter Von Panda

 

Aron from OFD Watch Channel

 

Chris from Marshall Time

 

Mark from Average Bros

 

 

Vario Eclipse (Previous Watch) Testimonials

We've had 4 successful crowdfunding campaign (2 Kickstarter and 2 Indiegogo) and delivered thousands of products to hundreds of backers before this so we understand the process. We will certainly do our best to make sure that the watches case arrive on time so we can get them to our Kickstarter backers as soon as possible. 

Vario Empire Automatic will start production in June and we will send out the automatic watches by end September so it pays to get in Early!

story:
Greetings

My name is Saleh Al Shuwaier from Saudi Arabia, I'm 25 yrs old Chemical Engineer and a shaper at (Global Shapers Community - Al Khobar Hub). Currently, working as production engineer in one of the fastest growing petrochemical companies in the country but hopefully not for long since I'm going to start something that really matters to me.

Short Summery

The main block which this project will be built upon is (Buy 1 get 2) offer. For every T-shirt get sold another is given to a person in need whether by the customer (locally) or by the 7akwa for global causes.
The funds will help us get more fabrics, better equipments and a place to work from.
I have already collected around $10,000 from local investors who want's to contribute in shaping the future and affecting people lives around the world. We are still looking for people that share our vision and belief that the world is enough for everybody.

What We Need & What You Get

7akwa Clothing's needs $38,000 to start, breakdown below:

Fabrics and garments - $15,000

Office supplies and equipments - $10,000

Advertisement - $3,000

Property Rent - $10,000

7akwa Clothing's is targeting youth (for the start-up phase) between (16 - 25) yrs. Every design (Arabic/English) will deliver a positive message and the "free" t-shirt will have another specific design which will be given to a person in need either by the customer or by 7akwa.

Fixed t-shirt price is $32 with permanent buy 1 get 2 offer. 

The Impact

Tog the world and share the love with 7akwa.

For every T-shirt bought, a person in need is togged. 

6 months after start-up 7akwa Clothing's should have given around 1000 T-shirts.

The more capital we get, the more fabrics we can buy, the more people we can help.

    Risks & Challenges

    Logistics is a major challenge which 7akwa Clothing's must overcome, after the customer buys the T-shirt either on-line or by coming to the shop, merchandises must be delivered not only to the customer but to the person in need too. To avoid doubling the work on our logistics team the second T-shirt could be handled to a person in need by the customer him/herself to feel the joy and fulfillment that giving spirits enjoy.
    For togging the globe, 7akwa intend to collaborate with global organizations to make sure that all beneficiaries are people in need.
    Only global marketing considered as a challenge for us which one way or another we will make it. Either by various social media, inspiring people or by just being OUTSTANDING.
