story:
so who am I & what do I want?

Provizor Organic Designs was founded in Israel in 2011, as a small business of bags i have designed. I have made my way during those 3 years (living in the last 1.5 years in Berlin, Germany), selling in Israel, Learning design from great teachers and "on the way" working with  Indians in a factory in Delhi, exploring the fashion world and working with a great lady here in Berlin that is sewing my designs samples. I Have the place in Delhi where I can go back and produce, I have the connection with Boheco company ( http://boheco.org/)  in India that sells the hemp fabrics, I have the connections with fashion figures in berlin to help me in marketing, what I only lack of is the money to restart my work. My vision is a sustainable business, a business that not only produces its products from hemp- the most sustainable plant on earth, but also a business that once it makes money it becomes a home for social projects. I would like to speak through fashion, to make changes through fashion, to use fashion in order to fulfill my dream and take a part in making our earth a little bit better.

ok, but why 8,000 Euro?

In order to restart my business, as I see it, I must:

go back to India for working with my Indian factory and make sure I buy the right hemp fabrics from there, I must pay the factory workers , I must pay for the hemp fabric which is not cheap as you know, I must go back to Berlin and Market my products- a business must have good marketing in order to grow and that costs money as well, and offcourse I must produce more bags than I actually need because you are going to get some in return to your funding. 

If I will not reach my goal of 8,000 euro I will try to continue my project in the way I can. I will not stop my way, so your money will be used anyway to support the rebirth of Provizor Organic Designs.


Organic is not just a fabric

Dear friends, as you saw in the video and read above, I am a dreamer. When I create fashion I aim to be a part of something bigger. Using hemp for sewing my bags and supporting the hemp farms will be just the begining. I have alot of ideas regarding the Israeli Palestinian coexistence and about India, but for that I must hold enough money in order to make them true. I have alot of connections with activists around the world & a creative mind,and at the end I knew that all I need is to make my own business so I can control how the profit is being managed and how the process looks like. I really believe beauty is not just from the outside, so when I design bags, I dont only think about how beautiful they will look like, but much more than that.

Other Ways You Can Help

There are many ways to help without money:

If you want to support my way, you can share and spread this video through this website, so more people will see it, it will go viral and get higher chances for fundings.If you know people that my ideas might be interesting for them, business people in the fashion world, in other fields, media people- you can share it with them as well. If you support my way you can also talk about it, and spread the ideas that stand behind what I do, which is actually a very important thing, without any connection to my project:) For more information you are welcome to write to me at: noa@provizordesign.com     Yours,

Noa

story:
ME                                              My Art Work

I want to tell you a little about myself and my clothing line.My name is Alisa Correa I'm a self-taught artist, and fashion designer with a big dream.My dream is to create a successful independently owned artistic street wear line for women.I decided one day out of the blue in college to try to make that dream come true so I took a leap of faith and I taught myself to screen print with a small silk screening kit and a printer. I started off small by printing my very own t-shirts. I realized after creating my collection I wanted to dress a woman from head to toe  and expanded to skirts, leggings, tanks. and shorts. I spend my waking hours designing clothes and researching and looking for inspiration. I am here to share my vision for my Fall/Winter 2013 Aztec Warrior collection with you.

 


Enough about me here is a little about my clothing line. Alias Pink means  many things such as individuality, artistic expression and passion.Alias Pink Clothing is an artistic street wear line created in 2010 for women. Alias Pink is well known by many for its unique artistic graphics. This line is more than just your average clothing line it’s the perfect blend of fashion and art.

I want to know more please tell me about the project I am funding!

As the creator I want to give you a little background on the collection you  will help launch. The title for the Alias Pink Fall/Winter 2013 line is the "Aztec Warrior" collection.I wanted to connect with my Hispanic roots and examine the Aztec culture that existed such a long time ago. I was extremely inspired by the artwork and history of Mexico and the Aztec people.

This collection is heavily inspired by Aztec tribal art and the Aztec warrior culture. One aspect of  the warrior culture that stood out to me was the warrior’s battle uniforms. The warriors tend to wear the skin of the animals and helmets from the animals skulls to embody that animal’s spirit and power. I referenced various Aztec tribal designs and various animal markings to create the patterns for my collection. I interpreted the designs through my artistic filter and modernized them.

I wanted my collection to be an artistic and modern version of the Aztec warrior uniform.The woman who wears the Aztec Warrior collection will feel like an empowered warrior walking down the concrete jungles of the world.






               


                                       Aztec Culture        

 Aztec Warriors                Aztec tribal Art         Animal Markings


Why does it cost 9,700 dollars to produce your line?

Good question why so much to produce my collection. As a small business owner I realized I want to support local business owners too. We all know the cost of doing business locally isn't cheap. I have reached out to businesses all over California in areas of clothing production, screen printing, graphic designing, and promotional material to make this collection a reality. I have chosen to work with companies that are at he top in their fields and can provide topnotch services.


Alias Pink is so original because a majority of the designs are hand drawn  and never imitated. I strive for originality and never imitate my references directly.The inspiration for the line changes often so you will never see the same graphics recycled.  I have done all this on my own with little overhead and help as possible. I use my inspiration as a foundation to build upon. You will also find various original dying techniques and on occasion hand painted details.A few of my designs have hand dyed details with are unique to each shirt. No shirt will be the exactly the same as the other.

Hand drawn or computer created I strive for originality.

   

   

   

Hand dyed for one of a kind details


Hand Cut for an edgy look

    

Screen printed design

                 



                                           


V-neck size chart

Tank and crop top sizes

 

Mitches Night Out Fashion Show. Alias Pink Clothing was the showcased clothing line. Check the video out Alias Pink is the first collection on the video.




             

Wait what other ways can I help besides donations?.

Well being a  struggling artist I understand, but there are so many ways you can help besides cash! Here are a few ways to do that!

Don't forget to use the Indiegogo share tools and spread the word about Alias Pink.

SHARE it with your mom your dad, your bestie, your girlfriend, boyfriend, and anyone else you think would love it!

Check out the Alias Pink website!

Click on one or all of the links below to support Alias Pink Clothing

Like Alias Pink on Facebook!     Follow me on Twitter!   Follow me Instagram


Thank you

To my friends and family for all your help!

Thank you models for all your great work

And thank you Paul Mitchell school Sacramento for great the great hair and makeup!

Click on one or all of the links below to support Alias Pink Clothing
Like Alias Pink on Facebook!     Follow me on Twitter!   Follow me Instagram

Thank you
To my friends and family for all your help!
Thank you models for all your great work
And thank you Paul Mitchell school Sacramento for great the great hair and makeup!

story:
Nubagg is a smart and simple trash can that reuses plastic bags that are handed out for free at super markets, pharmacies, etc.

Nubagg is a very simple trash can. Every time that we present the product to someone (without the bag) the number one question is "what is that?". All it takes to change a "what is that?" to a "WOW" is to place a bag on it, and just like magic, it makes sense.

ADOPT-A-BAG

Although we are not out to save the world, nor we consider ourselves environmentalists, Nubagg is a very green product by nature because it has been designed to reuse any plastic bag that is handed out for free at grocery stores, pharmacies, convenience stores, gas stations, retail outlets, etc. 

Adopt-a-bag and use them anywhere: kitchen, bath, mud-room, garage, home office, garden, etc.

With that said, we came up with the Adopt-A-Bag Program (no bag left behind). The goal here is to make use of these free bags instead of throwing them away, and of course to save money since you no longer have to buy plastic bags to throw your trash. A family of four can make up the cost of a Nubagg within two months of reusing these free bags.

DESIGN HIGHLIGHTS & BENEFITS

MODERN DESIGN

Aside from the very simple design, it's clean lines is what makes our product eye-catching and a conversation piece. A nearly-negligible surface leaves a fraction of the carbon footprint that conventional trash cans do.

100% RECYCLED

Nubagg not only reuses millions of plastic bags, but it is made of 100% recycled metal. These two characteristics make it the most eco-friendly trash can available in the market.

HANG-THE-BAG DESIGN

It's unique hang-the-bag design maximizes the natural capacity that each bag holds. Nubagg can hold as much weight as the bag itself can hold (and then some).

FREAKISHLY LIGHTWEIGHT

At barely 1lb (one pound), Nubagg its the lightest trash can in its category. What weights 1lb? A loaf of bread, a dozen eggs... and Nubagg!  

VIRTUALLY ODOR-FREE

Because of its metaphysically wrinkle-free metal body, Nubagg is virtually odor free compared to conventional trash cans. What's the trick? Metal does not absorb odors like plastic does.

HASSLE-FREE CLEANING TECHNOLOGY

Washing trash cans is so old-school. Enjoy our built-in, high-tech and hassle-free cleaning technology: wipe it. That's right, most people forget about this tedious task, but trash-cans have to be cleaned periodically so they don't smell and become unhygienic. Cleaning Nubagg is easy as pie.

MODELS & COLORS

Nubagg Classic & Nubagg Mini

Nubagg’s standalone unit, the Nubagg Classic, is the lightest trash can in its class, weighting barely 1lb (less than a loaf of bread). Its unique structural design makes it not only a conversational piece, but can hold as much weight as the bag itself can hold (and then some).

Nubagg Mini goes where others can't. Designed with small spaces in mind, this versatile wall-mount unit fits everywhere. The Mini is half the weight of the Nubagg Classic, and yet it has all of its unique characteristics and key benefits.

2 Timeless Colors, Unlimited Possibilities

Although Nubagg can be done in practically any imaginable color, we plan to start production in two timeless colors: silver gray and white. Both of these colors fit perfectly in any kitchen, bathroom, mud room, laundry room, garage, office, etc. As a Kickstarter pledger, you will have the opportunity to choose one of these two colors, or a combination of both if you go for one of our combos.

 

With large distribution orders we plan to introduce other colors based on distribution demand. For example, Target can request for Nubagg to be in red as part of their retail strategy, or The Home Depot may require them in orange, while Lowes may ask for them in blue. 

 

UPDATES

Update 1 - Free Shipping

All perks/contributions include free shipping in the US.

Update 2 - Nubagg Mini

We have made a manufacturing improvement on the Nubagg Mini that will make it aesthetically more appealing, and will increase the overall durability of the unit.

The improvement is on the holes used to mount it to a wall and/or cabinet. It doesn’t sound like much, but the original version of the Nubagg Mini was done with a washer fused/welded to the wire-frame. In the new version of the Nubagg Mini, the wire frame itself is pressed down at the end giving it a nice shape (no joint = more strength).

In the new version of the Nubagg Mini, the wire frame itself is pressed down at the end giving it a nice shape (no joint = more strength).

story:
www.helone.com.au

THE HELONE WALLET

THE SLIM WALLET THAT HAS IT ALL

THE HELONE WALLET IS IN ITS SECOND GENERATION AVALIABLE FOR PURCASE HERE:  Click here to go to our website. 

 

The HELONE wallet encapsulates classic style and practicality with perfect harmony.

Crafted in quality Italian leather, this wallet includes a discrete zip-pocket, enabling you to carry MUCH more than expected in a slim wallet. It features specialised signal-blocking fabric to protect from credit-card skimming, whilst allowing bus/building cards to fully function from within the wallet. 

 

      

 

The dedicated zip-pocket has been designed to hold all your modern-day essentials.

 

 

The Note section minimises pocket buldge and increases practicality by ensuring Australian and US notes require folding only once. 

A HELONE wallet carrying 7 cards, 10 notes, a key and two coins.

 

 

THE BRAND

Helone comes from the Greek word Chelone, meaning turtle.

Born from the Greek Island of Aegina, the iconic symbol of the sea turtle was depicted upon the first internationally traded coin in 600BC. The sea turtle was a symbol of Aegina’s major sea power at the time and is a prominent symbol in Greek history. The sea turtle represents perseverance, wisdom and success. A Helone wallet will offer you the protection of your valuables to a level that you would expect a turtle to be protected by its shell. 

Helone has been built upon the values that the turtle inspires and, although a slow starter in the Mens accessory industry, aims to lead in design, practicality and quality. 

One of the first versions of the coin from 600BC.

 

FIVE KEY FEATURES: 

  1. Dedicated zip-pocket

  2. Stylish Italian leather

  3. RFID shielding that not only protects cards from credit card skimming, but allows access cards to fully function from within the wallet

  4. Approximate Golden Ratio design 

  5. Manufactured to a high degree of quality   

 

The tortoise logo is secured in place by metal anchor plates underneath the leather. 

 

PRODUCTION SCHEDULE

The past six months at HELONE has been extremely busy in finally arriving at a design that encompasses the quality and practicality that exceeded every aspect of our goals. With the help of crowdfunders from Indiegogo, we are now able to move into production and fulfilment of orders.

The expected production dates are as below:

  • June: Final product enhancements 
  • July: Finalise demand and intiate first order
  • August: Quality control to ensure customer satisfaction 
  • September: Delivery commencement

RISKS AND CHALLENGES

Timely fulfillment of rewards is extremely important to the Helone team. Throughout all stages of the campaign, backers will be updated on the status of their pledges.

HELONE is ready to provide pledgers with an incredible wallet that we hope you will love just as much as we do. All that is required now is your support!

FAQ

Is registered shipping available?

Yes, but it is an extra $5 for deliveries within Australia and $12 extra for deliveries outside Australia. Add this amount to your pledge, and if you forgot, just click on Contribute Now and email to notify us on alexcollivas@helone.com.au.

Does the wallet come in any other types of leather?

Not at this stage, but leave a comment stating what you would like to see in the future and we will work towards that. 

Can any type of note fit within the wallet?

Yes, but notes wider than 67mm will usually require a second fold. 

What if I forgot to add the extra $5 for shipping internationally? 

No worries at all, just click contribute now and add $5. 

What are the dimensions of the wallet?

The dimensions are 11.5cm x 7.2cm.

How strong is the RFID protection?

It is effective at blocking up to 99% card signals. 

 

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP 

If this wallet isn't for you, but you still think its a great idea please:

  • Share this link on Facebook;
  • Like our Facebook page; or
  • Follow us on instagram

The Indiegogo share tools can be found below!

 

Any Questions, Queries or Comments, please shoot us an email at: alexcollivas@helone.com.au.

LASTLY, A BIG THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT!!

And another big thank you to the team @ springmarketing.com.au for the video.

story:
Join the Campaign!!! ~ Be a part of making a Photographic Documentary of Women's Leather Culture


Making History, Breaking Boundaries of Society's idea of "normalcy". Changing Society's idea of the IDEAL Woman. Bringing to the forefront real women, who forge paths of their own, deciding how they want to live their lives, by no one's code, but their own.

What happens when women decide to start documenting their own personal histories rather than leaving it up to main stream society? You begin to find out that there is a even stronger, greater undercurrent of amazing women, that have forged paths you never even imagined.


We are Leather Women is a Photographic Documentary, about Women in the Leather Community, a diverse community bonded together by a common desire. These photographs document women who live outside the confined idea of mainstream society. My hope is that these photographs are destined at becoming a Historical Collection of amazing women that have long forged new ground under one umbrella, the Leather Community.

This project gives a voice to their stories, so that you can learn more about real women's strength, about yourself through their diversity, as well as learn about a subculture that has long fought for Women's Sexual Rights and Sexual Freedom as a whole.

These photographs have and hopefully will continue to be taken of Leather Women from all over the USA, and together will forge a collection of powerful, amazing images that show the diversity, strength, and love of people who live outside mainstream society's idea of "normal" life.

Your Impact

Your support will help me to travel to various states to document through photography most of the women in the community and begin printing the Portraits for showcasing the images in gallery shows.

  • Traveling is expensive, I watch every cent along the way, but I need a little help from you to get to all the destinations I need to this year. I have been doing this documentary on a shoe string budget, funding it on my own, making this is a very slow process. I need your assistance to make this documentary happen. The funding will pay for travel related expenses, and provide a quicker and easy time-frame to finish this documentary.
  • In Exchange for your contribution, whether small or large, your name will be posted on the We are Leather Women website on the Thank You for your Support page.
  • By supporting this Documentary project, you will be supporting a powerful message of female diversity, equality and history. The more people that see these images, the more successful we all become at educating people about inner strength, women's history and advancing acceptance of all people.

Who I am

My name is C. Creane, the producer and photographer for the Leather Women Photographic Documentary. I am an artist, I am your neighbor, I am a painter, and I am a volunteer. I am the biggest supporter of documenting your life, your history, your way.

Please help me, to do that for the Women's Leather Community.

I have been part of the Women's Leather Community for many years. After having lost many amazing women within the community, many of whom were great individuals who did a lot for others, but left us early in life due to illness, suicide, and accidents and after seeing their personal history and stories disappear with the wind.  I decided it's time to change the way that history is documented.

  • I ask you to donate  $10  or more to this campaign so that I can reach more people. I would greatly appreciate it, if you would also, share this campaign with your friends and followers on Twitter, Facebook, Instagram, etc. That is a super nice and MAJOR way to help out as well!!! You can use the share tools right here on the site.

Travel Itinerary

This is a short list of a few of the states that funding will help me to travel to:

  • Baltimore, Maryland
  • South Carolina
  • Washington D.C.
  • San Fransisco, California
  • Seattle, Washington
  • Portland, Oregon
  • Texas

Other Ways To Help

Understandably some people are not able to contribute financially, but that doesn't mean you can't help in other ways...

NOTE: ALL Donations (Large or Small) is appreciated, and a Thank You with the Donors name, will be posted on the (www.weareleatherwomen.com) website.

  • I also accept reward points!!!
  • Airline Mileage, Amtrak points, Hotel points, Bolt Bus Tickets and more...
  • Gift Cards you aren't using (this helps pay for meals in various cities)
  • For small financial donations you may also donate directly to the travel fund on the www.weareleatherwomen.com website.

Share this page with others who may be able to help.

Indiegogo has share tools!


Thank you in advance from the bottom of my heart.

C. Creane

story:
You can choose between 6 models of our collection: we have called them Versante (the Italian word for side of the mountain) Nord, Est, Sud and Ovest (with PVD case and brushed steel case). A new version is available now: the AVERAU Croce di Vetta (with white dial).

 

 

echo/neutra is a new Italian brand devoted to Mechanical Watches Enthusiasts and is born from the meeting of its 2 founders: Nicola Callegaro, Designer and Communication Consultant and Cristiano Quaglia, Aerospace Engineer with a specialization in Propulsion Systems.

echo/neutra combines our two great passions: mechanical watchmaking and mountains, especially the Dolomites, a UNESCO World Heritage Site since 2009. Here from childhood we spent a lot of time with our families and still today we admire its special "Raw beauty". 

The Dolomites, backdrop and soul of our echo/neutra line of watches. echo/neutra’s new line of watches has been inspired by the Dolomites, the place where our idea and project come to life and which still excites us and challenges our creativity each day.

These awesome mountains stir high emotions and breathe new life into us. And they never get old. We always discover a new place, a different landscape, a new challenge. Here the rush of emotions is ever changing as Mother Nature reveals its many different facets: powerful, imperious, antagonistic while at the same time silent, ethereal and romantic.

 

Here the beauty of the inert rock has an amazing quality and it's never the same, moment by moment, day after day, season after season… the essence of each moment is defined by time, from the luminous and regenerating early morning hours, to dusk, when the landscape turns a stunning pink.

 

The tip of the seconds hand is a clear reference to the trail signage used by CAI (Italian Alpine Club) in the Dolomites. This particular sign is useful for trekkers and alpine walkers to always find the right way. 

 

  • attentive study and design down to the smallest detail.
  • a style with a strong, well-defined and steadfast character, because we’re not out to please everyone but make those who share our style fall in love with us.
  •  fusion of expertise, tapping into the know-how of experts who have a full understanding of the characteristics of the materials they use and how to enhance their functional aspects.
  •  where manufacturing and design, form and function, and utility and emotion meet. 

 

316L Steel incorporates 2-3% molybdenum to increase the corrosion resistance against chlorides. Due to its superior qualities, 316L Steel is often referred to biomedical applications.

SWISS MADE WATCHES - BUILT TO LAST.

A Swiss Made Watch is a superior product made from high-quality components. Such a focus on quality makes Swiss Made Watches an excellent choice, whether you are a first-time buyer or a watch collector: they're the most valued and respected watches in the market.

A Swiss Made Watch is not just a temporary accessory, a fashion fad or a trend: it can last for generations. From the movement to the case, the quality of materials distinguishes Swiss Made Watches from other brands.

The 316L surgical grade steel of the case is top resistant to corrosion and can be re-polished when scratched. The sapphire crystal has an incredibly high scratch resistance, in order to keep your watch clear for many years.
 

The movements of the AVERAU are hand-assembled. This, combined with the use of metal gears, ensures great quality internal mechanisms. 

 

Swiss Made Watches are designed to last and the use of high-quality materials enables watchmakers to repair scratched or broken parts.

 

We want to realize Swiss Made watches to provide to our customer the best quality without compromises.

For a long time, we have looked for the best craft workshop, the one which better embraces our high qualitative standards.

The choices made by our partner through the years, justify and partly help to understand how he arrived at today high-quality production. The business location is in an old countryside house which lodges in perfect harmony the production workshop, the offices and an old stable with several horses. 

An old hayloft has become a luminous laboratory, the cows' stable has turned into a spacious and functional office. The actual production comes from the traditional techniques of leather manufacturing, which have been then transferred to the world of watch straps.

The strength of our proposal is the quality of our straps: the leathers we use are the best ones in the Italian market, the endurance of the parts (attach bend, fastening buckle, etc) is insured by our know-how. The finishings go from the handmade remborded edges to the burnishing and waxing of the cut edges and the seams are of the saddle type.

 

 

 

 

The Rifugio Leather Watch Wallet is ideal for frequent traveller, with the capacity to stow a single timepiece. The leather is one of the finest Italian leathers (vegetable tanned) used in the production of luxury goods, guaranteeing excellent quality. The Watch Wallet is handmade by Francesco, an Italian artisan with years of experience in leather processing and finishing.

  echo/neutra is a new Italian brand devoted to Mechanical Watches Enthusiasts and is born from the meeting of its 2 founders: Nicola Callegaro, Designer and Communication Consultant and Cristiano Quaglia, Aerospace Engineer with a specialization in Propulsion Systems.echo/neutra combines our two great passions: mechanical watchmaking and mountains, especially the Dolomites, a UNESCO World Heritage Site since 2009. Here from childhood we spent a lot of time with our families and still today we admire its special "Raw beauty".  
The Dolomites, backdrop and soul of our echo/neutra line of watches. echo/neutra’s new line of watches has been inspired by the Dolomites, the place where our idea and project come to life and which still excites us and challenges our creativity each day.These awesome mountains stir high emotions and breathe new life into us. And they never get old. We always discover a new place, a different landscape, a new challenge. Here the rush of emotions is ever changing as Mother Nature reveals its many different facets: powerful, imperious, antagonistic while at the same time silent, ethereal and romantic.Tre Cime di Lavaredo 

Tre Cime di Lavaredo Natural Park Here the beauty of the inert rock has an amazing quality and it's never the same, moment by moment, day after day, season after season… the essence of each moment is defined by time, from the luminous and regenerating early morning hours, to dusk, when the landscape turns a stunning pink.Cinque Torri 

The Sorapis Lake with its wonderful turquoise water 
 The tip of the seconds hand is a clear reference to the trail signage used by CAI (Italian Alpine Club) in the Dolomites. This particular sign is useful for trekkers and alpine walkers to always find the right way.   
 
 

attentive study and design down to the smallest detail.
a style with a strong, well-defined and steadfast character, because we’re not out to please everyone but make those who share our style fall in love with us.
 fusion of expertise, tapping into the know-how of experts who have a full understanding of the characteristics of the materials they use and how to enhance their functional aspects.
 where manufacturing and design, form and function, and utility and emotion meet. 
 
 316L Steel incorporates 2-3% molybdenum to increase the corrosion resistance against chlorides. Due to its superior qualities, 316L Steel is often referred to biomedical applications. 
 
 
 


 SWISS MADE WATCHES - BUILT TO LAST.A Swiss Made Watch is a superior product made from high-quality components. Such a focus on quality makes Swiss Made Watches an excellent choice, whether you are a first-time buyer or a watch collector: they're the most valued and respected watches in the market.A Swiss Made Watch is not just a temporary accessory, a fashion fad or a trend: it can last for generations. From the movement to the case, the quality of materials distinguishes Swiss Made Watches from other brands.The 316L surgical grade steel of the case is top resistant to corrosion and can be re-polished when scratched. The sapphire crystal has an incredibly high scratch resistance, in order to keep your watch clear for many years. The movements of the AVERAU are hand-assembled. This, combined with the use of metal gears, ensures great quality internal mechanisms.  Swiss Made Watches are designed to last and the use of high-quality materials enables watchmakers to repair scratched or broken parts. 
 We want to realize Swiss Made watches to provide to our customer the best quality without compromises. 
 
For a long time, we have looked for the best craft workshop, the one which better embraces our high qualitative standards.The choices made by our partner through the years, justify and partly help to understand how he arrived at today high-quality production. The business location is in an old countryside house which lodges in perfect harmony the production workshop, the offices and an old stable with several horses. An old hayloft has become a luminous laboratory, the cows' stable has turned into a spacious and functional office. The actual production comes from the traditional techniques of leather manufacturing, which have been then transferred to the world of watch straps.The strength of our proposal is the quality of our straps: the leathers we use are the best ones in the Italian market, the endurance of the parts (attach bend, fastening buckle, etc) is insured by our know-how. The finishings go from the handmade remborded edges to the burnishing and waxing of the cut edges and the seams are of the saddle type.
  
 
 
  
  
Detail of the date window and the typical seconds hand tip 

The shiny details achieved with the 3-pieces case type. 
2649 MSLM: between 7 and 8 you find the height of the Mount Averau. 

The custom engraved crown with the stylized shape of the Mount. 

The Sapphire glass with Anti-reflective coating.   
 
The Versante Sud 

The Versante Nord 

The Versante Est 

The Versante Ovest Steel version 

The Versante Ovest PVD version 

The Versante Nord on the wrist 

The Versante Sud 

The Versante Nord on the wrist 

The Versante Nord on the wrist 

The Versante Nord on the wrist 
 
 The Rifugio Leather Watch Wallet is ideal for frequent traveller, with the capacity to stow a single timepiece. The leather is one of the finest Italian leathers (vegetable tanned) used in the production of luxury goods, guaranteeing excellent quality. The Watch Wallet is handmade by Francesco, an Italian artisan with years of experience in leather processing and finishing. 
 

A detail of the Rifugio Watch Wallet 

Our artisan working on the Rifugio Watch Wallet (Brown Leather version) 

Working on the Rifugio Watch Wallet (Brown Leather version)

story:
Hello!
We’re Daciana & Mircea, the founders of 74Street, and we wanted to create a fashionable bag that would suit every need & style.

Handmade in Transylvania from the finest organic leather, the VERSA bag incorporates a classic design with a  twist that fits our modern needs.



 

What makes it special?

The VERSA bag can be worn in 5 ways. 

  1. Backpack
  2. Shoulder bag
  3. Messenger bag
  4. Carry-on bag for travel
  5. Briefcase



The VERSA was created with style & utility in mind. A his and hers bag that can be used for any occasion, from a business meeting to traveling around the world. 

It is made entirely by hand out of full-grain leather of the highest quality, it is both scratchproof and waterproof.
It has a metal frame closure with a tuck-lock clasp and metal feet on its bottom to ensure durability and structure, our bag will serve you a lifetime. 

 

 

The VERSA is travel friendly.

Its shape and size are calculated to fit perfectly in the cabin of a plane as a carry-on. The suitcase sleeve on the back and two buckled 3D front pockets offer a way to attach the bag to your suitcase for easy travel and quick access to your phone and passport, respectively.

Adjustable and removable shoulder and backpack straps, as well as the top handle, make for this bag to be worn in multiple ways and numerous occasions. It can be held like a briefcase, worn over the shoulder, across the body like a messenger bag or as a backpack for when you’re riding a bike.

Stay organized with VERSA

The design and clamshell clasp allows you to easily access the interior, where you have many organizer pockets each serving different uses resulting in a highly functional bag: briefcase, laptop bag, diaper bag, messenger bag, carry-on, overnight or weekender bag, school back-pack, etc. A large compartment can house a 15” laptop, side compartments can hold bottles or anything that needs to sit right side up, and other small pockets for keeping small things in their place.
 

Something else

To make the VERSA even more special and personal we can personalize it with an engraving that can have your logo, name or a quote you fancy!
This makes the VERSA a great gift as well.   


Our goal

We have created the VERSA as a flagship design to launch on crowdfunding sites, so all the funds will go to building a new workshop.

After almost ten years of honing our craft as 74Street and achieving a greater level of efficiency and design, our goal is to build and own our own space, for larger-scale production and retail.
This way we can give back to our community by creating a well-equipped workshop & a creative environment for future designers that are interested in learning about our trade.

PERKS

Make sure to check out our donation packages!
You can get the VERSA bag at a great price, or you can check out the rest of the goodies we have prepared for you (his and hers wallets & his and her bracelets)
If you wish to donate to help us grow, any amount helps and we will add you to our group where we share some behind the scenes of our little workshop and the process behind making our bags.
Thank you! 


Our Story

We are two licensed designers, joined in love, marriage and eventually in business to create the 74Street brand.
With over twenty-five years of experience in leatherwork crafting and design, we confidently assure a lifetime guarantee for all of our products.
Make sure to visit our online shop: 74streetbags.com we are certain you will find something that will catch your eye, and keep in touch on our social media accounts: Facebook & Instagram

 

Summary

Materials

  • Body: full-grain crazy horse leather

  • Hardwear: brass

  • Lining: durable hydrophobic cotton

  • Stitching: industrial grade cotton thread

Main Features

  • Metal frame top closure and tuck-lock clasp

  • Fortified base and metal feet

  • Two buckled front 3D pockets

  • Adjustable and removable shoulder and backpack straps

  • Interior laptop compartment (up to 15”)

  • Inner zippered pocket

  • Large and small organizer compartments

  • Trolley sleeve

  • Plane cabin friendly

  • Waterproof

Dimensions

Width: 40 cm  |  Depth: 19 cm  |  Height: 33 cm  |  Weight: 2.4 kg 

  

Shipping

1st Class Priority Shipping in Europe of up to 5 days and worldwide 7 to 10 days. FREE!

story:
***UPDATE!!! Thank you so so much for helping me reach my fixed goal! You have gotten me so excited that I'd really love to aim for $800. This will mean that I can add a flash dryer to my set up. With a dryer I can get quite a few more shirts printed in a session. Again, thank you so much!!***

 

Love Babbles’ designs are here to try to make you smile. To remind you why you work so hard to parent your child. To bring a lift in your day! These shirts are especially great as gifts for parents that you know because every parent goes through rough times with their kiddo and could use a little extra love.

There is nothing like the sweet snuggles of your baby and the way that they greet you when you get them up for a nap. There is also nothing remotely similar to spending hours in the middle of the night with your baby while they are screaming. The highs and the lows of parenthood are far apart and often the one person you’re spending all your energy on, can’t tell you how much they appreciate it.

   "you are beautiful (with or without caffiene)"

My inspiration

The idea formed first and foremost from many hours spent in the middle of the night with my oldest daughter, Maya. I realized that no matter the support system I had in place,  there were still times that it would be nice to look at her and be reminded that my work was appreiciated.

As I started to mull over what that reminder would look like, I found inspiration from movements Operation Beautiful and To Write Love on Her Arms. I also read multiple articles this summer that added fuel to the fire that is the “mommy wars.” (Topics such as breastfeeding and going back to work were the big ones this summer).I want to help find relief from those wars. Trust that each parent is parenting in a way that is just right for their child and encourage them in their work. So! Let’s get on to.....

 "you are beautiful (especially at 2am)"

 

The Designs!!

There are currently 6 finished designs. However, I only have two screens, so only “2 am’ and “caffiene” are actually complete and ready to go. That’s where you come in! Funding for this project will allow me to add more screens and designs to my rotation. It will also allow me to have a couple of extra screens for custom projects or any new designs that come up!

How the shirts are made:

  • Each shirt is hand screen printed by me in my home.
  • I use water based inks for safety/eco-conscious resons.
  • I'm currently enjoying upcycling gently worn shirts/bodysuits for now )(sizes through 24m.)
  • All perk shirts/bodysuits are white, but keep an eye on my etsy shop for other colors and stripes in the future!


               (this custom shirt available at the $50 and $100 Perk levels)

 

Perks

Check out the list of perks on the right hand side for all of the specifics. I've put a delivery date of January 15th, but if you have a baby shower coming up or were hoping to make this a Christmas present, please let me know! As soon as you have pledged the amount you have in mind, send an email to lovebabblesdesigns@gmail.com to talk about the designsyou would like and the date you were hoping to have them by.

The "beautiful letter" design is customizable. Available at the $50 and $100 level, the names in the letter may be changed, as well as the color of the heart.

At the $100 level, you get to work with me to create a design just for you! The butterfly kisses design in the gallery is an example of a commisioned piece I've done.

All designs in the Gallery are available as perks!

 

 

 


Funding

All fundraising efforts will go toward:

  • New screens

  • Ink and other printing supplies

  • Ensuring that I am CPSIA compliant (child safety laws)

  • Business supplies such as cards and stickers


Any funds over the amount I am requesting will go towards stocking up on more shirts, dye for limited edition colors and a flash dryer.

story:
ONLY 3 DAYS LEFT 

Be among the initial funders, at pre-order prices! Prices will go up after the campaign ends! 


Introducing

LEX Ultra-Minimalist 
Sunglasses

Lex Parsimoniae is about eliminating the superfluous, focusing only on the essential. 

And make that essential better.


 Simply put...

    » Sleek, understated, timeless design:  Look good for decades to come.

     » World’s most lighweight sunglasses (15 grams INCLUDING the lenses):
        Simply the most comfortable pair of frames you’ll ever own.

     » Lenses by Carl Zeiss® Vision, usually only offered on $200+ retail sunglasses:  
        Ultimate comfort for your eyes.

     » Lifetime warranty:  If your frames ever break (you’ll have to try very hard...),
        we’ll replace it. Period.

     » Home TRY-ON kit included with all pledges: Try ALL our models before
        setting your choice.

     » Simple-most design. Every gram of matter has its function.
        Nothing superfluous.

     » Amazing value. Prices won't be that low after the campaign. Now is the time
        to jump on it! Even more so at EARLY BIRD SPECIAL PRICES!


* Now Featured on Crowdfundfusion.com

* Our website www.lexparsimoniae.co is also featured on
   www.strikingly.com (gallery section)


 Home Try-On kit
     (included with all pledges)

Try ALL THE 7 Different shapes BEFORE choosing which model suits you best.

How? 

Easy. Buy a plane ticket to Montreal (YUL). Take a cab from airport to 406 St-Eloi in old Montreal. Ring Suite 200. Climb up the stairs. Meet us. Have a bagel (the bests are from Montreal...). Try the prototype frames we have. (please call to schedule before, just in case we are off that day...).

OR

Go to the post. Wait until you get your Try-on kit (included in all pledges - will ship about 2 weeks after campaign ends). Open it. Try all the shapes in the comfort of your pajamas. Look at yourself in the mirror from all angles, extensively. Take pictures, ask friends. Don't listen to friends. Make your choice. 


Our collection has 7 different models to choose from. We will send a TRY-ON kit (2 weeks after campaign’s closing) to ALL our campaign supporters. The Kit includes 7 real-size cutout shapes, and 1 information leaflet.

Cut out of cardboard, these mock-up are EXACT replicas of our frames dimensions. This is actually how we design and test the shapes during development: We cut the exact shapes with a laser and strap it onto our faces (and then have our face marked with black stripes from the laser burning...).


 The Collection

7 shapes, all available in a choice of 2 3 colour combinations:
     » Silver Stainless frame w/ gradient brown lenses
     » Black frame w/ gradient grey lenses

     » New 18K GOLD plated Limited Edition available

(Check our gallery - right tab on top of the page - to see larger pics and additional images)



Grey lenses offer the best colour rendering (most neutral) while the brown lenses will increase the contrasts. 


 Polarized lenses (optional)
Polarized lenses offer an additional protection from light, as they also blocks horizontal rays of light, including those reflected off horizontal surfaces such as water and snow (seen as glare). Non-polarized lenses will filter down these rays but won't block them completely as polarized lenses do.

Good for: 

  1. Water activities
  2. Driving (with some exception, see next line below)

Not great for: 

  1. Spotting oil or icy patches on the road (they will be harder to spot as they can usually be seen because of the intense reflection they create) - not recommended for riding motorcycle
  2. Liquid crystal displays (LCD), found on mobile phones and some dashboard instruments, can become invisible at certain angles.


 In the details

THE LENSES
Lenses were the main focus of this project from the start. We wanted to offer the best possible lenses, while maintaining an affordable price. We quickly selected German Optical Powerhouse Zeiss®, reputed for their outstanding lens quality in many fields (camera, telescope, prescription and sunglass). We met several times with them (thanks for your patience Mariele!) and even went in Italy to convince them (thank you Pietro) to let us use their amazing lenses, even if our price point was going to be well under their usual brand requirements.  We like to think they liked our objective of offering their great lenses to a wider audience. 

LENSES TECHNICAL SPECS

     » Producer: Carl Zeiss Vision, Italy
     » Material: Polyamid (Nylon-type) w/ gradient tint
     » Base 6 curvature
     » Filter Category: 2 (suitable for driving use)
     » Backside Anti-reflection coating
     » Back side and Front side Ri-Pel™ super-hydrophobic coating
     » 100% UV-A and UV-B protection
     » Optional polarizing filter

«Comfortable» lenses
The quality of lenses goes well beyond the protection from UV rays. Today, most pharmacy sunglasses will offer a good enough protection from UV.  The difference rather lies in the visual comfort and accuracy the lenses will provide. Such qualities come from high optical quality, only obtained with highly rigorous manufacturing processes and best raw materials. High quality lenses result in less optical distortion, and a smoother transmission of light, hence providing a more accurate perception of details and depth, and sort of a «relaxing» effect to the eyes.

To ensure a perfect visual comfort in all situation, we decided to add an anti-reflect coating to the back of the lenses, to eliminate disturbing glare that may sometime occur when lights bounce on the lenses from the side or from the back.

Super easy to clean
As an extra, we also added Zeiss' Ri-Pel™ treatment to all our lenses. This super-hydrophobic treatment «seals» the surface of the lenses, so water beads and roll off (oil and dust slip off the surface as well), making the lenses much easier to clean. The treatment also provide an additional scratch-resistance.


THE FRAME
As we over stated by now (...), we want our first product to be the embodiment of our philosophy of «less is more». So we simply remove all we could to only keep the bare essential. Our frames are made out of a single piece of high-end Japanese stainless steel (this is the same steel used to make high precision chirurgical instruments such as scalpels). Hinges? Screws? Soldering? No need, so we got rid of.

Wide unobstructed field-of-view
The frame curvature offers a wrap-style protection so sunlights won't get in from the sides. On the other hand, our tiny temples keep the sides unobstructed so you can see if something's in your blind spots (especially useful when driving).

FRAME TECHNICAL SPECS 

     » Material: Japanese Stainless Steel (confidential grade...:), allergenic-free   
        (nickel-free stainless steel)     
     » Frame weight: 5g (15 g with the lenses)
     » IP plating (for colours other then Silver Stainless)
     » Medical-grade silicon nose pads
     » Wrapped-design (the frame curvature fits tighter to the face)
     » Easy adjustable temple tips and nose pads
     » No hinge, screws or welding

2 Great Polyamid lenses. 1 piece of cutting-edge Japanese stainless steel. A dash of medical-grade silicon. When using top ingredients, no need for a complex recipe.

 Lifetime Warranty. Yeah you read right.

While we claim our frames are so good, it would be ridiculous to only offer a standard warranty, right?

Right.

And besides, there's only one part to warranty (the frame is a one piece, remember?). So there it is: LIFETIME WARRANTY. You break it, we'll replace it (nominal shipping charges may apply).


 A simple case

In our opinion, it would be a non-sense to send these amazing sunglasses in a cheap pouch. So we designed a (you guessed it) super-simple protective case. A beautiful strip of thick genuine leather simply folded and minimally sewn. Conveniently flat (when empty), it can also be used for other sunglasses or Rx frames.


 Project Development

A slice of the development process, in images. A lot of work. A lot of fun.

 About us

Our background is Industrial Design. But we consider ourselves, first and foremost, entrepreneurs. We like to try new and different things, innovate. We spent the last 10 years in the eyewear industry, designing for others and for our own collection (www.swapeyewear.com). 

We want this product to be the first of many. And while we are eyewear specialists, we have several ideas for innovative portable products (check out our upcoming blog  on our upcoming website periodically to learn more on this), always with a focus on quality over quantity.

We are based in Montreal. With winter approaching, temperature here is on a steep downhill. Your support will warm our hearts ;).


 How YOU can help in just a few seconds (and how to get a free pair for yourself...)

We have completed the design, validated with multiple samples (thanks John!). We got a deal with Zeiss to get their amazing lenses. We are ready to go.

Now we need YOU!!

You can do a lot to help our project succeed with just a few seconds of your time...


  1. » Pledge for a case or a frame ;) (ABOUT 90 SECONDS TOTAL, INCLUDING  
       REGISTRATION TO INDIEGOGO)

  2. » Like or share this page, or our Facebook page (lex_parsimoniae)
       (ABOUT 5 sec)

  3. » Copy and share the link to this page (see the REFERRAL PROGRAM details
       below to find out how this could earn you a free pair!    )

From now on, it's out of our hands and into yours. Spread the word!


REFERRAL PROGRAM: Use Indiegogo sharing tools to get yourself a free pair!

3 easy steps (total 20 sec)

  1. Sign up to Indiegogo (top right of this page). Only need to enter your name, email and password (10 sec);
  2. As soon as you are signed in, the page will generate your unique referral link code in the box right under the main video;
  3. Copy that link and paste it in an email, or in any social media.

Voila! When people click through your unique link, they will be directed to this page and their activity will be registered under your referral. If they buy a frame, we'll know it's coming from you. If you refer us 10 buyers (of a Lex-Sunglass, regular or polarized), we'll offer you a free pair of Lex Sunglasses. 

Oh, and if you buy one yourself, we'll throw in your first referral so you'll start at 2.


Why this Indiegogo campaign?

We feel Indiegogo is the perfect place to start. Its structure (direct to consumer) truly allow us to maximize the value we can deliver to the end-consumers (you), while creating the basis of a sustainable business.

This campaign is to serve 3 purposes:

» Validate if there is a demand for our frames. Learn more on what you guys like
   about it and dislike;

» Learn and develop a new way to connect with our consumers. We like to think
   about this as «Social Retail»;

» Help finance the first production run.

Funds will be used to pay for the production of the frames, to buy the lenses and  leather cases and to make the Try-on kits. Oh and a substantial chunk will go on shipping fees (since we included them on all pledges).

Note that prices after the campaign will most probably be increased by 20-50$ as we'll have to factor in marketing costs and risk on stock.


Why put your trust in us?

In short, we know about eyewear (over 15 years of combined experience), have a solid network of suppliers and we've done it before (launch new products). Our first eyewear product was a color-interchangeable frame called Toulch One we developed with Montreal renowned optometrists Harry and Michael Toulch. It was later bought by a big Italian distributor that re-branded it under their Try Change house brand (they seem to have stop selling it but you can still find plenty of images on Google). 

Our second project in eyewear is still existing, even though we suffered serious problems with our distributors and had to restructure our whole business. We recently decided to go full online. Check out www.swapeyewear.com Please keep in mind the website is not yet fully completed!


What are the risks?

We designed and launched 2 collections from scratch. We know there will be hickups. We don't know what yet but we are ready to react promptly. The biggest risk is in the timing. Any delay from one of our supplier may impact the delivery date.

We promise we'll be 100% transparent and keep you informed.

And we will deliver what is promise on this page. An amazing product.

The Lex Team
Guy, Pierre and Louis


What does Lex Parsimoniae means anyway?

It means everything to us. It's our funding principle.

Lex Parsimoniae or Law of Parsimony is a scientific principle also know as Ockham's Razor (named after a 13th Century philosopher monk). Simply put (or to keep what makes sense to us), it state that when you have two similar theories or solutions to a problem, the simpler one should be chosen. 

How does this relate to products or business?  

For us, it means that simplicity should always rule.
story_txt:
ONLY 3 DAYS LEFT Be among the initial funders, at pre-order prices! Prices will go up after the campaign ends! 

IntroducingLEX Ultra-Minimalist Sunglasses

Lex Parsimoniae is about eliminating the superfluous, focusing only on the essential. And make that essential better. Simply put...    » Sleek, understated, timeless design:  Look good for decades to come.     » World’s most lighweight sunglasses (15 grams INCLUDING the
lenses):         Simply the most comfortable pair of frames you’ll ever own.     » Lenses by Carl Zeiss® Vision, usually only offered on $200+
retail sunglasses:           Ultimate comfort for your eyes.     » Lifetime warranty: 
If your frames ever break (you’ll have to try very hard...),         we’ll
replace it. Period.     » Home TRY-ON kit included with all pledges: Try ALL our
models before         setting your choice.     » Simple-most design. Every gram of matter has its function.
        Nothing superfluous.     » Amazing value. Prices won't be that low after the campaign. Now is the time         to jump on it! Even more so at EARLY BIRD SPECIAL PRICES!* Now Featured on Crowdfundfusion.com* Our website www.lexparsimoniae.co is also featured on   www.strikingly.com (gallery section)

 Home Try-On kit     (included with all pledges)Try ALL THE 7 Different shapes BEFORE choosing which model suits you
best.
How? Easy. Buy a plane ticket to Montreal (YUL). Take a cab from airport to 406 St-Eloi in old Montreal. Ring Suite 200. Climb up the stairs. Meet us. Have a bagel (the bests are from Montreal...). Try the prototype frames we have. (please call to schedule before, just in case we are off that day...).
OR
Go to the post. Wait until you get your Try-on kit (included in all pledges - will ship about 2 weeks after campaign ends). Open it. Try all the shapes in the comfort of your pajamas. Look at yourself in the mirror from all angles, extensively. Take pictures, ask friends. Don't listen to friends. Make your choice. 
Our collection has 7 different models to choose from. We
will send a TRY-ON kit (2 weeks after campaign’s closing) to ALL our campaign
supporters. The Kit includes 7 real-size cutout shapes, and 1 information leaflet.
Cut out of cardboard, these mock-up are EXACT replicas of
our frames dimensions. This is actually how we design and test the shapes
during development: We cut the exact shapes with a laser and strap it onto our
faces (and then have our face marked with black stripes from the
laser burning...). The Collection

7 shapes, all available in a choice of 2 3 colour combinations:     » Silver Stainless frame w/ gradient brown lenses     » Black frame w/ gradient grey lenses     » New 18K GOLD plated Limited Edition available(Check our gallery - right tab on top of the page - to see
larger pics and additional images)
Grey lenses offer the best colour rendering (most neutral) while the brown
lenses will increase the contrasts.  Polarized lenses (optional)Polarized lenses offer an additional protection from light, as they also blocks horizontal rays of light, including those reflected off horizontal surfaces such as water and snow (seen as glare). Non-polarized lenses will filter down these rays but won't block them completely as polarized lenses do.Good for: 

Water activities

Driving (with some exception, see next line below)
Not great for: 
Spotting oil or icy patches on the road (they will be harder to spot as they can usually be seen because of the intense reflection they create) - not recommended for riding motorcycle

Liquid crystal displays (LCD), found on mobile phones and some dashboard instruments, can become invisible at certain angles.
 In the detailsTHE LENSESLenses were the main focus of this project from the start. We wanted to offer the best possible lenses, while maintaining an affordable price. We quickly selected German Optical Powerhouse Zeiss®, reputed for their outstanding lens quality in many fields (camera, telescope, prescription and sunglass). We met several times with them (thanks for your patience Mariele!) and even went in Italy to convince them (thank you Pietro) to let us use their amazing lenses, even if our price point was going to be well under their usual brand requirements.  We like to think they liked our objective of offering their great lenses to a wider audience. LENSES TECHNICAL SPECS     » Producer: Carl Zeiss Vision, Italy     » Material: Polyamid (Nylon-type) w/ gradient tint     » Base 6 curvature     » Filter Category: 2 (suitable for driving use)     » Backside Anti-reflection coating     » Back side and Front side Ri-Pel™ super-hydrophobic coating     » 100% UV-A and UV-B protection     » Optional polarizing filter
«Comfortable» lensesThe quality of lenses goes well beyond the protection from UV rays. Today, most pharmacy sunglasses will offer a good enough protection from UV.  The difference rather lies in the visual comfort and accuracy the lenses will provide. Such qualities come from high optical quality, only obtained with highly rigorous manufacturing processes and best raw materials. High quality lenses result in less optical distortion, and a smoother transmission of light, hence providing a more accurate perception of details and depth, and sort of a «relaxing» effect to the eyes.To ensure a perfect visual comfort in all situation, we decided to add an anti-reflect coating to the back of the lenses, to eliminate disturbing glare that may sometime occur when lights bounce on the lenses from the side or from the back.
Super easy to cleanAs an extra, we also added Zeiss' Ri-Pel™ treatment to all our lenses. This super-hydrophobic treatment «seals» the surface of the lenses, so water beads and roll off (oil and dust slip off the surface as well), making the lenses much easier to clean. The treatment also provide an additional scratch-resistance.THE FRAMEAs we over stated by now (...), we want our first product to be the embodiment of our philosophy of «less is more». So we simply remove all we could to only keep the bare essential. Our frames are made out of a single piece of high-end Japanese stainless steel (this is the same steel used to make high precision chirurgical instruments such as scalpels). Hinges? Screws? Soldering? No need, so we got rid of.Wide unobstructed field-of-viewThe frame curvature offers a wrap-style protection so sunlights won't get in from the sides. On the other hand, our tiny temples keep the sides unobstructed so you can see if something's in your blind spots (especially useful when driving).FRAME TECHNICAL SPECS      » Material: Japanese Stainless Steel (confidential grade...:), allergenic-free           (nickel-free stainless steel)          » Frame weight: 5g (15 g with the lenses)     » IP plating (for colours other then Silver Stainless)     » Medical-grade silicon nose pads     » Wrapped-design (the frame curvature fits tighter to the face)     » Easy adjustable temple tips and nose pads     » No hinge, screws or welding2 Great Polyamid lenses. 1 piece of cutting-edge Japanese stainless steel. A dash of medical-grade silicon. When using top ingredients, no need for a complex recipe. Lifetime Warranty. Yeah you read right.While we claim our frames are so good, it would be ridiculous to only offer a standard warranty, right?Right.And besides, there's only one part to warranty (the frame is a one piece, remember?). So there it is: LIFETIME WARRANTY. You break it, we'll replace it (nominal shipping charges may apply). A simple case
In our opinion, it would be a non-sense to send these
amazing sunglasses in a cheap pouch. So we designed a (you guessed it)
super-simple protective case. A beautiful strip of thick genuine leather simply folded and
minimally sewn. Conveniently flat (when empty), it can also be used for other sunglasses or Rx frames.
 Project DevelopmentA slice of the development process, in images. A lot of work. A lot of fun. About usOur background is Industrial Design. But we consider ourselves, first and foremost, entrepreneurs. We like to try new and different things, innovate. We spent the last 10 years in the eyewear industry, designing for others and for our own collection (www.swapeyewear.com). We want this product to be the first of many. And while we are eyewear specialists, we have several ideas for innovative portable products (check out our upcoming blog  on our upcoming website periodically to learn more on this), always with a focus on quality over quantity.We are based in Montreal. With winter approaching, temperature here is on a steep downhill. Your support will warm our hearts ;). How YOU can help in just a few seconds (and how to get a free pair for yourself...)We have completed the design, validated with multiple samples (thanks John!). We got a deal with Zeiss to get their amazing lenses. We are ready to go.Now we need YOU!!You can do a lot to help our project succeed with just a few seconds of your time...
» Pledge for a case or a frame ;) (ABOUT 90 SECONDS TOTAL, INCLUDING      REGISTRATION TO INDIEGOGO)
» Like or share this page, or our Facebook page (lex_parsimoniae)   (ABOUT 5 sec)
» Copy and share the link to this page (see the REFERRAL PROGRAM details    below to find out how this could earn you a free pair!)
From now on, it's out of our hands and into yours. Spread the word!REFERRAL PROGRAM: Use Indiegogo sharing tools to get yourself a free pair!3 easy steps (total 20 sec)

Sign up to Indiegogo (top right of this page). Only need to enter your name, email and password (10 sec);

As soon as you are signed in, the page will generate your unique referral link code in the box right under the main video;

Copy that link and paste it in an email, or in any social media.

Voila! When people click through your unique link, they will be directed to this page and their activity will be registered under your referral. If they buy a frame, we'll know it's coming from you. If you refer us 10 buyers (of a Lex-Sunglass, regular or polarized), we'll offer you a free pair of Lex Sunglasses. Oh, and if you buy one yourself, we'll throw in your first referral so you'll start at 2.Why this Indiegogo campaign?We feel Indiegogo is the perfect place to start. Learn more on what you guys like    about it and dislike;» Learn and develop a new way to connect with our consumers. We like to think    about this as «Social Retail»;» Help finance the first production run.Funds will be used to pay for the production of the frames, to buy the lenses and  leather cases and to make the Try-on kits. Oh and a substantial chunk will go on shipping fees (since we included them on all pledges).Note that prices after the campaign will most probably be increased by 20-50$ as we'll have to factor in marketing costs and risk on stock.
Why put your trust in us?In short, we know about eyewear (over 15 years of combined experience), have a solid network of suppliers and we've done it before (launch new products). Our first eyewear product was a color-interchangeable frame called Toulch One we developed with Montreal renowned optometrists Harry and Michael Toulch. It was later bought by a big Italian distributor that re-branded it under their Try Change house brand (they seem to have stop selling it but you can still find plenty of images on Google). Our second project in eyewear is still existing, even though we suffered serious problems with our distributors and had to restructure our whole business. We recently decided to go full online. Check out www.swapeyewear.com Please keep in mind the website is not yet fully completed!What are the risks?We designed and launched 2 collections from scratch. We know there will be hickups. We don't know what yet but we are ready to react promptly. The biggest risk is in the timing. Any delay from one of our supplier may impact the delivery date.We promise we'll be 100% transparent and keep you informed.And we will deliver what is promise on this page. An amazing product.The Lex TeamGuy, Pierre and LouisWhat does Lex Parsimoniae means anyway?It means everything to us. It's our funding principle.

story:
The Luxury Lingerie shopping experience to spark your creativity, feed your imagination, and bond with your partner.

Hello! I’m Laura Cuttill owner of Fleur de Nuit. Thank you for taking time to watch our short video. We hope it’s given you a little glimpse of our beautiful and daring lingerie line. We're excited to launch our campaign and make these styles available first to our backers who believe in us and see our vision. *We ask that you share this project using the links just below our video, we would be forever grateful!*

A little about me first and then we welcome you explore our campaign!

As the owner, I had a vision to provide a luxurious and social lingerie shopping experience for men and women looking to explore new pleasures and push boundaries through high-quality clothing and accessories from the BEST designers across the U.S. and Europe.

I bring to the table history as a seasoned business owner and operational leader with over 15 years of demonstrated ability to fuse market needs, business drivers, and financial interests into streamlined, profitable operations. After starting 2 businesses and sitting on the board of directors, I am now following my life time dream and passion with Fleur de Nuit which pulls together my entrepreneurial spirit, charisma, people skills and my analytical and creative problem-solving bents to make this new business highly successful.


Now that we have beautiful lines, what's next?

Upon returning on a trip from Europe I realized that women in the U.S. lacked choices when it came to having both LUXURY along with SEXY and DARING styles. The shopping experience inspired me to bring these same choices to women in the U.S. So I shopped, met with, and researched designers who specialize in combining high end, in-house, or hand made pieces with the look I wanted and women need....dramatically Sexy styles!

So we begin by opening a retail boutique in the beautiful Hill Country in Austin, TX. It is in this retail environment that Fleur de Nuit brings a new revolution in luxury lingerie shopping. 

The experience encompasses not only the finest lingerie, but a singular focus on bringing acceptance and excellence to every preference, taste, and body type. Women need not sacrifice beautiful materials, fit, and the sumptuousness of designer labels to outfit themselves for the most provocative fantasies. In addition, the shopping experience is designed to embrace the social experience of couples or groups of women shopping together, including refreshments and ample seating within the privacy of dressing rooms. Personal shoppers and a full line of complimenting accessories contribute to the tailored experience that high-end consumers demand. All the elements of the offering – products, as well as ambiance, and customer service, combine to create a sense of importance, acceptance in an elite group, and fun for those shopping. And we are excited to announce that early next year we will launch our ONLINE STORE for worldwide shopping.

We have set ourselves apart by choosing only pieces that are sewn or hand finished with exquisite details such as French seams, hand beading and hand embroidery. Our carefully selected inventory is very innovative, a masterpiece that tells a story, and chosen to create moments of pleasure.

We offer carefully selected pieces starting with the more adventuresses, sophisticated and provocative line with an alternative point of view. Dramatically sensuous and spicy comes to mind when viewing these items. It is definitely unforgettable. 

We also offer the more feminine approach which brings to mind playful promises. We have exceptional pieces to choose from that is too rare to resist! Expect to see Sexy-Chic lingerie sets and pieces.

What each pledge helps us do

The reason we’ve decided to take on this campaign is not only to gain the funds necessary to establish Fleur de Nuit, but to also spread the word about who we are, what Fleur de Nuit represents, and to offer women a unique option of luxury lingerie with styles ranging from soft and flirty to strong and daring. Fleur de Nuit takes a huge step away from typical styles offered at most department stores by offering beautiful handmade and sewn in house by top U.S. and European designers.

Our goal is to make this available first here in Austin, TX, then across the country and worldwide with our online shopping experience. Now that you have just  flavor of what we will offer, you probably want to know what delicious incentives we offer in return for your generous contributions.  We have several offerings just for you.

All of the items on the right are carefully selected from our lovely designs at various price points for every budget.  Simply select the item you'd like and once your contribution is made, we will send you a survey form to collect information on your sizing and color preferences.  

$5 A BIG Thank YOU! Receive a personalized digital thank you from the bottom of my heart.

$15 10% Shopping Discount: It only costs you $15, but could SAVE you hundreds! Whether you come into the store when it opens, or you buy online when we launch our online store in January, you can use this coupon code for 10% off the total of any single purchase.

$35 Fishnet Stockings: Stylish and quintessential, these girogia fishnet thigh-highs give a poised Italian twist to traditional fishnet stockings. The subtle micro-fishnet pattern cleverly allow glimpses of bare skin; they add a racy touch to both business and evening wear. The feminine fishnet carries from a slim shiny lace band right down to the toe.  Stockings come in a beautiful slide-out box, perfect for gifting and storing these treasures. 

                                            


$35 Laser-Cut Black Mask: Good for parties, costumes, or just a little spice and games in private times, these precision-cut masquerade masks are made of a lightweight metal, conforming comfortably to the face.  They are each set with Swarovski crystals and tie behind the head with a delicate satin ribbon.  Upon confirmation of your contribution, you’ll be given your choice of different 3 styles. For more images: http://fleurdenuitaustin.com/?page_id=561

$50 Fishnet Gloves: Add that little something extra to catch his eye with these long, elegant fishnet gloves.  The fine mesh is made soft to the touch and stretchy for all-evening wear by the confident, alluring woman.

      


$50 Fleur de Nuit Robe: A simple, sexy memento, these robes are made with a polyblend. The FDN logo is embroidered on the right side.  They were first sourced as uniforms for our models to wear over bra and panty sets while serving as hostesses at our events. However, the reaction to them was so overwhelmingly positive that we kept them around as an entry point to some of our finer lingerie. This crowd-funding campaign is your opportunity to get your limited run of these, as we will not be selling them in the store! For larger and more images: http://fleurdenuitaustin.com/?page_id=578


$100 Geisha Handcuffs: Luxury bondage – Get yourself cuffed in the name of love with these delicate Chantilly lace handcuffs. The Geisha Handcuffs (available in ivory or black) are a feminine, racy treat for in the boudoir. Wear them alone as an accessory, or hook the detachable dazzling Swarovski crystal beaded chain to create glamorous handcuffs. 


$125 Caluna Lacquer Dress: The Caluna Lacquer dress is a seductive statement that successfully mixes sexy and romantic in a very tempting alchemy. Made from ‘wet look’ fabric, this dress is a serious look but very wearable.  The material feels soft and supple against the skin, but breathes easily, never causing perspiration like leather or latex.  Best of all, it’s completely machine washable, making garment care a dream.  Suitable for inner or outerwear, the abundance of laces give a feminine grace to this powerful look.


$150 Geisha Handcuffs & Blindfold: Absolutely exquisite, this delicate Chantilly lace blindfold and handcuff set is truly a tribute to love and romance. Embellished with Swarovski crystals and satin ribbon, she’ll feel spoiled in luxury while in complete surrender.  (available in black or ivory)


$250 Aida Robe: The Aida collection is the embodiment of innocence and elegance.  The silk satin lace is smooth against the skin and handmade from a romantic floral patterned lace with matching pure silk satin trimmings. Delicately sensual & totally gorgeous, it’s perfect for the sophisticated bride. Made to order in London.

(*Matching g-string, soft bra, garter, or bodysuit available for an extra charge upon request.) For more images: http://fleurdenuitaustin.com/?page_id=546 


$450 Josephine Harness Set: Made from luxurious stretch satin and sexy sheer Chantilly lace, this shoulder harness attaches to the knickers with a detachable waist harness. Beautifully tailored collar with gold metal trims opens at back of neck with button detail. Fully smooth and wearable by day or ready for an unexpected twist at night. Made in the U.K. For more image http://fleurdenuitaustin.com/?page_id=595


$650 Stardust Chemise & Knickers: We simply cannot take our eyes off this dazzling halterneck chemise, so we’re pretty sure that whoever has the pleasure of seeing you in it will have their breath taken away, too.  Two layers of luxurious silk chiffon flow gloriously from the silk chiffon-tied halterneck neckline, encrusted with sparkling clear Swarovski crystals. Matching sidetie knickers complete the ensemble. Handmade in Germany. Blindfold and wrist ties not included, but available. Black or ivory. For more images http://fleurdenuitaustin.com/?page_id=602


$850 Marine Dress: This fantastic figure-hugging long lacquer dress is the perfect blend of femininity and authority.  You’ll be sure to steal the show at any exclusive party. The ‘wet look’ fabric in this dress wears and breathes like a second skin. The drop waist falls into layers of lace and tulle – light, flowing and comfortable.  It can be worn with or without a brief… It’s your game. Each garment is made to order in France. For more images: http://fleurdenuitaustin.com/?page_id=614


$1500 Muse Corset & Sidetie Knickers: Each Felice Art Couture piece is a handmade work of art out of Germany, aiming to put old-school glamour back into luxury lingerie.  This corset is sheer polka dot tulle, laid over a satin silk lining and supported by steel boning. The hem is intricately embroidered and beaded with Swarovski crystals with a thousand details making it definitely charming and tempting. Beautiful lines in this piece accentuate the curves at the top and slim the waist. For more images http://fleurdenuitaustin.com/?page_id=619


$3500 Divine Diva Robe: The crowning jewel of the Fleur de Nuit collection, this Felice Art Couture robe is every inch the dream it looks.  Made from georgette, lined with 100% whisper-pink satin silk, and trimmed with ostrich feathers, this robe graces the boudoirs of an exclusive group of women. It flows with the same grace and elegance down the runway that it does in the quiet evening hours dressing for dinner or waiting for a lover. For more images http://fleurdenuitaustin.com/?page_id=627


Once the campaign is complete, we will send out a form to collect your size and color preferences. Don't hesitate to contact us here with any questions. We're standing by to help.

Thank you for your support! - Laura Cuttill
