story:
*CLICK HERE TO LEARN MORE ON OUR WEBSITE*


Create your own perfume or cologne in a custom-designed bottle with the innovative UNIQUE Fragrance online design-tool.


Made from more than 150 billion possible combinations and hand-made exclusively for you or the ones you love. The New Art of Tailored Luxury!


The way you smell is just as important as the way you look, so why should you have to smell like someone else? At UNIQUE, you have over 150 billion possible fragrance combinations to choose from.


Our intuitive recommendation engine gives you the power to intuitionally create a scent that perfectly fits you and what you love. Our recommendation engine balances all scent options to make sure that no matter what you choose, you'll have a perfectly balanced fragrance.

In the final stages, our fragrance specialists carefully mix and create your custom perfume or cologne. Can't get enough of it? We'll save your fragrance ID so you can order it again and again!


In order to stay UNIQUE we only  use the highest grade ingredients on the market. Whether from the sunny hills of southern Spain or the floral valleys of French Provence, we strive to provide you with quality you can smell. Each UNIQUE fragrance is made with 15% perfume oil, creating a luxurious scent experience that can last up to 24 hours.


Choose from over 10 designer glass bottles of various shapes and colors, you can write your name or upload your own artwork or logos, which are printed onto the bottle with a permanent color print process. Each fragrance is packed and shipped by hand, and our service consultants are available for any requests you may have.


It all started at a party, talking to friends. One of them talked about just having bought a new fragrance - and then shortly after, meeting another women using the exact same perfume. The idea was born: We are unique - Our most personal accessory, our smell, should be unique too!

We have been working for years to make this intriguing idea turn into reality. At first we have tried to do it all by ourselves, experimenting with all kinds of essential oils. Soon we realized that we needed professional help. We have been working with great perfumers, designers and engineers in the US, in Europe and across the world. We have developed the progressive UNIQUE fragrance technology which has been awarded the Global Innovation Award, the Service Innovation Award and the Think Different Innovation Award. Now we want to bring this great product to the market, launching our website and opening our perfume lab in NYC, USA. Our vision: Making perfume UNIQUE!



The UNIQUE team is a crew of highly motivated fragrance professionals with an ambition to change the world of perfumery. We joined forces because we believe in a world of mass consumption and anonymity there is need for something new. Because we want to embrace the value of true craftsmanship and individuality. Because we believe true luxury is UNIQUE.



When do I get my custom fragrance?

In August you will receive a personal invitation email with a web-link to create your custom scent with our UNIQUE Fragrance system. Our website will be exclusively open for our backers, before public availability. Our perfume artists will be there to assist with your order and to create the perfect scent for you or your loved ones.


Can I give my perk as a gift?

Feel free to forward your personal invitation email to your loved-ones. If you prefer a nice gift card, please tell our support and we are happy to provide it to you for free. We are eager to create the perfect gift together with you!


What about the business perks?

If you choose a business perk (business pack or corporate package) our perfume artist will contact you immediately after campaign completion. We will discuss your wishes and create 3 samples for you. If needed, our artists go back to lab to create another series of 3 samples. After you found your perfect fragrance recipe and we agreed on a bottle and a package design our production process will start. This will typically take 2-4 weeks until your business line is shipped to you.

What if I don’t like the custom-tailored fragrance creation?

We are keen on creating perfect fragrances and happy customer relationships. Therefore we are offering all backers a full money-back guarantee. This guarantee does not apply for the business or corporate package which come with previous sampling.


How can I use the money-back guarantee?

If you are not 100% satisfied with your personal creation, you can return your perfume or cologne within the first two weeks after receiving it. We will refund you the value of the perk. To use the money-back service, you will find a section with a returns form on our website. If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact our support.

Where are you shipping and how much are your shipping costs?

We are shipping worldwide! All perks are shipped worldwide without any additional costs.


How long does the shipping take?

Shipping within the US may presumably take up to 7 days. Worldwide shipping may take 12-20 days. Shipping times are calculated from the day you submitted your order, using our UNIQUE Fragrance online tool (invitation codes will be sent in August).


Can I select a different shipping address?

Yes. After we sent you your invitation code for our UNIQUE Fragrance tool in August, you have the option to do so. You will be able to submit a shipping address that differs from your own address.


Who is your shipping provider and how can I track my parcel?

We still have not decided on the provider. We may ship with UPS, FedEx or USPS. We are shipping to Europe with DHL. With Track & Trace you will be able to track you parcel once we manufactured it. You will receive a shipping confirmation email with a tracking link after your order.


Can I pick up my fragrance locally in NYC?

At this point we are not offering a local pick up. But shipping is free and shouldn’t take too long locally.

How do I create my own perfume using the UNIQUE Fragrance system?

You will receive a personal invitation code in August. Our online tool then allows you to create your own perfume and to design your own bottle. All fragrances and notes are developed by our perfumers and can be combined to perfect harmony. Our fragrance tool gives you suggestions of which notes to combine.  If you are still uncertain, you can  choose the bespoke service option in the process for free. Our fragrance experts will then create the fragrance for you according to your ideas and wishes.

How many notes / aromas can I combine?

You can combine up to 6 different notes. To increase intensity of a specific note, you can also select specific notes twice or more. With more than 150 billion possible combinations your perfume is most likely absolutely unique.

How do I know that my custom perfumes smells good?

We have developed our fragrances and the technology in cooperation with experienced perfumers and engineers. The system is completely intuitive and has been awarded the Global Innovation Award, the Service Innovation Award and the Think Different Innovation Award. We are sure you will be able to create your perfect custom scent! And if you are not completely satisfied, we are happy to inform you about our money back guarantee. Please feel free to contact our service for help and fragrance consultation at any time.

How are the fragrances produced?

All fragrances are carefully produced by hand by experienced perfume artists. Automated printing helps us with the customization of the bottles. Only after our fragrance experts tested and approved a creation it is being sent to a consumer.

What are your fragrances made from?

Like all premium fragrances, it contains perfume oils and ethanol. We are using 15% premium perfume oils (Eau de Parfum) for an intense and lasting fragrance experience. Our perfume oils contain exclusive natural essential oils and designer notes. We are sourcing our essences from established European partners, mainly in southern France (Provence), Spain and Italy.

Can I receive a sample in advance?

Our UNIQUE fragrance tool works completely intuitive. Therefore we do not supply samples and can still guarantee great results.  In case you should not be 100% satisfied, we are happy to offer you our money-back guarantee. If you are uncertain, you can also use our bespoke service.

How does the bespoke fragrance service work?

Our UNIQUE fragrance tool offers you the option to design the fragrance yourself or to use our bespoke service. For the bespoke service we developed a special questionnaire. Our fragrance experts will then develop the perfume according to your personal wishes and preferences. The perfume bottle you can design yourself using our online tool. A bespoke perfume is also a great idea for a personal gift. When using the online form, just state that the perfume is for someone else and let us know the recipient’s preferences. Exclusively for all backers the bespoke options comes free with their perk.
story_txt:
*CLICK HERE TO LEARN MORE ON OUR WEBSITE*
Create your own perfume or cologne in a custom-designed bottle with the innovative UNIQUE Fragrance online design-tool.



Made from more than 150 billion possible combinations and hand-made exclusively for you or the ones you love. The New Art of Tailored Luxury!




The way you smell is just as important as the way you look, so why should you have to smell like someone else? At UNIQUE, you have over 150 billion possible fragrance combinations to choose from.











Our intuitive recommendation engine gives you the power to intuitionally create a scent that perfectly fits you and what you love. Our recommendation engine balances all scent options to make sure that no matter what you choose, you'll have a perfectly balanced fragrance.


In the final stages, our fragrance specialists carefully mix and create your custom perfume or cologne. Can't get enough of it? We'll save your fragrance ID so you can order it again and again!




In order to stay UNIQUE we only  use the highest grade ingredients on the market. Whether from the sunny hills of southern Spain or the floral valleys of French Provence, we strive to provide you with quality you can smell. Each UNIQUE fragrance is made with 15% perfume oil, creating a luxurious scent experience that can last up to 24 hours.






Choose from over 10 designer glass bottles of various shapes and colors, you can write your name or upload your own artwork or logos, which are printed onto the bottle with a permanent color print process. Each fragrance is packed and shipped by hand, and our service consultants are available for any requests you may have.




It all started at a party, talking to friends. One of them talked about just having bought a new
fragrance - and then shortly after, meeting another women using the exact same
perfume. The idea was born: We are unique - Our most personal accessory, our
smell, should be unique too!

We have been working for years to make this intriguing
idea turn into reality. At first we have tried to do it all by ourselves, experimenting
with all kinds of essential oils. Soon we realized that we needed professional
help. We have been working with great perfumers, designers and engineers in the
US, in Europe and across the world. We have developed the progressive UNIQUE fragrance technology which has been awarded the Global Innovation Award, the
Service Innovation Award and the Think Different Innovation Award. Now we want
to bring this great product to the market, launching our website and opening
our perfume lab in NYC, USA. Our vision: Making perfume UNIQUE!










The UNIQUE team is
a crew of highly motivated fragrance professionals with an ambition to change
the world of perfumery. We joined forces because we believe in a world of mass
consumption and anonymity there is need for something new. Because we want to
embrace the value of true craftsmanship and individuality. Because we believe
true luxury is UNIQUE.









When do I get my custom fragrance?
In August you will receive a personal invitation email with a web-link to create your custom scent with our UNIQUE Fragrance system. Our website will be exclusively open for our backers, before public availability. Our perfume artists will be there to assist with your order and to create the perfect scent for you or your loved ones.
Can I give my perk as a gift?
Feel free to forward your personal invitation email to your loved-ones. If you prefer a nice gift card, please tell our support and we are happy to provide it to you for free. We are eager to create the perfect gift together with you!
What about the business perks?
If you choose a business perk (business pack or corporate package) our perfume artist will contact you immediately after campaign completion. We will discuss your wishes and create 3 samples for you. If needed, our artists go back to lab to create another series of 3 samples. After you found your perfect fragrance recipe and we agreed on a bottle and a package design our production process will start. This will typically take 2-4 weeks until your business line is shipped to you.
What if I don’t like the custom-tailored fragrance creation?
We are keen on creating perfect fragrances and happy customer relationships. Therefore we are offering all backers a full money-back guarantee. This guarantee does not apply for the business or corporate package which come with previous sampling.
How can I use the money-back guarantee?
If you are not 100% satisfied with your personal creation, you can return your perfume or cologne within the first two weeks after receiving it. We will refund you the value of the perk. To use the money-back service, you will find a section with a returns form on our website. If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact our support.
Where are you shipping and how much are your shipping costs?
We are shipping worldwide! All perks are shipped worldwide without any additional costs.
How long does the shipping take?
Shipping within the US may presumably take up to 7 days. Worldwide shipping may take 12-20 days. Shipping times are calculated from the day you submitted your order, using our UNIQUE Fragrance online tool (invitation codes will be sent in August).
Can I select a different shipping address?
Yes. After we sent you your invitation code for our UNIQUE Fragrance tool in August, you have the option to do so. You will be able to submit a shipping address that differs from your own address.
Who is your shipping provider and how can I track my parcel?
We still have not decided on the provider. We may ship with UPS, FedEx or USPS. We are shipping to Europe with DHL. With Track & Trace you will be able to track you parcel once we manufactured it. You will receive a shipping confirmation email with a tracking link after your order.
Can I pick up my fragrance locally in NYC?
At this point we are not offering a local pick up. But shipping is free and shouldn’t take too long locally.
How do I create my own perfume using the UNIQUE Fragrance system?
You will receive a personal invitation code in August. Our online tool then allows you to create your own perfume and to design your own bottle. All fragrances and notes are developed by our perfumers and can be combined to perfect harmony. Our fragrance tool gives you suggestions of which notes to combine.  If you are still uncertain, you can  choose the bespoke service option in the process for free. Our fragrance experts will then create the fragrance for you according to your ideas and wishes.
How many notes / aromas can I combine?
You can combine up to 6 different notes. To increase intensity of a specific note, you can also select specific notes twice or more. With more than 150 billion possible combinations your perfume is most likely absolutely unique.
How do I know that my custom perfumes smells good?
We have developed our fragrances and the technology in cooperation with experienced perfumers and engineers. The system is completely intuitive and has been awarded the Global Innovation Award, the Service Innovation Award and the Think Different Innovation Award. We are sure you will be able to create your perfect custom scent! And if you are not completely satisfied, we are happy to inform you about our money back guarantee. Please feel free to contact our service for help and fragrance consultation at any time.
How are the fragrances produced?
All fragrances are carefully produced by hand by experienced perfume artists. Automated printing helps us with the customization of the bottles. Only after our fragrance experts tested and approved a creation it is being sent to a consumer.
What are your fragrances made from?
Like all premium fragrances, it contains perfume oils and ethanol. We are using 15% premium perfume oils (Eau de Parfum) for an intense and lasting fragrance experience. Our perfume oils contain exclusive natural essential oils and designer notes. We are sourcing our essences from established European partners, mainly in southern France (Provence), Spain and Italy.
Can I receive a sample in advance?
Our UNIQUE fragrance tool works completely intuitive. Therefore we do not supply samples and can still guarantee great results.  In case you should not be 100% satisfied, we are happy to offer you our money-back guarantee. If you are uncertain, you can also use our bespoke service.
How does the bespoke fragrance service work?
Our UNIQUE fragrance tool offers you the option to design the fragrance yourself or to use our bespoke service. For the bespoke service we developed a special questionnaire. Our fragrance experts will then develop the perfume according to your personal wishes and preferences. The perfume bottle you can design yourself using our online tool. A bespoke perfume is also a great idea for a personal gift. When using the online form, just state that the perfume is for someone else and let us know the recipient’s preferences. Exclusively for all backers the bespoke options comes free with their perk.

story:
Light conditions change fast and so should your sunglasses. CTRL is the world's most advanced and fastest tint changing glasses for mountain biking, extreme sports and leisure. Now re-designed with a full frame, new color and improved e-Tint technology, CTRL XC is capable of changing tint within 0.1 second - either manually or automatically - depending on the surrounding light. Single pair of sunglasses for multiple light conditions.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


 

 

 

 

Most sunglasses do not adapt to changing light. Others such as photochromic sunglasses are passive and so they adapt very slowly (several minutes) and are not controllable. The patented electronic Tint-on-Demand (e-Tint™) liquid crystal technology is ultra fast and controllable. This is why it is being developed for the U.S. Army to be their next generation standard issue eyewear.

 

 

 

 

 

Help us by spreading the word via email and social media. You can earn 1 credit every time one of your referrals purchases a CTRL XC.  The amount of credits you can earn is limitless!  Once the campaign is over, we will apply this credit to your account, giving you a refund on your purchase or credit on the purchase of a new CTRL XC. Please note that contributors cannot receive referral credit for referring themselves.  Of two contributors, only one can be the 'referrer' and receive campaign credit for the other's contribution.

 

 

 

 

 



 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

AlphaMicron is the mother company behind CTRL Eyewear and has a team of over 30 commited staff including 8 PhDs, 5 masters and 5 LC process engineers. CEO Bahman Taheri is also Adjunct Professor of Chemical Physics at Kent State University (Ohio). Bahman has over 70 publications and more than 65 international patents on liquid crystals, optical devices, optics and lasers.

CTRL Eyewear is a new brand of smart LCD glasses aiming to change the landscape of the wearables industry. CTRL Eyewear was established in 2015 in the Netherlands as a subsidiary of AlphaMicron Inc, Ohio, USA. CTRL Eyewear aims to design, develop and market the world’s most innovative eyewear, powered by AlphaMicron’s vast experience in LCD adaptive lens technology. CTRL Eyewear is targeting high performance athletes, outdoor adventurists and anybody who accepts nothing less than the best. After the start in the Netherlands the client management is taken over by the Kent, Ohio operations from where the units will be shipped as well.

story:
We asked women what they wanted in a fashion watch. We listened and then created the first Bluetooth Smartwatch specifically designed for women and men. Our Smart & Cool Smartwatches come in several styles, with a white or colored bezel, matching bands, rose gold case, circular mechanical watch functions, caller ID display window,12 day active battery life, and the latest in easy Bluetooth operations. Plus, all your calls are private with a slight vibration only you know who called. It will be difficult for you to tell the difference between a $7,000 designer watch and our new Bluetooth Smart & Cool Smartwatch. 



When designing this Smart & Cool collection, we focused on 3 details:

  • An affordable watch with the fashion of high end designer watches.
  • Combining a high quality Quartz mechanical watch with a Bluetooth Smartwatch. 
  • Simple, easy to use features and a battery life approximately 10 days.

1) Stay in contact for that one important call, even without your Smartphone.

2) No one in the room will know a call/message has come through except YOU.

3) No one will know that your Smart & Cool is a Smartwatch except you.

          The average person checks or handles their Smartphone over 70 times a day.  With Smart and Cool your hands are free, making your day easier and more relaxed.

                With all the design and engineering completed, we our focusing the next few months on obtaining the best parts and finalizing manufacturing. I am a perfectionist and will be part of every stage to assure a beautiful quality watch that you will love and depend on for those important calls.

         Over the last 18 months we have designed several prototypes. The final Smart & Cool has been engineered and we’re ready to start manufacturing. The funds will be used in completing the final stage of manufacturing. 

Our Smart & Cool team of designers, engineers and several manufacturers have already started operations. With over 25 years experience dealing with design, quality and manufacturers, I can guarantee you a great watch that you will love.      

Watch specifications:

1.  Hands-free profile

2.  Range of Frequency 2.4 Spectrum

3.  Circular case 4 cm to 4.5 cm

4.  Charging time 3 hours 

5.  120 hours battery life (10 days active battery life)

6.  SMS vibrating alert

7.  Water resistant 4 atm

8.  Stainless Steel case

9.  OLED display 96X16

10.  Bluetooth V1.2 1

11.  Display 96X16 – pixel OLED

12.  Automatic saving electronic energy

13.  Compatible with all Bluetooth mobiles

14. Proximity Vibrating mobile Smartphone alert 

15. Band Material: Stainless Steel/Leather/Ceramic 

16. Movement:Quartz

17. Warranty: 2 years

         There are always significant challenges in manufacturing and delivering any electronic product. Mass manufacturing isn't the same as prototype development; we are currently in the initial manufacturing operations.

Lead times vary for different components, some manufactures require up to 3 months to deliver a specific item, so once we have the funds we will immediately begin placing part orders and do our best to ship as soon as possible.

 Our team has more than 25 years of experience developing watches and electronic products. In addition, our partners have over 30 years global experience in manufacturing and mass production.

story:
Introduction

Modest Street Fashion is a book of photographs that commemorates the emerging culture of modest street style which has erupted around the world. It is the first book to visually document this ever growing international trend that has exploded from the streets of Kuala Lumpur to the alleys of New York City. Profiling some of the top ‘Hijabistas’ this is a must-have inside look into a twenty-first-century genesis of a faith driven style.


This project known as Modest Street Fashion found it's beginnings capturing some of the top modest fashion bloggers of New York City in September 2013.  Since then we have been able to cover London, Brussels, Amsterdam, Toronto, Houston, Miami, Washington D.C., Trinidad & Tobago, and currently looking to travel to Australia, Indonesia, Singapore, Malaysia, Dubai, Kuwait, Paris, Copenhagen, Stockholm, and Los Angeles.

Now we need your help!

We've been able to fund the project thus far through personal contributions, but to finish the project, and wrap up the last leg of locations, it requires support from everyone!  The funds that are raised during this campaign will be going towards air fare, accommodation, and per diem.  Every bit will be put forth to complete the project.

What your help means.

This project is the first of it's kind documenting a global trend known as Modest Street Fashion.  And your contribution ensures that the likes of such a project will reach a world-wide audience.  This is the opportunity to give Modesty a voice and potentially take ownership of the fashion world!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you're not able to make your own personal contribution please make others aware of this campaign and feel free to share our Vlogs from youtube.com/modeststreetfashion


Thank You!

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know how the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution? story:
Hello, my name is Claire Emma Harris and I am the person behind Emma Harris Lingerie.  I’ve worked in the fashion industry for many years as a designer / pattern technician.  Around 6 years ago, I decided to start working for myself as a freelance designer and product developer, my workload grew rapidly until I simply had too much work for one person and I opened a small design studio.  The studio now employs 3 people, we manufacture for many high end lingerie brands.  With every spare hour that I can grab, I work on my own brand Emma Harris Lingerie.

The Emma Harris studio is based in the UK.  The collection is made in-house from luxury silks and lace and is handmade.  I spend hours upon hours perfecting the fit and design of my new collections.  I’m passionate about producing luxury lingerie that my customers will cherish. The brand is growing organically, and we are regularly featured in online magazines, blogs and the occasional glossy mag.  We are currently preparing to send our new Autumn Winter collection to our UK stockists as our sales during the last season has been very good.


Getting brand recognition is extremely hard.  It takes hard work & dedication but most of all it costs money.  You can have the most fantastic product, but you really need to get your potential customers to see it, for them to want to buy it.  This is where I am asking for your help.

Currently the Emma Harris design studio produces on average 90 pairs of knickers and 90 bras per week.  That’s 9,360 luxury bras and knickers per year for my clients.  I’d dearly like that number to include a high percentage of Emma Harris pieces.  I design every piece of the Emma Harris collection, I produce the patterns, the samples, the production grades and produce the majority of orders myself.  Many of the Emma Harris orders we send out are produced out of hours in order to keep to my customer promises. 

With your funding,  I will be able to spend more time on my brand, attend trade shows to gain stockists, pay for advertisements and improve campaigns.  This will increase brand awareness, which will increase sales and therefore fund further growth of my label.  I already have the product and means to manufacture.


There’s a trade show in Paris, Salon De Lingerie and another in London, the Lingerie Edit.  These shows are 2/3 day events, during which buyers and press are invited to view the collections.  I’d love Emma Harris to show at these.  This is my best way to gain stockists.

Advertisements.  Listening to PR advice, advertising is crucial and includes not only the adverts you view in glossy magazines, but also gifting of goods and investing in time to get products featured in articles.  All of which take time and money. #promoEHL

Through my perks, I’m hopefully showing my appreciation to you.  The secret Facebook page will be regularly updated with behind the scenes photographs from the new collection.  You’ll meet my team of lovely machinists and watch as the new collection develops.  I’d love your feedback too!

The knickers, bras and babydolls sent will all have a unique label sewn into them.  It will say ‘I helped launch Emma Harris’.  My thoughts are that when you see an article or advertisement featuring Emma Harris, you’ll have a piece of what made it happen.

If we don’t reach our entire goal, I’ll carefully decide which trade show I can afford to attend and promise to spend your funding carefully.  If we exceed our goal, I’ll advertise more, increase the strength of the campaign and possibly consider another trade show, Curve.  I could also consider employing another machinist, your funds would pay for their in-house training.

I’m passionate about re-introducing skills into the industry, so as Emma Harris grows I will continue to train and employ more machinists.  It takes me 12 weeks to train a standard machinist into a luxury lingerie machinist and there is a huge lack of skills in the industry.  It’s a highly skilled job that  not all machinists can turn their skills to. 

Why back my campaign?  I’m not a start up business, I am a fully operational designer/ maker already producing a high volume of products for other clients.  Most new brands experience huge learning curves during their first 3 years of trading, I’ve already worked through that troublesome start up period.  Emma Harris Lingerie is already trading and selling well in UK boutiques and on websites.  But most of all, people who buy Emma Harris lingerie, love it.


If you love my campaign, but simply cannot afford to help back it.  Would you help spread the word?  There’s a link to share on the social media sites and I really would appreciate your help to get this campaign noticed.  If you have chosen a perk, that’s so kind!  I am extremely grateful and look forward to showing you how i’ve invested your funds.

For sizing information;

Our regular sizes are UK 6 – 14 for briefs & thongs and babydolls.

Bra sizes 28C – FF

  30B – FF

  32A – FF

  34A – F

  36A – E

If you would like further information re sizes, you can email me directly info@emma-harris.co.uk

All images shown are from my current AW14 campaign.

design every piece of the Emma Harris collection, I produce the patterns, the
samples, the production grades and produce the majority of orders myself. 
Many of the Emma Harris orders we send out are produced out of hours in order
to keep to my customer promises. 
With your funding,  I will be
able to spend more time on my brand, attend trade shows to gain stockists, pay
for advertisements and improve campaigns.  This will increase brand
awareness, which will increase sales and therefore fund further growth of my
label.  I already have the product and means to manufacture.


There’s a trade show in Paris, Salon
De Lingerie and another in London, the Lingerie Edit.  These shows are 2/3
day events, during which buyers and press are invited to view the
collections.  I’d love Emma Harris to show at these.  This is my best
way to gain stockists.
Advertisements.  Listening to PR
advice, advertising is crucial and includes not only the adverts you view in
glossy magazines, but also gifting of goods and investing in time to get
products featured in articles.  All of which take time and money. #promoEHL
Through my perks, I’m hopefully
showing my appreciation to you.  The secret Facebook page will be
regularly updated with behind the scenes photographs from the new
collection.  You’ll meet my team of lovely machinists and watch as the new
collection develops.  I’d love your feedback too!
The knickers, bras and babydolls sent
will all have a unique label sewn into them.  It will say ‘I helped launch
Emma Harris’.  My thoughts are that when you see an article or
advertisement featuring Emma Harris, you’ll have a piece of what made it
happen.
If we don’t reach our entire goal,
I’ll carefully decide which trade show I can afford to attend and promise to
spend your funding carefully.  If we exceed our goal, I’ll advertise more,
increase the strength of the campaign and possibly consider another trade show,
Curve.  I could also consider employing another machinist, your funds
would pay for their in-house training.
I’m passionate about re-introducing
skills into the industry, so as Emma Harris grows I will continue to train and
employ more machinists.  It takes me 12 weeks to train a standard
machinist into a luxury lingerie machinist and there is a huge lack of skills
in the industry.  It’s a highly skilled job that  not all machinists
can turn their skills to. 
Why back my campaign?  I’m not a
start up business, I am a fully operational designer/ maker already producing a
high volume of products for other clients.  Most new brands experience
huge learning curves during their first 3 years of trading, I’ve already worked
through that troublesome start up period.  Emma Harris Lingerie is already
trading and selling well in UK boutiques and on websites.  But most of
all, people who buy Emma Harris lingerie, love it.



If you love my campaign, but simply
cannot afford to help back it.  Would you help spread the word? 
There’s a link to share on the social media sites and I really would appreciate
your help to get this campaign noticed.  If you have chosen a perk, that’s
so kind!  I am extremely grateful and look forward to showing you how i’ve
invested your funds.
For sizing information;
Our regular sizes are UK 6 – 14 for
briefs & thongs and babydolls.
Bra sizes 28C – FF
  30B – FF
  32A – FF
  34A – F
  36A – E
If you would like further information
re sizes, you can email me directly info@emma-harris.co.uk
All images shown are from my current AW14 campaign.

story:
Hi, I am David Hundertmark the founder of FARER DESIGN.

Beginning of this year I launched my first project ever, the DAYFARER backpack and I am excited to be back on Kickstarter introducing the newest product, the DAYFARER Sling.

The DAYFARER line stays for a everyday carry bags, for everyone with an creative and active lifestyle.

And if you pack light and need quick access, the DAYFARER Sling mind just be right bag for you ;-)

Vincent (EXCESSORIZE ME.) takes a closer look at the DAYFARER Sling and see what EDC it can hold.
 
 
 

It can be worn as a Sling Bag, Shoulder Bag or classic Briefcase.

 
 
Tablet pocket, magnetic Key Clip and internal organization are quick accessible without removing the bag from your body.
 
 
 
 
An magnetic Snap buckle opens by sliding and close almost from alone.
 
 
Versatile strap for dual carry positions.
 
 
 
 

Main features:

• 1680D ballistic nylon with a water repellent coating exterior
• YKK® zippers 
• Padded tablet sleeve
• Internal pockets for accessories
• Adjustable shoulder strap
• Front and hidden back pocket
• Ripstop Nylon lining

Dimensions:  
31cm / 23,5cm / 9cm 
12,2" / 9,2" / 3,5"

Weight: 
450g
0,99lbs

1. Design the best product in their category. (Only one product per category)

2. Source only the highest quality fabrics and materials.

3. Make products that simplify an active and creative life.

CONTACT:

If you have any further questions, an improvement proposal or you just want to chat about the DAYFARER Sling, please feel free to contact me at info@farerdesign.com and I will get back to you ASAP.

 

Risks and challenges

This is my second Indiegogo project and I understand what Indiegogo is about and take my obligation to backers very seriously. 
I can proudly say that I was able to deliver all orders for my first project on time and now working together with the same manufacturer and fulfillment center and we will work very hard to avoid any potential risks and delays in delivering the DAYFARER Sling. 
With that said, something unexpected can always occur. I will keep backers well informed in a timely manner throughout the entire production process.

Shipping:

Your order will be handled by DHL up to entry of your country. 
Once your order enters your country, it will be handed off to your local post office for the final delivery. 
For international shipments outside the EU, please be aware that covering possible import, duty, VAT, and customs charges will be the buyers responsibility.

story:
The Story 

It wasn’t until the past few years that I became very health conscious. As a runner, drinking water is not only necessary to sustaining my physical being, but it also nourishes my emotional and mental health. I’ve discovered that no matter how tough my day is, no matter the challenges that come my way, no matter the physical or emotional discomfort that I’m in, if I’m drinking enough water, I’ll be okay. 

Drinking water also has major health benefits like removing toxins from your system, improving skin health, and above all, nourishing the brain. I was an avid coffee drinker, but this past year, I’ve replaced my daily cup of coffee with water, and I never looked back. Since then, I’ve noticed the changes in my performance when exercising, my physical health, and increased energy level without the feeling of crashing afterwards. Most importantly, I’ve been more willing and ready to take risks and chase after my dreams. If you want to take on the world, start by drinking water. When you feel good about your health, you feel good about yourself and your life. Through my clothing brand, I am able to share this message with the world.

What We Need & What You Get

In order for this campaign to be successful, we want to raise $500 to be able to kickstart our next phase of production for new items, which includes water bottles, new t-shirt designs and apparel as well as baseball caps. 100% of the funding will go towards production. Contributors will receive a 25% discount on any available item, including new releases (a separate code will be sent out privately). If our entire goal is not achieved, 100% of the amount raised will still go towards production. If necessary, some items may be eliminated for this phase of production until more funds are received. 

The Impact

Although this campaign aims to raise funds for the production of sales items, Stay Hydrated is selling more than products. We are selling the meaning and the impact of what these products can instill in people's lives. This project is extremely valuable in today's day and age where self-care is essential to improving the quality of life. More importantly, for trendsetters and street wear enthusiasts, these particular products stand out as it promotes a more meaningful message while embodying minimalist fashion. The quality of every product is 100% trusted as we've visited the production sites of these materials to ensure quality control. 

Risks & Challenges

The first and most apparent challenge would be failing to reach the goal amount. In order to produce all desired items in this next phase of the business and boost engagement and activity, it is crucial that we raise enough funds for production. The most important item for this phase of production is the aluminum water bottles, which are costly. It is possible that all of the funds will go towards producing water bottles over other listed items. However, if we do not reach the desired amount, we may not be able to produce as many water bottles as are demanded. In order to overcome this challenge, there will be great effort in fundraising outside of this platform, mainly through friends and families as well as special incentives. We will leverage our marketing experience and network to increase engagement and activity in order to boost donations and eventually, sales. 

Another challenge that may occur after this campaign is the lack of sales and revenue that would ideally filter back into more production. In order to prevent this issue from happening, we will create new marketing strategies and increase publicity as well as engagement in our audience before, during and after the launch of new products. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to donate, no problem! We hope you will help us get the word out about our campaign and more importantly, our mission for Stay Hydrated.

story:
Short Summary

We are Custom Bulk Order Apparel and we are helping raise funds for Sigma Kappa Raise funds for their pocket tees. They have a very special event coming up soon and it would make it that much more special for them to have something that brings them back to that special time.

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

Once we reach our goal we will able to provide them with the pocket tee they desire. We have top of the line product from the pocket tee itself so it has a longer durability, we also have excellent printing so after your new shirt goes through plenty of washes it will look as good as it did when you first got it. If we are not able to reach our goal the funding will go toward the Sigma Kappa for the next time they want shirts, this will give them a head start. 

The Impact

We have been provide apparel to Fraternities and Sororities throughout the country and by allowing us to make something for such a special event will not only bring back the memory of this weekend but also shows how Custom Bulk Apparel is effecting people all over the county.

story:
Introducing the new LILY Collection!


WE GIVE A FISH Referrals and Perks 

Angelfish: 2 successful referrals will get you a pair of IVYLISH earrings picked by our team!
Starfish: 5 successful referrals will get you a special gift from us. We will send you a few options to pick.
School of Fish: 33 successful referrals will get you a “choose your own adventure” trip. You can travel to Vietnam alongside our team next summer and meet the kids that we support OR choose a trip to NYC/ATL for a fashion show. We will organize these trips on your behalf (details in FAQ at the end of this page).

Dear friends, family, and supporters - we are thrilled that you are viewing our campaign. Your contribution will not only make our dreams come true, but it will also allow us to change the lives of others!

IVYLISH jewelry is much more than a beautiful accessory. Each piece of our organic buffalo horn jewelry is handcrafted with loved by our talented artisans in Vietnam, and every collection has a meaningful story behind it.

       

Your purchase of IVYLISH luxury jewelry helps support our non-profit partner organization, Kids Without Borders. Kids Without Borders provides children growing up in orphanages with education and vocational training, so that they can break out of the cycle of poverty when they exit the care system.



The first 4 collections of IVYLISH jewelry are inspired by the holy animals in Vietnamese mythology: Dragon, Phoenix, Turtle, and Lotus (our national flower). Our brand has 3 ethos: Aesthetics, Authenticity, and Sustainability.
Check out our Fall 2013 Collection HERE
1. AESTHETICS

Our exquisite designs come in radiant colors you are sure to love. Whether you're heading to the office or out with friends, our pieces will help you make a statement!


**Our earrings are also made for sensitive ears **

Note: After checking out, please let us know your selected ITEM ID (e.g.,: PHOENIX_L, LOTUS_A) here or email us at help@ivylish.com. Thank you! 
Check out our Fall 2013 Collection HERE
Measurements
Earrings  Diameter: 2 inches, length (drop down): 3.5 inches
Bangles   Diameter: 2.36 or 2.52 inches (multiple options for your fit)
Necklaces  Dragon: D, E: 14 inches, F, G: 20 inches, H,I: 14 inches
                       Phoenix: F, G, H, I: 12 inches, I: 18 inches (adjustable) 
                       Lotus: F, G: 12 inches,  H, I: 14 inches
 here                        Turtle: E, D : 12 inches, F: inches: 18 inches
***We are trying our best to deliver our beautiful IVYLISH jewelry to you in time for Christmas. If you have any special request to reach the perfect day for your special occasion, please email us at help@ivylish.com and we promise we'd try our best to make that happen. :) Please fill in this form here  with your ITEM ID (we have put in your username. For new backers, please feel free to add in your username and your ITEM ID, we'll be filling in the rest of the info). Thank you very much! 

Premium Packaging
All jewelry comes in an elegant gift box with our certificate of authenticity.

         

2. AUTHENTICITY
We ethically source premium quality organic horns that come from Vietnam’s indigenous livestock, the water-buffalo. 

3. SUSTAINABILITY

We contribute 10% of our profits to provide children with vocational training and scholarships.

         

We empower local, talented artisans to hand-craft products using otherwise wasted water-buffalo horns and provide them with access to the international market. 

Teach Me to Fish™
Our trademarked IVYLISH logo includes fish and hearts, which depict our mission: To change lives one child at a time. As the saying goes – Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day; teach a man to fish and you feed him for a lifetime. 


Our Story


 Every year thousands of Vietnamese children become orphans when parents pass away or can no longer afford to care for their children. These children are sent to live in orphanages, temples and churches. Currently there are 700,000 orphans in Vietnam. While many of these institutions provide good care and education, they can only do so much to prepare them for a life outside of the orphan system at age 18. 

           

Having spent much of our lives in Vietnam, we felt compelled to do something about this critical social issue.  We have worked tirelessly over the last 7 months to take IVYLISH from an exciting idea to a real business that will serve as part of the solution.  And Vietnam is just the beginning! Our diverse team will help us make inroads in other developing countries around the world.     

JOIN OUR CAUSE & BE A PART OF THE IVYLISH MOVEMENT!

         
PLEASE SHARE OUR CAMPAIGN WITH FRIENDS! 
Have a question about IVYLISH ? Discuss project Ivylish at Crowdfundingforum.com!

FAQ

How can I contact IVYLISH?
Please email us at help@ivylish.com

How do you source raw material?
We currently source high quality raw water-buffalo horn from Vietnam. Our artisans locate networks of local villagers who farm-raise water-buffalos. When water-buffalos are cultivated for meat or die of old age, villagers sell horns for additional income. Our artisans handpick the best pieces and put them through a 2 month treatment process to refine the horn. Using horn to make jewelry is a sustainable recycling solution!

What happened to the animal?
Similar to other farm livestock such as birds, pigs, and fishes, water-buffalos are cultivated for meat after mature cycle of milk extraction. Their horns are bypass products that, if not sold, will be processed for use as organic fertilizer. The villagers often sell high quality horns to artisans for jewelry and musical instruments. The rest is used as fertilizer.

When will my Ivylish horn jewelry be delivered ?
This Winter/Early 2014! We know you can’t wait to dress up and down with your IVYLISH jewelry, so we are working hard to get them to you as soon as possible. We refuse to send you anything but the highest quality product!

Would the finished surface of our jewelry easily get scratched?
Buffalo horn is naturally scratch resistant. For additional protection, our jewelry comes in a soft velvet pouch for storage.

Will Ivylish Jewelry be available in retail stores? 
We are building partnerships with retailers and will keep you updated!

What percentage of donations goes to the charity? At least 10% of our profits will go to our charities.  

Where is the jewelry manufactured ?
Currently our jewelry is made in Vietnam. We hope to expand to include artisans from many developing countries, soon.

Is there a charge for international shipping?

There is no extra charge for our customers in the United States. There is an additional $9 fee to ship to international backers. We thank you again for your support. 

RISKS and POLICIES

1. Water-buffalo horn is non-toxic, but our jewelry are made of materials that should not be ingested.  Pregnant women and parents especially should use caution when wearing our jewelry around small children.

2. Delays may occur. Our exciting journey is just beginning and with your help, we are working day and night to move fast. We would love to say exactly what date your Ivylish jewelry perks will ship, but honestly with all jewelry are handcrafted, not to mention import/export, custom regulatory requirements, are driven by variables that are often beyond our control. However, if you bought this as a Christmas gift, we will make sure to let your significant other know that his/her very special gift is on its way. 

3. Our fine horn lacquer jewelry might break, crack without proper storage. Every piece of your jewelry comes with a soft velvet pouch and handmade premium wooden paper boxes. Treat your jewelry with love and it will last forever. 

4. Finally, please click here to read Indiegogo's refund policy. 

CREDITS

Music : The Piano Guys 

Sponsor: The House of Saigon  16-18-20 Thu Khoa Huan Street, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam

Photographer: Yen Photography

MEET IVYLISH Co-Founders
Diver, Traveller, Friendship Builder and Seeker of Challenges - Phuong Pheebs Nguyen (LinkedIn) is currently an MBA candidate at Harvard Business School. Prior to HBS, she was a consultant at McKinsey& Company, traveling across Asia to identify, structure and solve problems for multiple public and private organizations. A social entrepreneur in constant search of a sustainable business model to do good, she then worked as an Assistant Program Manager at Singapore International Foundation to help enable the youth to become changemakers-future social entrepreneurs. 

Father, Fashionista, Fitness Enthusiast and Semi-Pro Poker Player - Kevin Tung Nguyen (LinkedIn) is dedicating full time on building IVYLISH. He is a Junior Partner at Radius Online and was also in Vietnam last year leading Project Lana backed by IDG Ventures as a Project Manager. A digital marketing and e-commerce guru, Kevin helped engineer launches of 3 major fashion and education e-commerce sites and is still frequently assisting young startups with their business plans. 

Also MEET Our Friends - Other Aspiring Boston-based Entrepreneurs who's on their way to make their dreams come true through Indiegogo:

Yash Ambardekar & Michael Schmidt and their Libra Systems to help optimize our life

Sara Creighton & Lowell Caulder and their mobile dentist truck

Jeremy Cai and his modern compost bin


FAQ Giveaway Program

What is a successful referral ?
A successful referral means that the friends you have encouraged to get on our site make a pledge in the form of a contribution to our Indiegogo campaign (at least $50 perk), just like you did.

How will IVYLISH know that someone is my referral?
Indiegogo generates an unique link to Ivylish that you can use to send to your friends. When they make a purchase this way, the referral will be linked back to you.

When does this offer end ?
The referral promotion will end on December 14th. Until then, Let's spread the word!

How does “choose your own adventure” work?
We are delighted to offer you two options.

Option 1 is to join our team duringsummer 2014 for an amazing 7 days across Vietnam. We’ll be covering food and tour costs and happy to recommend youwith flight and accommodation options.

Option 2 is to attend one of the very exiting fashion shows next year. We’ll be happy to send you a pair of tickets-details to be sent closer to the date (e.g., Our Fashion show in Atlanta featuring Ivylish in Spring 2014, New York Couture Fashion Week Feb 14-16, 2014, or New York New Year's Eve Lingerie Masquerade Fashion Show on Dec 31, 2014).

you are sure to love. Whether you're heading to the office or out with friends, our pieces will help you make a statement!

Note: After checking out, please let us know your selected ITEM ID (e.g.,: PHOENIX_L, LOTUS_A) here or email us at help@ivylish.com. Thank you! Check out our Fall 2013 Collection HEREMeasurementsEarrings  Diameter: 2 inches, length (drop down): 3.5 inchesBangles   Diameter: 2.36 or 2.52 inches (multiple options for your fit)Necklaces  Dragon: D, E: 14 inches, F, G: 20 inches, H,I: 14 inches                       Phoenix: F, G, H, I: 12 inches, I: 18 inches (adjustable)                        Lotus: F, G: 12 inches,  H, I: 14 inches here                        Turtle: E, D : 12 inches, F: inches: 18 inches***We are trying our best to deliver our beautiful IVYLISH jewelry to you in time for Christmas. If you have any special request to reach the perfect day for your special occasion, please email us at help@ivylish.com and we promise we'd try our best to make that happen. :) Please fill in this form here  with your ITEM ID (we have put in your username. For new backers, please feel free to add in your username and your ITEM ID, we'll be filling in the rest of the info). Thank you very much! 


Premium PackagingAll jewelry comes in an elegant gift box with our certificate of
authenticity.

         

2. AUTHENTICITYWe
ethically source premium quality organic horns that come from Vietnam’s indigenous livestock, the water-buffalo. 

3. SUSTAINABILITYWe contribute 10% of our
profits to provide children with vocational
training and scholarships.         
We empower local,
talented artisans to hand-craft products using otherwise wasted water-buffalo
horns and provide them with access to the international market. 
Teach Me to Fish™Our
trademarked IVYLISH logo includes fish and hearts, which depict our mission: To change lives one child at a time. As
the saying goes – Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day; teach a man to
fish and you feed him for a lifetime. 

Our Story




 Every year thousands
of Vietnamese children become orphans when parents pass away or can no longer afford to care for their children. These children are sent to live in orphanages, temples and churches. Currently
there are 700,000 orphans in Vietnam.
While many of these
institutions provide good care and education, they can only
do so much to prepare them for a life outside of the orphan system at age 18. 

           Having spent much of our lives in Vietnam, we felt compelled to do something about this critical social issue.  We have worked tirelessly over the last 7 months to take IVYLISH from an exciting idea to a real business that will serve as part of the solution.  And Vietnam is just the beginning! Our diverse team will help us make inroads in other developing countries around the world.     
JOIN OUR CAUSE & BE A PART OF THE IVYLISH MOVEMENT!
         PLEASE SHARE OUR CAMPAIGN WITH FRIENDS! Have a question about IVYLISH ? Discuss project Ivylish at Crowdfundingforum.com!
FAQ


How can I contact IVYLISH?
Please email us at help@ivylish.comHow do you source
raw material?We currently source high quality raw water-buffalo horn from Vietnam. Our
artisans locate networks of local villagers who farm-raise water-buffalos. When
water-buffalos are cultivated for meat or die of old age,
villagers sell horns for additional income. Our artisans handpick the best
pieces and put them through a 2 month treatment
process to refine the horn. Using horn to make jewelry is a sustainable
recycling solution!
What
happened to the animal?Similar to other farm livestock such as birds, pigs, and fishes, water-buffalos
are cultivated for meat after mature cycle of milk extraction. Their horns are
bypass products that, if not sold, will be processed for use as organic
fertilizer. The villagers often sell high quality horns to artisans for jewelry
and musical instruments. The rest is used as fertilizer.
When will my Ivylish
horn jewelry be delivered ? 
This Winter/Early 2014! We know you can’t
wait to dress up and down with your IVYLISH jewelry, so we are working hard to
get them to you as soon as possible. We refuse to send you anything but the
highest quality product!Would the finished surface of our
jewelry easily get scratched? Buffalo horn is naturally scratch resistant. For additional protection, our
jewelry comes in a soft velvet pouch for storage.
Will Ivylish Jewelry be available in
retail stores? We are building partnerships with retailers and will keep you updated!What percentage of donations goes to the
charity? At least 10% of our profits will go to our charities.  Where is the jewelry manufactured ? 
Currently our jewelry is made in
Vietnam. We hope to expand to include artisans from many developing countries,
soon. 
Is
there a charge for international shipping? 

There is no extra charge for our
customers in the United States. There is an additional $9 fee to ship to
international backers. We thank you again for your support. RISKS and POLICIES 
1. Water-buffalo horn is non-toxic, but our jewelry are made
of materials that should not be ingested. 
Pregnant women and parents especially should use caution when
wearing our jewelry around small children. 
2. Delays may occur. Our exciting journey is just beginning
and with your help, we are working day and night to move fast. We would love
to say exactly what date your Ivylish jewelry perks will ship, but honestly
with all jewelry are handcrafted, not to mention import/export, custom
regulatory requirements, are driven by variables that are often beyond our control. However, if you bought this as a Christmas gift, we will make sure to let your significant other know that his/her very special gift is on its way. 
3. Our fine horn lacquer jewelry
might break, crack without proper storage. Every piece of your jewelry
comes with a soft velvet pouch and handmade premium wooden paper boxes. Treat
your jewelry with love and it will last forever.  
4. Finally, please click here to read Indiegogo's refund
policy. 
CREDITSMusic : The Piano Guys 
Sponsor: The House of Saigon  16-18-20 Thu Khoa Huan Street, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
Photographer: Yen Photography
MEET IVYLISH Co-FoundersDiver, Traveller, Friendship Builder and Seeker of Challenges - Phuong Pheebs Nguyen (LinkedIn) is currently an MBA candidate at Harvard Business School. Prior to HBS, she was a consultant at McKinsey& Company, traveling across Asia to identify, structure and solve problems for multiple public and private organizations. A social entrepreneur in constant search of a sustainable business model to do good, she then worked as an Assistant Program Manager at Singapore International Foundation to help enable the youth to become changemakers-future social entrepreneurs. 
Father, Fashionista, Fitness Enthusiast and Semi-Pro Poker Player - Kevin Tung Nguyen (LinkedIn) is dedicating full time on building IVYLISH. He is a Junior Partner at Radius Online and was also in Vietnam last year leading Project Lana backed by IDG Ventures as a Project Manager. A digital marketing and e-commerce guru, Kevin helped engineer launches of 3 major fashion and education e-commerce sites and is still frequently assisting young startups with their business plans. 
Also MEET Our Friends - Other Aspiring Boston-based Entrepreneurs who's on their way to make their dreams come true through Indiegogo:
Yash Ambardekar & Michael Schmidt and their Libra Systems to help optimize our life
Sara Creighton & Lowell Caulder and their mobile dentist truck
Jeremy Cai and his modern compost bin
FAQ Giveaway Program
What is a successful referral ?A successful referral means that the friends you have encouraged to get on our site make a pledge in the form of a contribution to our Indiegogo campaign (at least $50 perk), just like you did.
How will IVYLISH know that someone is my referral?Indiegogo generates an unique link to Ivylish that you can use to send to your friends. When they make a purchase this way, the referral will be linked back to you.
When does this offer end ?The referral promotion will end on December 14th. Until then, Let's spread the word!
How does “choose your own adventure” work?We are delighted to offer you two options.
Option 1 is to join our team duringsummer 2014 for an amazing 7 days across Vietnam. We’ll be covering food and tour costs and happy to recommend youwith flight and accommodation options.
Option 2 is to attend one of the very exiting fashion shows next year. We’ll be happy to send you a pair of tickets-details to be sent closer to the date (e.g., Our Fashion show in Atlanta featuring Ivylish in Spring 2014, New York Couture Fashion Week Feb 14-16, 2014, or New York New Year's Eve Lingerie Masquerade Fashion Show on Dec 31, 2014).

story:
Groom like a King. Empower men to shine.

I’m Blue O’Connor and I'm inviting you to help me launch a male aftershave and grooming brand like no other.
 

Kings won’t just offer aftershaves, creams and face washes that make men look great and feel confident. Our mission to ‘empower men to live healthier, happier lives’ will drive every action we take as a company.

  • 20% of all our profits will go to male mental health and youth mentoring projects.
  • Every product we offer will be ethically produced, manufactured in the UK, made using natural ingredients and be registered vegan/cruelty free.

Our positive impact won’t stop there. My aim for Kings is to encourage men to challenge the unhealthy, unrealistic ideas that society holds about masculinity; ideas that often contribute to men’s anxiety and low mood.
 
Through Kings’ marketing and comms, we’ll invite guys to join a movement that empowers them to think independently, break the mould and live by their own definition of ‘being a man’.

Back our campaign today – and help men reach peak health and happiness.

What does it smell like? A fresh, sharp scent that is light and floral, with a perfectly balanced sweetness and woody feel . It's ideal for the summer months! Made with natural essential oils: patchouli, cardamon, vetivert, copaiba, ylang and eucalyptus.

Featured In

Goals

With your support we are aiming to raise £10,000. We don't just want to 'start-up' Kings, we want to launch our brand with a bang! And that's why we have three stretch goals of £15,000, £20,000 and £25,000.

 

Why the world needs Kings

Kings was born out of my personal struggles with mental health. I’d always suffered from social anxiety and during my mid-twenties this progressed to high levels of anxiety and stress.

Everything came to a head the day before my 25th birthday. While driving home from work, I suddenly felt severe pain in my chest and numbness in my hands. I thought I was having a heart attack – but I later realised it was a panic attack.

As a man, I felt an overwhelming sense of shame. In my mind, it was down to me to solve this problem and I had to do it alone.

I felt trapped, because although I knew I needed help, I believed that reaching out would be ‘unmanly’.

I carried on until the situation got so bad that something had to change. I started to address my whole lifestyle – diet, social life, career, thinking patterns and more. Eventually, I quit my job to travel the world.

I was lucky that I was in a financial position to take time out. Having grown up in one of Bristol’s most deprived areas, I was all too aware that many other men do not have this luxury, or access to the support they need to beat anxiety and depression.

My incredible round-the-world trip gave me the time and space to realise what I was passionate about: social change!

The birth of a mission-led grooming business

When I returned to the UK, I changed my career and also became a youth mentor. At the time I was struggling to find grooming products that were a good fit for my values and lifestyle. There seemed to be no quality aftershaves that were ethically produced and cruelty free. And there were definitely no aftershaves that ‘gave back’ to the causes close to my heart.

Out of this frustration, the idea for Kings – a grooming business with a mission – was born. I decided to create a ‘social enterprise’ that would use 20% of all profits to empower men to live their best lives.

I can’t do this alone; but with your backing I can launch Kings, and together we can help build a world of healthier, happier men.

 

Kings' Impact

20% of all Kings profits will be reinvested into male mental health and youth projects – starting today. So when you back our campaign, part of your money will go directly towards empowering men to turn their lives around.

Help us launch Kings, and we’ll be able to carry on transforming men’s lives into the future.

You’ll be benefiting two high-impact local charities – Mentoring Plus and Bristol Mind – as well as Kings’ own flagship project: to build calisthenics parks (urban gyms) to improve the health and well-being of young men.

Kings urban gym

We’ll build outdoor calisthenics parks (body-weight gyms) in areas of deprivation in Bristol, where we’ll run health and well-being workshops for young men. The aim is to improve their health, fitness and mental well-being, as well as raise their aspirations for the future.

Mentoring Plus

Mentoring Plus train and support adult volunteers to mentor 7 to 21 year olds needing extra support with family, education, emotional needs and employability. For every £4,000 Kings donates to Mentoring Plus, they’ll be able to support a young male through mentoring for 12 months.

As a youth mentor myself, I have seen first hand the positive impact that mentoring can have on a young person. I have seen dramatic improvements in confidence and self-esteem in the young person I've personally mentored. 

Mentoring Plus’ own research has shown that mentoring has a positive impact on 100% of mentees – enabling them to feel happier, manage their behavior and have improved family relationships.

Bristol Mind

The Bristol branch of the nationwide charity, Bristol Mind exist to promote the well-being and recovery of people living with mental health problems.

After gaining a degree of control and understanding of my own mental health and well-being, I am now on a learning path to empower other people. I am trained in Mental Health First Aid through MHFA England and I will develop my skills and knowledge alongside the growth of Kings. 

 

Your Perks

The Kings range will eventually cover all your grooming essentials – including fragrances, face wash, moisturisers and beard oil. For now, we’re offering campaign backers the chance to be one of the first to try our signature fragrance: Evolution.

10ml travel size aftershave bottle

50ml standard aftershave bottle & packaging(digital mock-up)

Evolution fragrance: exclusive preview

Evolution is a standout fragrance – for the man with the confidence to grow, adapt and thrive.

From a primal base of earth and wood, Evolution takes you on a journey through exotic spice to the hint of a jungle in bloom.

This striking eau de toilette is made with the following natural essential oils: patchouli, cardamon, vetivert, copaiba, ylang and eucalyptus.

  • Vegan
  • Cruelty free
  • Made in the UK
  • Paraben free
  • Palm oil free

Join the tribe, buy the t-shirt

Show your love for the Kings movement with a hand-printed, eco-friendly t-shirt from screen printers 'I Dress Myself'. Featuring Gorilla – our ‘brand ambassador’ and symbol of the courage, strength and independence men need to break the mould.

  • 100% organic cotton, unisex t-shirt
  • Fair Wear
  • Hand-printed in the UK

Choose your perk today, and help us empower men to live their best lives.

 

Make a contribution 

If you want to support Kings' but don't want to buy any of our products/perks, you can still make a donation by selecting 'Back It' at the top of this page on the right hand side. 

 

Testimonials

James - "Because it was vegan, I assumed the fragrance would smell bad or be low quality. I was wrong! The scent smells great, it lasts all day and the branding is unique. When you combine this with the fact it's ethical and 20% of the profits go to social causes then you end up struggling to find reasons not to buy it."

Samantha - "This is a fantastic gift idea for my partner because the product not only smells great but also is vegan-friendly and ethical.”

Adam - "As a vegan, I've sometimes struggled to find brands and products that match my personal ethics and values. Kings is a brand that I can trust and support. I know every time I buy a product from Kings that it's vegan, cruelty free and supports men through mental health and youth mentoring"

Project Timeline 

 

Risks & Challenges

With ten years experience in the Aerospace Industry and a proven track record of delivering global engineering projects, I have mitigated as many of the potential risks to this crowdfund project as possible.
 
However, there is always the chance of unforeseen issues within my supply chain that are out of my control. I am confident in my own and my supply chain's ability to deliver your chosen perk by the agreed delivery date. If any issues do arise then I will update you accordingly so you always know what the latest status is.

 

A Big Thank You!

Firstly, thank you for reading this far! And secondly, thank you for supporting Kings in whatever way you have chosen. I really appreciate it and I am very grateful. 

Kings was just an idea born in the shower about 12-months ago and now here we are, at the cusp of making a dream a reality.

story:
Leather takes the lives of millions of animals every year. Production is also harmful to the environment. It releases toxins, uses heavy metals, and wastes water. Vegan alternatives do exist, but few have matched the unique properties that make leather so special.

Until now.

This innovative textile comes from exotic Peruvian flowers and fruits. It mimics diverse leather textures, colors, and levels of toughness and thickness. Grown and developed from microorganisms in a biotech lab, the material is produced in the same industry standard sizes as conventional leather. Switching to this vegan alternative is a smooth transition for designers, manufacturers, and anyone else behind the scenes. Plus, since the material is 100% biodegradable, the remains from the recycling process can be used as a liquid compost.

Lab Leather is a zero-waste solution that saves precious resources and protects our animals. All of the luxury, with none of the guilt. What could be better than that?

 

 

Have you thought about how to protect animals, our water, air and soil?

Do you want to be the change?

The change starts with you, just spreading the word. All of the links are at the top of the page, just as simple as a click.

 

 

Be the change and donate, just click the "Back It" button and enter the amount.

 

STEP 1:  Find the "Back it" Button at the top of the page.

 

STEP 2:  Choose your Donation Amount, and press Continue.

Handmade by peruvian artisans bracelet

 

Le Qara T-shirt

 

 

Le Qara Tote bag

 

 

STEP 3:  Fill the form with your payment details.

 

Any help will bring us closer to a better planet for all of us!

Help us change the planet! #LetsChangeClothes, this year we are making our pilot production plant, with your help we would be able to reach the worldwide market, make different textures and colors for our bioleather. And more importantly any help would bring us closer to a pollution-free planet and a clothing industry slaughter-free.

Make this journey with us!

 

 

            


 

 

 

VERSIÓN EN ESPAÑOL

El cuero se lleva la vida de millones de animales cada año. La producción también es perjudicial para el medio ambiente. Libera toxinas, utiliza metales pesados ​​y desperdicia agua. Existen alternativas veganas, pero pocas han igualado las propiedades únicas que hacen que el cuero sea tan especial.

Hasta ahora.

Este textil innovador proviene de exóticas flores y frutas peruanas. Imita diversas texturas de piel, colores y niveles de dureza y grosor. Cultivado y desarrollado a partir de microorganismos en un laboratorio de biotecnología, el material se produce en los mismos tamaños estándar de la industria que el cuero convencional. Cambiar a esta alternativa vegana es una transición suave para los diseñadores, fabricantes y cualquier otra persona detrás de la escena. Además, como el material es 100% biodegradable, los restos del proceso se pueden usar como compost líquido.

Lab Leather es una solución de desperdicio cero que ahorra recursos valiosos y protege a nuestros animales. Todo el lujo, sin la culpa. ¿Qué podría ser mejor que eso?

¿Has pensado en cómo proteger a los animales, nuestra agua, aire y suelo?

¿Quieres ser el cambio?

El cambio comienza contigo, solo pasando la voz. Todos los enlaces están en la parte superior de la página, tan simple como un clic.

 

Sé el cambio y dona, solo haz clic en el botón "Back it" e ingresa la cantidad.

 

PASO 1:   Encuentra el botón "Back it" en la parte superior de la página.

PASO 2:  Elije la cantidad de donación y presiona Continuar.

 

Handmade by peruvian artisans bracelet

 

Le Qara T-shirt

 

 

Le Qara Tote bag

 

 

PASO 3:  Rellena el formulario con tus datos de pago.

 

¡Cualquier ayuda nos acercará a un planeta mejor para todos nosotros!

¡Ayúdanos a cambiar el planeta! #LetsChangeClothes, este año haremos nuestra planta piloto de producción, con su ayuda podremos llegar al mercado mundial, hacer diferentes texturas y colores para nuestro biocuero. Y, lo que es más importante, cualquier ayuda nos acercará más a un planeta libre de contaminación y una industria de moda sin sacrificio.

¡Haz este viaje con nosotros!
